atk-s0501a0:253_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre sīsakaṭāhabbhantare matthaluṅgaṃ vaṇṇato setaṃ ahichattakapiṇḍivaṇṇanti
atk-s0501a0:253_1: vavatthapeti. Pakkuthitaduddhavaṇṇantipi eke. Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhānaṃ. Disato uparimāya
atk-s0501a0:253_2: disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato sīsakaṭāhassa abbhantare cattāro sibbinimagge nissāya samodhāya
atk-s0501a0:253_3: ṭhapitā cattāro piṭṭhapiṇḍikā viya samohitaṃ catumatthaluṅgapiṇḍappabhedaṃ hutvā ṭhitanti.
atk-s0501a0:254_0: Tattha yathā purāṇalābukaṭāhe pakkhittapiṭṭhapiṇḍi pakkuthitaduddhaṃ vā na jānāti
atk-s0501a0:254_1: “ahaṃ purāṇalābukaṭāhe ṭhita”nti, napi purāṇalābukaṭāhaṃ jānāti “mayi piṭṭhapiṇḍi
atk-s0501a0:254_2: pakkuthitaduddhaṃ vā ṭhita”nti; evameva na matthaluṅgaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ sīsakaṭāhabbhantare
atk-s0501a0:254_3: ṭhita”nti, napi sīsakaṭāhabbhantaraṃ jānāti “mayi matthaluṅgaṃ ṭhita”nti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā
atk-s0501a0:254_4: hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato matthaluṅgaṃ matthaluṅgabhāgena paricchinnanti
atk-s0501a0:254_5: vavatthapeti. Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti
atk-s0501a0:255_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre baddhābaddhabhedato duvidhampi pittaṃ vaṇṇato bahalamadhukatelavaṇṇanti
atk-s0501a0:255_1: vavatthapeti. Abaddhapittaṃ milātabakulapupphavaṇṇantipi eke. Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:255_2: Disato dvīsu disāsu jātaṃ. Okāsato abaddhapittaṃ kesalomanakhadantānaṃ maṃsavinimuttaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:255_3: thaddhasukkhacammañca vajjetvā udakamiva telabindu avasesasarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0501a0:255_4: yamhi kupite akkhīni pītakāni honti bhamanti, gattaṃ kampati kaṇḍūyati. Baddhapittaṃ
atk-s0501a0:255_6: pittakosake ṭhitaṃ, yamhi kupite sattā ummattakā honti, vipallatthacittā hirottappaṃ
atk-s0501a0:255_7: chaḍḍetvā akattabbaṃ karonti, abhāsitabbaṃ bhāsanti, acintitabbaṃ cintenti.
atk-s0501a0:256_0: Tattha yathā udakaṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ telaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ udakaṃ byāpetvā ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a0:256_1: napi udakaṃ jānāti “telaṃ maṃ byāpetvā ṭhita”nti; evameva na abaddhapittaṃ jānāti
atk-s0501a0:256_2: “ahaṃ sarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhita”nti, napi sarīraṃ jānāti “abaddhapittaṃ maṃ byāpetvā
atk-s0501a0:256_3: ṭhita”nti. Yathā ca kosātakikosake ṭhitaṃ vassodakaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ kosātakikosake
atk-s0501a0:256_4: ṭhita”nti, napi kosātakikosako jānāti “mayi vassodakaṃ ṭhita”nti; evameva na baddhapittaṃ
atk-s0501a0:256_5: jānāti “ahaṃ pittakosake ṭhita”nti, napi pittakosako jānāti “mayi baddhapittaṃ ṭhita”nti.
atk-s0501a0:256_6: Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato pittaṃ pittabhāgena
atk-s0501a0:256_7: paricchinnanti vavatthapeti. Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana
atk-s0501a0:256_8: kesasadiso evāti evaṃ pittaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a0:257_0: Tato paraṃ sarīrabbhantare ekapattapūrappamāṇaṃ semhaṃ vaṇṇato setaṃ kacchakapaṇṇarasavaṇṇanti
atk-s0501a0:257_1: vavatthapeti. Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhānaṃ. Disato uparimāya disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato udarapaṭale
atk-s0501a0:257_2: ṭhitanti. Yaṃ pānabhojanādiajjhoharaṇakāle seyyathāpi nāma udake sevālapaṇakaṃ kaṭṭhe
atk-s0501a0:257_3: vā kathale vā patante chijjitvā dvidhā hutvā puna ajjhottharitvā tiṭṭhati, evameva
atk-s0501a0:257_4: pānabhojanādimhi nipatante chijjitvā dvidhā hutvā puna ajjhottharitvā tiṭṭhati, yamhi
atk-s0501a0:257_5: ca mandībhūte pakkamiva gaṇḍaṃ pūtikamiva kukkuṭaṇḍaṃ udarapaṭalaṃ paramajegucchakuṇapagandhaṃ
atk-s0501a0:257_6: hoti. Tato uggatena ca gandhena uggāropi mukhampi duggandhaṃ pūtikuṇapasadisaṃ hoti,
atk-s0501a0:257_7: so ca puriso “apehi duggandhaṃ vāyasī”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati, yañca abhivaḍḍhitaṃ
atk-s0501a0:257_8: bahalattamāpannaṃ paṭikujjanaphalakamiva vaccakuṭiyā udarapaṭalabbhantare eva kuṇapagandhaṃ
atk-s0501a0:258_0: Tattha yathā candanikāya uparipheṇapaṭalaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ candanikāya ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a0:258_1: napi candanikā jānāti “mayi pheṇapaṭalaṃ ṭhita”nti; evameva na semhaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ
atk-s0501a0:258_2: udarapaṭale ṭhita”nti, napi udarapaṭalaṃ jānāti “mayi semhaṃ ṭhitanti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā
atk-s0501a0:258_3: hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato semhaṃ semhabhāgena paricchinnanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a0:258_4: Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ semhaṃ
atk-s0501a0:259_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre pubbo vaṇṇato paṇḍupalāsavaṇṇoti vavatthapeti. Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhāno.
atk-s0501a0:259_1: Disato dvīsu disāsu jāto. Okāsato pubbassa okāso nāma nibaddho natthi. Yattha pubbo
atk-s0501a0:259_2: sannicito tiṭṭheyya, yatra yatra khāṇukaṇṭakappaharaṇaggijālādīhi abhihate sarīrappadese
atk-s0501a0:259_3: lohitaṃ saṇṭhahitvā paccati, gaṇḍapiḷakādayo vā uppajjanti, tatra tatra tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0501a0:260_0: Tattha yathā rukkhassa tattha tattha pharasudhārādīhi pahatappadese avagaḷitvā ṭhito
atk-s0501a0:260_1: niyyāso na jānāti “ahaṃ rukkhassa pahatappadese ṭhito”ti, napi rukkhassa pahatappadeso
atk-s0501a0:260_2: jānāti “mayi niyyāso ṭhito”ti; evameva na pubbo jānāti “ahaṃ sarīrassa tattha tattha
atk-s0501a0:260_3: khāṇukaṇṭakādīhi abhihatappadese gaṇḍapiḷakādīnaṃ uṭṭhitappadese vā ṭhito”ti, napi
atk-s0501a0:260_4: sarīrappadeso jānāti “mayi pubbo ṭhito”ti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe…
atk-s0501a0:260_5: na puggaloti. Paricchedato pubbo pubbabhāgena paricchinnoti vavatthapeti. Ayametassa
atk-s0501a0:260_6: sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ pubbaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a0:261_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre sannicitalohitaṃ saṃsaraṇalohitanti evaṃ duvidhe lohite sannicitalohitaṃ
atk-s0501a0:261_1: tāva vaṇṇato bahalakuthitalākhārasavaṇṇanti vavatthapeti, saṃsaraṇalohitaṃ acchalākhārasavaṇṇanti.
atk-s0501a0:261_2: Saṇṭhānato sabbampi attano okāsasaṇṭhānaṃ. Disato sannicitalohitaṃ uparimāya disāya
atk-s0501a0:261_3: jātaṃ, saṃsaraṇalohitaṃ dvīsupīti. Okāsato saṃsaraṇalohitaṃ kesalomanakhadantānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:261_5: upādinnakasarīraṃ pharitvā ṭhitaṃ. Sannicitalohitaṃ yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgaṃ pūretvā
atk-s0501a0:261_6: ekapattapūraṇamattaṃ vakkahadayapapphāsānaṃ upari thokaṃ thokaṃ binduṃ pātentaṃ vakkahadayayakanapapphāse
atk-s0501a0:261_7: tementaṃ ṭhitaṃ, yamhi vakkahadayādīni atemente sattā pipāsitā honti.
atk-s0501a0:262_0: Tattha yathā jajjarakapāle ṭhitaṃ udakaṃ heṭṭhā leḍḍukhaṇḍādīni tementaṃ na jānāti
atk-s0501a0:262_1: “ahaṃ jajjarakapāle ṭhitaṃ heṭṭhā leḍḍukhaṇḍādīni tememī”ti, napi jajjarakapālaṃ
atk-s0501a0:262_2: heṭṭhā leḍḍukhaṇḍādīni vā jānanti “mayi udakaṃ ṭhitaṃ, amhe vā tementaṃ ṭhita”nti;
atk-s0501a0:262_3: evameva na lohitaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ yakanassa heṭṭhābhāge vakkahadayādīni tementaṃ ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a0:262_4: napi yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgaṭṭhānaṃ vakkahadayādīni vā jānanti “mayi lohitaṃ ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0501a0:262_5: amhe vā tementaṃ ṭhita”nti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti.
atk-s0501a0:262_6: Paricchedato lohitaṃ lohitabhāgena paricchinnanti vavatthapeti. Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo,
atk-s0501a0:262_7: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ lohitaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a0:263_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre sedo vaṇṇato pasannatilatelavaṇṇoti vavatthapeti. Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhāno.
atk-s0501a0:263_1: Disato dvīsu disāsu jāto. Okāsato sedassa okāso nāma nibaddho natthi, yattha sedo
atk-s0501a0:263_2: lohitaṃ viya sadā tiṭṭheyya. Yasmā vā yadā aggisantāpasūriyasantāpautuvikārādīhi
atk-s0501a0:263_4: sabbakesalomakūpavivarehi paggharati. Tasmā tesaṃ kesalomakūpavivarānaṃ vasena taṃ
atk-s0501a0:263_5: saṇṭhānato vavatthapeti. “Sedapariggaṇhakena ca yogāvacarena kesalomakūpavivare pūretvā
atk-s0501a0:264_0: Tattha yathā bhisamuḷālakumudanālakalāpavivarehi paggharantaṃ udakaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ
atk-s0501a0:264_2: jānanti “amhehi udakaṃ paggharatī”ti; evameva na sedo jānāti “ahaṃ kesalomakūpavivarehi
atk-s0501a0:264_3: paggharāmī”ti, napi kesalomakūpavivarā jānanti “amhehi sedo paggharatī”ti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā
atk-s0501a0:264_4: hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato sedo sedabhāgena paricchinnoti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a0:264_5: Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ sedaṃ
atk-s0501a0:265_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre cammamaṃsantare medo vaṇṇato phālitahaliddivaṇṇoti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a0:265_1: Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhāno. Tathā hi sukhino thūlasarīrassa cammamaṃsantare pharitvā
atk-s0501a0:265_4: disāsu jāto. Okāsato thūlasarīrassa sakalasarīraṃ pharitvā kisassa jaṅghāmaṃsādīni
atk-s0501a0:265_5: nissāya ṭhito, yo sinehasaṅkhātopi hutvā paramajegucchattā na matthakatelatthaṃ na
atk-s0501a0:266_0: Tattha yathā maṃsapuñjaṃ nissāya ṭhitā haliddirattadukūlapilotikā na jānāti “ahaṃ
atk-s0501a0:266_1: maṃsapuñjaṃ nissāya ṭhitā”ti, napi maṃsapuñjo jānāti “haliddirattadukūlapilotikā
atk-s0501a0:266_2: maṃ nissāya ṭhitā”ti; evameva na medo jānāti “ahaṃ sakalasarīraṃ jaṅghādīsu vā maṃsaṃ
atk-s0501a0:266_3: nissāya ṭhito”ti, napi sakalasarīraṃ jānāti jaṅghādīsu vā maṃsaṃ “medo maṃ nissāya
atk-s0501a0:266_4: ṭhito”ti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato
atk-s0501a0:266_5: medo heṭṭhā maṃsena, upari cammena, samantato medabhāgena paricchinnoti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a0:266_6: Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ medaṃ
atk-s0501a0:267_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre assu vaṇṇato pasannatilatelavaṇṇanti vavatthapeti. Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:267_1: Disato uparimāya disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato akkhikūpakesu ṭhitanti. Na cetaṃ pittakosake
atk-s0501a0:267_2: pittamiva akkhikūpakesu sadā sannicitaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati, kintu yadā somanassajātā
atk-s0501a0:267_3: sattā mahāhasitaṃ hasanti, domanassajātā rodanti paridevanti, tathārūpaṃ visamāhāraṃ
atk-s0501a0:267_4: vā haranti, yadā ca tesaṃ akkhīni dhūmarajapaṃsukādīhi abhihaññanti, tadā etehi somanassadomanassavisamāhārādīhi
atk-s0501a0:267_5: samuṭṭhahitvā assu akkhikūpakesu pūretvā tiṭṭhati paggharati ca. “Assupariggaṇhakena
atk-s0501a0:267_6: ca yogāvacarena akkhikūpake pūretvā ṭhitavaseneva taṃ manasikātabba”nti pubbācariyā vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0501a0:268_0: Tattha yathā matthakacchinnataruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakesu ṭhitaṃ udakaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ
atk-s0501a0:268_2: jānanti “amhesu udakaṃ ṭhita”nti; evameva na assu jānāti “ahaṃ akkhikūpakesu ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a0:268_3: napi akkhikūpakā jānanti “amhesu assu ṭhita”nti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete
atk-s0501a0:268_4: dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato assu assubhāgena paricchinnanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a0:268_5: Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ assuṃ
atk-s0501a0:269_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre vilīnasinehasaṅkhātā vasā vaṇṇato ācāme āsittatelavaṇṇāti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a0:269_1: Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhānā. Disato dvīsu disāsu jātā. Okāsato hatthatalahatthapiṭṭhipādatalapādapiṭṭhināsāpuṭanalāṭaaṃsakūṭesu
atk-s0501a0:269_2: ṭhitāti. Na cesā etesu okāsesu sadā vilīnā eva hutvā tiṭṭhati, kintu yadā aggisantāpasūriyasantāpautuvisabhāgadhātuvisabhāgehi
atk-s0501a0:269_3: te padesā usmājātā honti, tadā tattha vilīnāva hutvā pasannasalilāsu udakasoṇḍikāsu nīhāro viya sarati.
atk-s0501a0:270_0: Tattha yathā udakasoṇḍiyo ajjhottharitvā ṭhito nīhāro na jānāti “ahaṃ udakasoṇḍiyo
atk-s0501a0:270_1: ajjhottharitvā ṭhito”ti, napi udakasoṇḍiyo jānanti “nīhāro amhe ajjhottharitvā ṭhito”ti;
atk-s0501a0:270_2: evameva na vasā jānāti “ahaṃ hatthatalādīni ajjhottharitvā ṭhitā”ti, napi hatthatalādīni
atk-s0501a0:270_3: jānanti “vasā amhe ajjhottharitvā ṭhitā”ti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe…
atk-s0501a0:270_4: na puggaloti. Paricchedato vasā vasābhāgena paricchinnāti vavatthapeti. Ayametissā
atk-s0501a0:270_5: sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ vasaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a0:271_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre mukhassabbhantare kheḷo vaṇṇato seto pheṇavaṇṇoti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a0:271_1: Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhānoti, samuddapheṇasaṇṭhānotipi eke. Disato uparimāya disāya
atk-s0501a0:271_2: jāto. Okāsato ubhohi kapolapassehi orohitvā jivhāya ṭhitoti. Na ceso ettha sadā sannicito
atk-s0501a0:271_3: hutvā tiṭṭhati, kintu yadā sattā tathārūpaṃ āhāraṃ passanti vā saranti vā, uṇhatittakaṭukaloṇambilānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:271_4: vā kiñci mukhe ṭhapenti. Yadā ca tesaṃ hadayaṃ āgilāyati, kismiñcideva vā jigucchā
atk-s0501a0:271_5: uppajjati, tadā kheḷo uppajjitvā ubhohi kapolapassehi orohitvā jivhāya saṇṭhāti.
atk-s0501a0:271_6: Aggajivhāya cesa kheḷo tanuko hoti, mūlajivhāya bahalo, mukhe pakkhittañca puthukaṃ
atk-s0501a0:271_7: vā taṇḍulaṃ vā aññaṃ vā kiñci khādanīyaṃ nadipuline khatakūpasalilamiva parikkhayamagacchantova
atk-s0501a0:272_0: Tattha yathā nadipuline khatakūpatale saṇṭhitaṃ udakaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ kūpatale saṇṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a0:272_1: napi kūpatalaṃ jānāti “mayi udakaṃ ṭhita”nti; evameva na kheḷo jānāti “ahaṃ ubhohi
atk-s0501a0:272_2: kapolapassehi orohitvā jivhātale saṇṭhito”ti, napi jivhātalaṃ jānāti “mayi ubhohi
atk-s0501a0:272_3: kapolapassehi orohitvā kheḷo saṇṭhito”ti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe…
atk-s0501a0:272_4: na puggaloti. Paricchedato kheḷo kheḷabhāgena paricchinnoti vavatthapeti. Ayametassa
atk-s0501a0:272_5: sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ kheḷaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a0:273_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre siṅghāṇikā vaṇṇato setā taruṇatālamiñjavaṇṇāti vavatthapeti. Saṇṭhānato
atk-s0501a0:273_1: okāsasaṇṭhānā, sedetvā sedetvā nāsāpuṭe nirantaraṃ pakkhittavettaṅkurasaṇṭhānātipi
atk-s0501a0:273_2: eke. Disato uparimāya disāya jātā. Okāsato nāsāpuṭe pūretvā ṭhitāti. Na cesā ettha
atk-s0501a0:273_3: sadā sannicitā hutvā tiṭṭhati, kintu seyyathāpi nāma puriso paduminipatte dadhiṃ
atk-s0501a0:273_4: bandhitvā heṭṭhā paduminipattaṃ kaṇṭakena vijjheyya, atha tena chiddena dadhipiṇḍaṃ
atk-s0501a0:273_5: gaḷitvā bahi papateyya; evameva yadā sattā rodanti, visabhāgāhārautuvasena vā sañjātadhātukkhobhā
atk-s0501a0:273_6: honti, tadā antosīsato pūtisemhabhāvaṃ āpannaṃ matthaluṅgaṃ gaḷitvā tālumatthakavivarena
atk-s0501a0:274_0: Tattha yathā sippikāya pakkhittaṃ pūtidadhi na jānāti “ahaṃ sippikāya ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a0:274_1: napi sippikā jānāti “mayi pūtikaṃ dadhi ṭhita”nti; evameva na siṅghāṇikā jānāti “ahaṃ
atk-s0501a0:274_2: nāsāpuṭesu ṭhitā”ti, napi nāsāpuṭā jānanti “amhesu siṅghāṇikā ṭhitā”ti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā
atk-s0501a0:274_3: hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato siṅghāṇikā siṅghāṇikabhāgena paricchinnāti
atk-s0501a0:274_4: vavatthapeti. Ayametissā sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti
atk-s0501a0:275_0: Tato paraṃ antosarīre lasikāti sarīrasandhīnaṃ abbhantare picchilakuṇapaṃ. Sā vaṇṇato
atk-s0501a0:275_1: kaṇikāraniyyāsavaṇṇāti vavatthapeti. Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhānā. Disato dvīsu disāsu
atk-s0501a0:275_2: jātā. Okāsato aṭṭhisandhīnaṃ abbhañjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā asītisatasandhīnaṃ abbhantare
atk-s0501a0:275_3: ṭhitāti. Yassa cesā mandā hoti, tassa uṭṭhahantassa nisīdantassa abhikkamantassa
atk-s0501a0:275_4: paṭikkamantassa samiñjantassa pasārentassa aṭṭhikāni kaṭakaṭāyanti, accharikāsaddaṃ
atk-s0501a0:275_5: karonto viya vicarati, ekayojanadviyojanamattampi addhānaṃ gatassa vāyodhātu kuppati,
atk-s0501a0:275_6: gattāni dukkhanti yassa pana cesā bahukā hoti, tassa uṭṭhānanisajjādīsu na aṭṭhīni
atk-s0501a0:275_7: kaṭakaṭāyanti, dīghampi addhānaṃ gatassa na vāyodhātu kuppati, na gattāni dukkhanti.
atk-s0501a0:276_0: Tattha yathā abbhañjanatelaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ akkhaṃ abbhañjitvā ṭhita”nti, napi akkho
atk-s0501a0:276_1: jānāti “maṃ telaṃ abbhañjitvā ṭhita”nti; evameva na lasikā jānāti “ahaṃ asītisatasandhiyo
atk-s0501a0:276_2: abbhañjitvā ṭhitā”ti, napi asītisatasandhiyo jānanti “lasikā amhe abbhañjitvā ṭhitā”ti.
atk-s0501a0:276_3: Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato lasikā lasikabhāgena
atk-s0501a0:276_4: paricchinnāti vavatthapeti. Ayametissā sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana
atk-s0501a0:276_5: kesasadiso evāti evaṃ lasikaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a0:277_0: Tato paraṃ antosarīre muttaṃ vaṇṇato māsakhārodakavaṇṇanti vavatthapeti. Saṇṭhānato
atk-s0501a0:277_2: disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato vatthissabbhantare ṭhitanti. Vatthi nāma vatthipuṭo vuccati,
atk-s0501a0:277_3: yattha seyyathāpi nāma candanikāya pakkhitte amukhe peḷāghaṭe candanikāraso pavisati,
atk-s0501a0:277_4: na cassa pavisanamaggo paññāyati; evameva sarīrato muttaṃ pavisati, na cassa pavisanamaggo
atk-s0501a0:277_5: paññāyati nikkhamanamaggo eva tu pākaṭo hoti, yamhi ca muttassa bharite “passāvaṃ
atk-s0501a0:277_6: karomā”ti sattānaṃ āyūhanaṃ hoti. Tattha yathā candanikāya pakkhitte amukhe peḷāghaṭe
atk-s0501a0:277_7: ṭhito candanikāraso na jānāti “ahaṃ amukhe peḷāghaṭe ṭhito”ti, napi peḷāghaṭo jānāti
atk-s0501a0:277_8: “mayi candanikāraso ṭhito”ti; evameva muttaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ vatthimhi ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a0:277_9: napi vatthi jānāti “mayi muttaṃ ṭhita”nti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe…
atk-s0501a0:277_10: na puggaloti. Paricchedato vatthiabbhantarena ceva muttabhāgena ca paricchinnanti
atk-s0501a0:277_11: vavatthapeti. Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti
atk-s0501a0:277_12: evaṃ muttaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti. Evamayaṃ imaṃ dvattiṃsākāraṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a0:278_0: Tassevaṃ imaṃ dvattiṃsākāraṃ vaṇṇādivasena vavatthapentassa taṃ taṃ bhāvanānuyogaṃ
atk-s0501a0:278_1: āgamma kesādayo paguṇā honti, koṭṭhāsabhāvena upaṭṭhahanti. Tato pabhuti seyyathāpi
atk-s0501a0:278_2: nāma cakkhumato purisassa dvattiṃsavaṇṇānaṃ pupphānaṃ ekasuttaganthitaṃ mālaṃ olokentassa
atk-s0501a0:278_3: sabbapupphāni apubbāpariyamiva pākaṭāni honti; evameva “atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā”ti
atk-s0501a0:278_4: imaṃ kāyaṃ satiyā olokentassa sabbe te dhammā apubbāpariyamiva pākaṭā honti. Kesesu
atk-s0501a0:278_5: āvajjitesu asaṇṭhahamānāva sati yāva muttaṃ, tāva pavattati. Tato pabhuti tassa āhiṇḍantā
atk-s0501a0:278_6: manussatiracchānādayo ca sattākāraṃ vijahitvā koṭṭhāsarāsivaseneva upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0501a0:278_7: tehi ca ajjhohariyamānaṃ pānabhojanādi koṭṭhāsarāsimhi pakkhippamānamiva upaṭṭhātīti.
atk-s0501a0:279_0: Etthāha “athānena tato paraṃ kiṃ kātabba”nti? Vuccate – tadeva nimittaṃ āsevitabbaṃ
atk-s0501a0:279_1: bhāvetabbaṃ bahulīkātabbaṃ suvavatthitaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ panāyaṃ taṃ nimittaṃ
atk-s0501a0:279_2: āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti suvavatthitaṃ vavatthapetīti? Ayañhi taṃ kesādīnaṃ koṭṭhāsabhāvena
atk-s0501a0:279_3: upaṭṭhānanimittaṃ āsevati, satiyā alliyati bhajati upagacchati, satigabbhaṃ gaṇhāpeti.
atk-s0501a0:279_4: Tattha laddhaṃ vā satiṃ vaḍḍhento taṃ bhāvetīti vuccati. Bahulīkarotīti punappunaṃ
atk-s0501a0:279_5: satisampayuttaṃ vitakkavicārabbhāhataṃ karoti. Suvavatthitaṃ vavatthapetīti yathā
atk-s0501a0:279_6: suṭṭhu vavatthitaṃ hoti, na puna antaradhānaṃ gacchati, tathā taṃ satiyā vavatthapeti,
atk-s0501a0:280_0: Atha vā yaṃ pubbe anupubbato, nātisīghato, nātisaṇikato, vikkhepappahānato, paṇṇattisamatikkamanato,
atk-s0501a0:280_1: anupubbamuñcanato, lakkhaṇato, tayo ca suttantāti evaṃ dasavidhaṃ manasikārakosallaṃ
atk-s0501a0:280_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha anupubbato manasikaronto āsevati, nātisīghato nātisaṇikato ca manasikaronto
atk-s0501a0:280_3: bhāveti, vikkhepappahānato manasikaronto bahulī karoti, paṇṇattisamatikkamanādito
atk-s0501a0:281_0: Etthāha “kathaṃ panāyaṃ anupubbādivasena ete dhamme manasi karotī”ti? Vuccate – ayañhi
atk-s0501a0:281_1: kese manasi karitvā tadanantaraṃ lome manasi karoti, na nakhe. Tathā lome manasi
atk-s0501a0:281_2: karitvā tadanantaraṃ nakhe manasi karoti, na dante. Esa nayo sabbattha. Kasmā? Uppaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0501a0:281_3: hi manasikaronto seyyathāpi nāma akusalo puriso dvattiṃsapadaṃ nisseṇiṃ uppaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0501a0:281_4: ārohanto kilantakāyo tato nisseṇito papatati, na ārohanaṃ sampādeti; evameva bhāvanāsampattivasena
atk-s0501a0:281_5: adhigantabbassa assādassa anadhigamanato kilantacitto dvattiṃsākārabhāvanāto papatati,
atk-s0501a0:282_0: Anupubbato manasikarontopi ca kesā lomāti nātisīghatopi manasi karoti. Atisīghato
atk-s0501a0:282_1: hi manasikaronto seyyathāpi nāma addhānaṃ gacchanto puriso samavisamarukkhathalaninnadvedhāpathādīni
atk-s0501a0:282_2: magganimittāni upalakkhetuṃ na sakkoti, tato na maggakusalo hoti, addhānañca parikkhayaṃ
atk-s0501a0:282_3: neti; evameva vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīni dvattiṃsākāranimittāni upalakkhetuṃ na sakkoti, tato
atk-s0501a0:282_4: na dvattiṃsākāre kusalo hoti, kammaṭṭhānañca parikkhayaṃ neti.
atk-s0501a0:283_0: Yathā ca nātisīghato, evaṃ nātisaṇikatopi manasi karoti. Atisaṇikato hi manasikaronto
atk-s0501a0:283_1: seyyathāpi nāma puriso addhānamaggaṃ paṭipanno antarāmagge rukkhapabbatataḷākādīsu
atk-s0501a0:283_2: vilambamāno icchitappadesaṃ apāpuṇanto antarāmaggeyeva sīhabyagghādīhi anayabyasanaṃ
atk-s0501a0:283_3: pāpuṇāti; evameva dvattiṃsākārabhāvanāsampadaṃ apāpuṇanto bhāvanāvicchedena antarāyeva
atk-s0501a0:284_0: Nātisaṇikato manasikarontopi ca vikkhepappahānatopi manasi karoti. Vikkhepappahānato
atk-s0501a0:284_1: nāma yathā aññesu navakammādīsu cittaṃ na vikkhipati, tathā manasi karoti. Bahiddhā
atk-s0501a0:284_2: vikkhepamānacitto hi kesādīsveva asamāhitacetovitakko bhāvanāsampadaṃ apāpuṇitvā
atk-s0501a0:284_3: antarāva anayabyasanaṃ āpajjati takkasilāgamane bodhisattassa sahāyakā viya. Avikkhipamānacitto
atk-s0501a0:284_4: pana kesādīsveva samāhitacetovitakko bhāvanāsampadaṃ pāpuṇāti bodhisatto viya takkasilarajjasampadanti.
atk-s0501a0:284_5: Tassevaṃ vikkhepappahānato manasikaroto adhikāracariyādhimuttīnaṃ vasena te dhammā
atk-s0501a0:284_6: asubhato vā vaṇṇato vā suññato vā upaṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0501a0:285_0: Atha paṇṇattisamatikkamanato te dhamme manasi karoti. Paṇṇattisamatikkamanatoti kesā
atk-s0501a0:285_1: lomāti evamādivohāraṃ samatikkamitvā vissajjetvā yathūpaṭṭhitānaṃ asubhādīnaṃyeva
atk-s0501a0:285_2: vasena manasi karoti. Kathaṃ? Yathā araññanivāsūpagatā manussā aparicitabhūmibhāgattā
atk-s0501a0:285_3: udakaṭṭhānasañjānanatthaṃ sākhābhaṅgādinimittaṃ katvā tadanusārena gantvā udakaṃ
atk-s0501a0:285_4: paribhuñjanti, yadā pana paricitabhūmibhāgā honti, atha taṃ nimittaṃ vissajjetvā
atk-s0501a0:285_5: amanasikatvāva udakaṭṭhānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā udakaṃ paribhuñjanti, evamevāyaṃ kesā lomātiādinā
atk-s0501a0:285_6: taṃtaṃvohārassa vasena paṭhamaṃ te dhamme manasākāsi, tesu dhammesu asubhādīnaṃ aññataravasena
atk-s0501a0:285_7: upaṭṭhahantesu taṃ vohāraṃ samatikkamitvā vissajjetvā asubhāditova manasi karoti.
atk-s0501a0:286_0: Etthāha “kathaṃ panassa ete dhammā asubhādito upaṭṭhahanti, kathaṃ vaṇṇato, kathaṃ
atk-s0501a0:286_1: suññato vā, kathañcāyamete asubhato manasi karoti, kathaṃ vaṇṇato, kathaṃ suññato
atk-s0501a0:286_2: vā”ti? Kesā tāvassa vaṇṇasaṇṭhānagandhāsayokāsavasena pañcadhā asubhato upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0501a0:286_3: pañcadhā eva ayamete asubhato manasi karoti. Seyyathidaṃ – kesā nāmete vaṇṇato asubhā
atk-s0501a0:286_4: paramappaṭikūlajegucchā. Tathā hi manussā divā pānabhojane patitaṃ kesavaṇṇaṃ vākaṃ
atk-s0501a0:286_5: vā suttaṃ vā disvā kesasaññāya manoramampi pānabhojanaṃ chaḍḍenti vā jigucchanti
atk-s0501a0:286_6: vā. Saṇṭhānatopi asubhā. Tathā hi rattiṃ pānabhojane patitaṃ kesasaṇṭhānaṃ vākaṃ
atk-s0501a0:286_7: vā suttaṃ vā phusitvā kesasaññāya manoramampi pānabhojanaṃ chaḍḍenti vā jigucchanti
atk-s0501a0:286_8: vā. Gandhatopi asubhā. Tathā hi telamakkhanapupphadhūmādisaṅkhārehi virahitānaṃ kesānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:286_9: gandho paramajeguccho hoti, aggīsu pakkhittassa kesassa gandhaṃ ghāyitvā sattā nāsikaṃ
atk-s0501a0:286_10: pidhenti, mukhampi vikujjenti. Āsayatopi asubhā. Tathā hi nānāvidhena manussāsucinissandena
atk-s0501a0:286_11: saṅkāraṭṭhāne taṇḍuleyyakādīni viya pittasemhapubbalohitanissandena te ācitā vuddhiṃ
atk-s0501a0:286_12: virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ gamitāti. Okāsatopi asubhā. Tathā hi saṅkāraṭṭhāne viya taṇḍuleyyakādīni
atk-s0501a0:286_14: jātāti. Esa nayo lomādīsu. Evaṃ tāva ayamete dhamme asubhato upaṭṭhahante asubhato manasi karoti.
atk-s0501a0:287_0: Yadi panassa vaṇṇato upaṭṭhahanti, atha kesā nīlakasiṇavasena upaṭṭhahanti. Tathā
atk-s0501a0:287_1: lomā dantā odātakasiṇavasenāti. Esa nayo sabbattha. Taṃtaṃkasiṇavaseneva ayamete
atk-s0501a0:287_2: manasi karoti, evaṃ vaṇṇato upaṭṭhahante vaṇṇato manasi karoti. Yadi panassa suññato
atk-s0501a0:287_3: upaṭṭhahanti, atha kesā ghanavinibbhogavavatthānena ojaṭṭhamakasamūhavasena upaṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0501a0:287_4: Tathā lomādayo, yathā upaṭṭhahanti. Ayamete tatheva manasi karoti. Evaṃ suññato upaṭṭhahante
atk-s0501a0:288_0: Evaṃ manasikaronto ayamete dhamme anupubbamuñcanato manasi karoti. Anupubbamuñcanatoti
atk-s0501a0:288_1: asubhādīnaṃ aññataravasena upaṭṭhite kese muñcitvā lome manasikaronto seyyathāpi
atk-s0501a0:288_2: nāma jalūkā naṅguṭṭhena gahitappadese sāpekkhāva hutvā tuṇḍena aññaṃ padesaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0501a0:288_3: gahite ca tasmiṃ itaraṃ muñcati, evameva kesesu sāpekkhova hutvā lome manasi karoti,
atk-s0501a0:288_4: lomesu ca patiṭṭhite manasikāre kese muñcati. Esa nayo sabbattha. Evaṃ hissa anupubbamuñcanato
atk-s0501a0:288_5: manasikaroto asubhādīsu aññataravasena te dhammā upaṭṭhahantā anavasesato upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0501a0:289_0: Atha yassa te dhammā asubhato upaṭṭhahanti, pākaṭatarūpaṭṭhānā ca honti, tassa seyyathāpi
atk-s0501a0:289_1: nāma makkaṭo dvattiṃsatālake tālavane byādhena paripātiyamāno ekarukkhepi asaṇṭhahanto
atk-s0501a0:289_2: paridhāvitvā yadā nivatto hoti kilanto, atha ekameva ghanatālapaṇṇapariveṭhitaṃ tālasuciṃ
atk-s0501a0:289_3: nissāya tiṭṭhati; evameva cittamakkaṭo dvattiṃsakoṭṭhāsake imasmiṃ kāye teneva yoginā
atk-s0501a0:289_4: paripātiyamāno ekakoṭṭhāsakepi asaṇṭhahanto paridhāvitvā yadā anekārammaṇavidhāvane
atk-s0501a0:289_5: abhilāsābhāvena nivatto hoti kilanto. Atha yvāssa kesādīsu dhammo paguṇataro caritānurūpataro
atk-s0501a0:289_6: vā, yattha vā pubbe katādhikāro hoti, taṃ nissāya upacāravasena tiṭṭhati. Atha tameva
atk-s0501a0:289_7: nimittaṃ punappunaṃ takkāhataṃ vitakkāhataṃ karitvā yathākkamaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0501a0:290_0: Yassa pana te dhammā vaṇṇato upaṭṭhahanti, tassāpi seyyathāpi nāma makkaṭo…pe… atha
atk-s0501a0:290_1: yvāssa kesādīsu dhammo paguṇataro caritānurūpataro vā, yattha vā pubbe katādhikāro
atk-s0501a0:290_2: hoti, taṃ nissāya upacāravasena tiṭṭhati. Atha tameva nimittaṃ punappunaṃ takkāhataṃ
atk-s0501a0:290_3: vitakkāhataṃ karitvā yathākkamaṃ nīlakasiṇavasena pītakasiṇavasena vā pañcapi rūpāvacarajjhānāni
atk-s0501a0:290_4: uppādeti, tesañca yattha katthaci patiṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā ariyabhūmiṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0501a0:291_0: Yassa pana te dhammā suññato upaṭṭhahanti, so lakkhaṇato manasi karoti, lakkhaṇato
atk-s0501a0:291_1: manasikaronto tattha catudhātuvavatthānavasena upacārajjhānaṃ pāpuṇāti. Atha manasikaronto
atk-s0501a0:291_2: te dhamme aniccadukkhānattasuttattayavasena manasi karoti. Ayamassa vipassanānayo.
atk-s0501a0:291_3: So imaṃ vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā yathākkamañca paṭipajjitvā ariyabhūmiṃ pāpuṇātīti.
atk-s0501a0:292_0: Ettāvatā ca yaṃ vuttaṃ – “kathaṃ panāyaṃ anupubbādivasena ete dhamme manasi karotī”ti,
atk-s0501a0:292_1: taṃ byākataṃ hoti. Yañcāpi vuttaṃ – “bhāvanāvasena panassa evaṃ vaṇṇanā veditabbā”ti,
atk-s0501a0:294: Idāni imasmiṃyeva dvattiṃsākāre vaṇṇanāparicayapāṭavatthaṃ ayaṃ pakiṇṇakanayo veditabbo –
atk-s0501a0:297_0: Tattha nimittatoti evaṃ vuttappakāre imasmiṃ dvattiṃsākāre saṭṭhisataṃ nimittāni
atk-s0501a0:297_1: honti, yesaṃ vasena yogāvacaro dvattiṃsākāraṃ koṭṭhāsato pariggaṇhāti. Seyyathidaṃ
atk-s0501a0:297_2: – kesassa vaṇṇanimittaṃ, saṇṭhānanimittaṃ, disānimittaṃ, okāsanimittaṃ, paricchedanimittanti
atk-s0501a0:298_0: Lakkhaṇatoti dvattiṃsākāre aṭṭhavīsatisataṃ lakkhaṇāni honti, yesaṃ vasena yogāvacaro
atk-s0501a0:298_1: dvattiṃsākāraṃ lakkhaṇato manasi karoti. Seyyathidaṃ – kesassa thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0501a0:298_2: ābandhanalakkhaṇaṃ, uṇhattalakkhaṇaṃ, samudīraṇalakkhaṇanti cattāri lakkhaṇāni honti. Evaṃ lomādīsu.
atk-s0501a0:299_0: Dhātutoti dvattiṃsākāre “chadhāturo, bhikkhave, ayaṃ purisapuggalo”ti ettha vuttāsu
atk-s0501a0:299_1: dhātūsu aṭṭhavīsatisataṃ dhātuyo honti, yāsaṃ vasena yogāvacaro dvattiṃsākāraṃ dhātuto
atk-s0501a0:299_2: pariggaṇhāti. Seyyathidaṃ – yā kese thaddhatā, sā pathavīdhātu; yā ābandhanatā, sā
atk-s0501a0:299_3: āpodhātu; yā paripācanatā, sā tejodhātu; yā vitthambhanatā, sā vāyodhātūti catasso
atk-s0501a0:300_0: Suññatoti dvattiṃsākāre aṭṭhavīsatisataṃ suññatā honti, yāsaṃ vasena yogāvacaro dvattiṃsākāraṃ
atk-s0501a0:300_1: suññato vipassati. Seyyathidaṃ – kese tāva pathavīdhātu āpodhātvādīhi suññā, tathā
atk-s0501a0:300_2: āpodhātvādayo pathavīdhātvādīhīti catasso suññatā honti. Evaṃ lomādīsu.
atk-s0501a0:301_0: Khandhāditoti dvattiṃsākāre kesādīsu khandhādivasena saṅgayhamānesu “kesā kati khandhā
atk-s0501a0:301_1: honti, kati āyatanāni, kati dhātuyo, kati saccāni, kati satipaṭṭhānānī”ti evamādinā
atk-s0501a0:301_2: nayena vinicchayo veditabbo. Evañcassa vijānato tiṇakaṭṭhasamūho viya kāyo khāyati. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a0:306: Amānusī rati hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato”ti. –
atk-s0501a0:307: Evaṃ amānusī rati vuttā, sā adūratarā hoti. Tato yaṃ taṃ –
atk-s0501a0:310: Evaṃ vipassanāmayaṃ pītipāmojjāmataṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ anubhavanto na cireneva ariyajanasevitaṃ ajarāmaraṃ nibbānāmataṃ sacchikarotīti.
atk-s0501a0:315: Idāni ekaṃ nāma kinti evamādīnaṃ kumārapañhānaṃ atthavaṇṇanākkamo anuppatto. Tesaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ idha nikkhepappayojanañca vatvā vaṇṇanaṃ karissāma –
atk-s0501a0:316_0: Aṭṭhuppatti tāva nesaṃ sopāko nāma bhagavato mahāsāvako ahosi. Tenāyasmatā jātiyā
atk-s0501a0:316_1: sattavasseneva aññā ārādhitā, tassa bhagavā pañhabyākaraṇena upasampadaṃ anuññātukāmo
atk-s0501a0:316_2: attanā adhippetatthānaṃ pañhānaṃ byākaraṇasamatthataṃ passanto “ekaṃ nāma ki”nti
atk-s0501a0:316_3: evamādinā pañhe pucchi. So byākāsi. Tena ca byākaraṇena bhagavato cittaṃ ārādhesi.
atk-s0501a0:319_0: Yasmā pana saraṇagamanehi buddhadhammasaṅghānussativasena cittabhāvanā, sikkhāpadehi
atk-s0501a0:319_1: sīlabhāvanā, dvattiṃsākārena ca kāyabhāvanā pakāsitā, tasmā idāni nānappakārato paññābhāvanāmukhadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0501a0:319_2: ime pañhabyākaraṇā idha nikkhittā. Yasmā vā sīlapadaṭṭhāno samādhi, samādhipadaṭṭhānā
atk-s0501a0:319_3: ca paññā; yathāha – “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvaya”nti, tasmā
atk-s0501a0:319_4: sikkhāpadehi sīlaṃ dvattiṃsākārena taṃgocaraṃ samādhiñca dassetvā samāhitacittassa
atk-s0501a0:319_5: nānādhammaparikkhārāya paññāya pabhedadassanatthaṃ idha nikkhittātipi viññātabbā.
atk-s0501a0:323_0: Idāni tesaṃ atthavaṇṇanā hoti – ekaṃ nāma kinti bhagavā yasmiṃ ekadhammasmiṃ bhikkhu
atk-s0501a0:323_1: sammā nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti, yasmiṃ cāyamāyasmā nibbindamāno
atk-s0501a0:323_2: anupubbena dukkhassantamakāsi, taṃ dhammaṃ sandhāya pañhaṃ pucchati. “Sabbe sattā
atk-s0501a0:323_3: āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti thero puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya vissajjeti. “Katamā ca, bhikkhave,
atk-s0501a0:323_4: sammāsati? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”ti evamādīni cettha
atk-s0501a0:323_5: suttāni evaṃ vissajjanayuttisambhave sādhakāni. Ettha yenāhārena sabbe sattā “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti
atk-s0501a0:323_6: vuccanti, so āhāro taṃ vā nesaṃ āhāraṭṭhitikattaṃ “ekaṃ nāma ki”nti puṭṭhena therena
atk-s0501a0:323_7: niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ. Tañhi bhagavatā idha ekanti adhippetaṃ, na tu sāsane loke
atk-s0501a0:323_8: vā aññaṃ ekaṃ nāma natthīti ñāpetuṃ vuttaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0501a0:324_0: “Ekadhamme, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno sammā virajjamāno sammā vimuccamāno
atk-s0501a0:324_1: sammā pariyantadassāvī sammattaṃ abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a0:324_2: Katamasmiṃ ekadhamme? Sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā. Imasmiṃ kho, bhikkhave, ekadhamme
atk-s0501a0:324_3: bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Eko pañho eko uddeso ekaṃ
atk-s0501a0:324_4: veyyākaraṇa’nti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vutta”nti.
atk-s0501a0:325_0: Āhāraṭṭhitikāti cettha yathā “atthi, bhikkhave, subhanimittaṃ. Tattha ayoniso manasikārabahulīkāro,
atk-s0501a0:325_1: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāyā”ti evamādīsu paccayo āhāroti vuccati,
atk-s0501a0:325_2: evaṃ paccayaṃ āhārasaddena gahetvā paccayaṭṭhitikā “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti vuttā. Cattāro
atk-s0501a0:325_3: pana āhāre sandhāya – “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti vuccamāne “asaññasattā devā ahetukā anāhārā
atk-s0501a0:326_0: Tattha siyā – evampi vuccamāne “katame dhammā sapaccayā? Pañcakkhandhā – rūpakkhandho…pe…
atk-s0501a0:326_1: viññāṇakkhandho”ti vacanato khandhānaṃyeva paccayaṭṭhitikattaṃ yuttaṃ, sattānantu
atk-s0501a0:326_2: ayuttamevetaṃ vacanaṃ bhaveyyāti. Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kasmā? Sattesu
atk-s0501a0:326_3: khandhopacārasiddhito. Sattesu hi khandhopacāro siddho. Kasmā? Khandhe upādāya paññāpetabbato.
atk-s0501a0:326_4: Kathaṃ? Gehe gāmopacāro viya. Seyyathāpi hi gehāni upādāya paññāpetabbattā gāmassa
atk-s0501a0:326_5: ekasmimpi dvīsu tīsupi vā gehesu daḍḍhesu “gāmo daḍḍho”ti evaṃ gehe gāmopacāro siddho,
atk-s0501a0:326_6: evameva khandhesu paccayaṭṭhena āhāraṭṭhitikesu “sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti ayaṃ upacāro
atk-s0501a0:326_7: siddhoti veditabbo. Paramatthato ca khandhesu jāyamānesu jīyamānesu mīyamānesu ca
atk-s0501a0:326_8: “khaṇe khaṇe tvaṃ bhikkhu jāyase ca jīyase ca mīyase cā”ti vadatā bhagavatā tesu
atk-s0501a0:326_9: sattesu khandhopacāro siddhoti dassito evāti veditabbo. Yato yena paccayākhyena āhārena
atk-s0501a0:326_10: sabbe sattā tiṭṭhanti, so āhāro taṃ vā nesaṃ āhāraṭṭhitikattaṃ ekanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:326_11: Āhāro hi āhāraṭṭhitikattaṃ vā aniccatākāraṇato nibbidāṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Atha tesu sabbasattasaññitesu
atk-s0501a0:326_12: saṅkhāresu aniccatādassanena nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti, paramatthavisuddhiṃ pāpuṇāti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a0:328: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā”ti. ;
atk-s0501a0:329_0: Ettha ca “ekaṃ nāma ki”nti ca “kihā”ti ca duvidho pāṭho, tattha sīhaḷānaṃ kihāti
atk-s0501a0:329_1: pāṭho. Te hi “ki”nti vattabbe “kihā”ti vadanti. Keci bhaṇanti “ha-iti nipāto, theriyānampi
atk-s0501a0:329_2: ayameva pāṭho”ti ubhayathāpi pana ekova attho. Yathā ruccati, tathā paṭhitabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:329_3: Yathā pana “sukhena phuṭṭho atha vā dukhena, dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedetī”ti
atk-s0501a0:329_4: evamādīsu katthaci dukhanti ca katthaci dukkhanti ca vuccati, evaṃ katthaci ekanti,
atk-s0501a0:329_5: katthaci ekkanti vuccati. Idha pana ekaṃ nāmāti ayameva pāṭho.
atk-s0501a0:331_0: Evaṃ iminā pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati
atk-s0501a0:331_1: dve nāma kinti? Thero dveti paccanubhāsitvā “nāmañca rūpañcā”ti dhammādhiṭṭhānāya
atk-s0501a0:331_2: desanāya vissajjeti. Tattha ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ namanato, cittassa ca natihetuto sabbampi
atk-s0501a0:331_3: arūpaṃ “nāma”nti vuccati. Idha pana nibbidāhetuttā sāsavadhammameva adhippetaṃ ruppanaṭṭhena
atk-s0501a0:331_4: cattāro ca mahābhūtā, sabbañca tadupādāya pavattamānaṃ rūpaṃ “rūpa”nti vuccati, taṃ
atk-s0501a0:331_5: sabbampi idhādhippetaṃ. Adhippāyavaseneva cettha “dve nāma nāmañca rūpañcā”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0501a0:332_0: “Dvīsu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a0:332_1: Katamesu dvīsu? Nāme ca rūpe ca. Imesu kho, bhikkhave, dvīsu dhammesu bhikkhu sammā
atk-s0501a0:332_2: nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Dve pañhā, dve uddesā, dve veyyākaraṇānī’ti
atk-s0501a0:332_3: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vutta”nti.
atk-s0501a0:333: Ettha ca nāmarūpamattadassanena attadiṭṭhiṃ pahāya anattānupassanāmukheneva nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti, paramatthavisuddhiṃ pāpuṇātīti veditabbo. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a0:335: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā”ti. ;
atk-s0501a0:337_0: Idāni imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṃ pañhaṃ
atk-s0501a0:337_1: pucchati tīṇi nāma kinti? Thero tīṇīti paccanubhāsitvā puna byākaritabbassa atthassa
atk-s0501a0:337_2: liṅgānurūpaṃ saṅkhyaṃ dassento “tisso vedanā”ti vissajjeti. Atha vā “yā bhagavatā
atk-s0501a0:337_3: ‘tisso vedanā’ti vuttā, imāsamatthamahaṃ tīṇīti paccemī”ti dassento āhāti evampettha
atk-s0501a0:337_4: attho veditabbo. Anekamukhā hi desanā paṭisambhidāpabhedena desanāvilāsappattānaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:337_5: Keci panāhu “tīṇīti adhikapadamida”nti. Purimanayeneva cettha “tisso vedanā”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0501a0:338_0: “Tīsu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a0:338_1: Katamesu tīsu? Tīsu vedanāsu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave, tīsu dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe…
atk-s0501a0:338_2: dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Tayo pañhā, tayo uddesā, tīṇi veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṃ taṃ
atk-s0501a0:339: Ettha ca “yaṃkiñci vedayitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhasminti vadāmī”ti vuttasuttānusārena vā. –
atk-s0501a0:342_1: dukkhabhāvadassanena sukhasaññaṃ pahāya dukkhānupassanāmukhena nibbindamāno anupubbena
atk-s0501a0:342_2: dukkhassantakaro hoti, paramatthavisuddhiṃ pāpuṇātīti veditabbo. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a0:344: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā”ti. ;
atk-s0501a0:346_0: Evaṃ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati
atk-s0501a0:346_1: cattāri nāma kinti? Tattha imassa pañhassa byākaraṇapakkhe katthaci purimanayeneva
atk-s0501a0:347_0: “Catūsu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a0:347_1: Katamesu catūsu? Catūsu āhāresu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave, catūsu dhammesu bhikkhu sammā
atk-s0501a0:347_2: nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Cattāro pañhā cattāro uddesā cattāri veyyākaraṇānī’ti
atk-s0501a0:347_3: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vutta”nti.
atk-s0501a0:348: Katthaci yesu subhāvitacitto anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti, tāni cattāri satipaṭṭhānāni. Yathāha kajaṅgalā bhikkhunī –
atk-s0501a0:349_0: “Catūsu, āvuso, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā subhāvitacitto sammā pariyantadassāvī sammattaṃ
atk-s0501a0:349_1: abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. Katamesu catūsu? Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu.
atk-s0501a0:349_2: Imesu kho, āvuso, catūsu dhammesu bhikkhu sammā subhāvitacitto…pe… dukkhassantakaro
atk-s0501a0:349_3: hoti. ‘Cattāro pañhā cattāro uddesā cattāri veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā,
atk-s0501a0:350_0: Idha pana yesaṃ catunnaṃ anubodhappaṭivedhato bhavataṇhāchedo hoti, yasmā tāni cattāri
atk-s0501a0:350_1: ariyasaccāni adhippetāni. Yasmā vā iminā pariyāyena byākataṃ subyākatameva hoti,
atk-s0501a0:350_2: tasmā thero cattārīti paccanubhāsitvā “ariyasaccānī”ti vissajjeti. Tattha cattārīti
atk-s0501a0:350_3: gaṇanaparicchedo. Ariyasaccānīti ariyāni saccāni, avitathāni avisaṃvādakānīti attho. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a0:351: “Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri ariyasaccāni tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti.
atk-s0501a0:352_0: Yasmā vā sadevakena lokena araṇīyato abhigamanīyatoti vuttaṃ hoti, vāyamitabbaṭṭhānasaññite
atk-s0501a0:352_1: aye vā iriyanato, anaye vā na iriyanato, sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyaariyadhammasamāyogato
atk-s0501a0:352_2: vā ariyasammatā buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakā etāni paṭivijjhanti, tasmāpi “ariyasaccānī”ti vuccanti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a0:353: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, ariyasaccāni…pe… imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri ariyasaccāni, ariyā imāni paṭivijjhanti, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti.
atk-s0501a0:354: Apica ariyassa bhagavato saccānītipi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a0:355: “Sadevake, bhikkhave…pe… sadevamanussāya tathāgato ariyo, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti.
atk-s0501a0:356: Atha vā etesaṃ abhisambuddhattā ariyabhāvasiddhitopi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a0:357: “Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddhoti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0501a0:358: Ayametesaṃ padattho. Etesaṃ pana ariyasaccānaṃ anubodhappaṭivedhato bhavataṇhāchedo hoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a0:359_0: “Tayidaṃ, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ anubuddhaṃ paṭividdhaṃ…pe… dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadā
atk-s0501a0:359_1: ariyasaccaṃ anubuddhaṃ paṭividdhaṃ, ucchinnā bhavataṇhā, khīṇā bhavanetti, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti.
atk-s0501a0:361_0: Imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati
atk-s0501a0:361_1: pañca nāma kinti? Thero pañcāti paccanubhāsitvā “upādānakkhandhā”ti vissajjeti. Tattha
atk-s0501a0:361_2: pañcāti gaṇanaparicchedo. Upādānajanitā upādānajanakā vā khandhā upādānakkhandhā.
atk-s0501a0:361_3: Yaṃkiñci rūpaṃ, vedanā, saññā, saṅkhārā, viññāṇañca sāsavā upādāniyā, etesametaṃ
atk-s0501a0:361_4: adhivacanaṃ. Pubbanayeneva cettha “pañcupādānakkhandhā”ti vuttaṃ, na aññesaṃ pañcannamabhāvato. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a0:362_0: “Pañcasu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a0:362_1: Katamesu pañcasu? Pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave, pañcasu dhammesu
atk-s0501a0:362_2: bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Pañca pañhā, pañca uddesā,
atk-s0501a0:362_3: pañca veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vutta”nti.
atk-s0501a0:363: Ettha ca pañcakkhandhe udayabbayavasena sammasanto vipassanāmataṃ laddhā anupubbena nibbānāmataṃ sacchikaroti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a0:367_0: Evaṃ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati
atk-s0501a0:367_1: “cha nāma ki”nti? Thero chaiti paccanubhāsitvā ‘ajjhattikāni āyatanānī’ti vissajjeti.
atk-s0501a0:367_2: Tattha chaiti gaṇanaparicchedo, ajjhatte niyuttāni, attānaṃ vā adhikatvā pavattāni
atk-s0501a0:367_3: ajjhattikāni. Āyatanato, āyassa vā tananato, āyatassa vā saṃsāradukkhassa nayanato
atk-s0501a0:367_5: ajjhattikāni āyatanānī”ti vuttaṃ, na aññesaṃ channamabhāvato. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a0:368_0: “Chasu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a0:368_1: Katamesu chasu? Chasu ajjhattikesu āyatanesu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave, chasu dhammesu
atk-s0501a0:368_2: bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Cha pañhā cha uddesā cha veyyākaraṇānī’ti
atk-s0501a0:368_3: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vutta”nti.
atk-s0501a0:369_0: Ettha ca cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni, “suñño gāmoti kho, bhikkhave, channetaṃ ajjhattikānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:369_1: āyatanānaṃ adhivacana”nti vacanato suññato pubbuḷakamarīcikādīni viya aciraṭṭhitikato
atk-s0501a0:369_2: tucchato vañcanato ca samanupassaṃ nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantaṃ katvā maccurājassa
atk-s0501a0:371: Evaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantaṃ, maccurājā na passatī”ti. ;
atk-s0501a0:373_0: Imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati satta nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a0:373_1: Thero kiñcāpi mahāpañhabyākaraṇe satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo vuttā, apica kho pana yesu
atk-s0501a0:373_2: dhammesu subhāvitacitto bhikkhu dukkhassantakaro hoti, te dassento “satta bojjhaṅgā”ti
atk-s0501a0:373_3: vissajjeti. Ayampi cattho bhagavatā anumato eva. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a0:374_0: “Paṇḍitā gahapatayo kajaṅgalikā bhikkhunī, mahāpaññā gahapatayo kajaṅgalikā bhikkhunī,
atk-s0501a0:374_1: mañcepi tumhe gahapatayo upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyātha, ahampi cetaṃ
atk-s0501a0:374_2: evameva byākareyyaṃ, yathā taṃ kajaṅgalikāya bhikkhuniyā byākata”nti.
atk-s0501a0:376_0: “Sattasu, āvuso, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā subhāvitacitto…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a0:376_1: Katamesu sattasu? Sattasu bojjhaṅgesu. Imesu kho, āvuso, sattasu dhammesu bhikkhu
atk-s0501a0:376_2: sammā subhāvitacitto…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Satta pañhā satta uddesā satta veyyākaraṇānī’ti
atk-s0501a0:376_3: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā, idametaṃ paṭicca vutta”nti.
atk-s0501a0:378_0: Tattha sattāti ūnādhikanivāraṇagaṇanaparicchedo. Bojjhaṅgāti satiādīnaṃ dhammānametaṃ
atk-s0501a0:378_1: adhivacanaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ padattho – etāya lokiyalokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppajjamānāya līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanakāmasukhattakilamathānuyogaucchedasassatābhinivesādi-
atk-s0501a0:378_3: dhammasāmaggiyā ariyasāvako bujjhatīti katvā bodhi, kilesasantānaniddāya uṭṭhahati,
atk-s0501a0:378_4: cattāri vā ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhati, nibbānameva vā sacchikarotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a0:378_5: Yathāha – “satta bojjhaṅge bhāvetvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho”ti. Yathāvuttappakārāya
atk-s0501a0:378_6: vā etāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvakopi bodhi. Iti tassā dhammasāmaggisaṅkhātāya
atk-s0501a0:378_7: bodhiyā aṅgabhūtattā bojjhaṅgā jhānaṅgamaggaṅgāni viya, tassa vā bodhīti laddhavohārassa
atk-s0501a0:379_0: Apica “bojjhaṅgāti kenaṭṭhena bojjhaṅgā? Bodhāya saṃvattantīti bojjhaṅgā, bujjhantīti
atk-s0501a0:379_1: bojjhaṅgā, anubujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, paṭibujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, sambujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā”ti
atk-s0501a0:379_2: imināpi paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttena vidhinā bojjhaṅgānaṃ bojjhaṅgaṭṭho veditabbo. Evamime
atk-s0501a0:379_3: satta bojjhaṅge bhāvento bahulīkaronto na cirasseva ekantanibbidādiguṇapaṭilābhī
atk-s0501a0:379_4: hoti, tena diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotīti vuccati. Vuttañcetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0501a0:380: “Sattime, bhikkhave, bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
atk-s0501a0:382_0: Evaṃ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati aṭṭha nāma
atk-s0501a0:382_1: kinti? Thero kiñcāpi mahāpañhabyākaraṇe aṭṭha lokadhammā vuttā, apica kho pana yesu
atk-s0501a0:382_2: dhammesu subhāvitacitto bhikkhu dukkhassantakaro hoti, te dassento “ariyāni aṭṭha
atk-s0501a0:382_3: maggaṅgānī”ti avatvā yasmā aṭṭhaṅgavinimutto maggo nāma natthi, aṭṭhaṅgamattameva
atk-s0501a0:382_4: tu maggo, tasmā tamatthaṃ sādhento desanāvilāsena ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti vissajjeti.
atk-s0501a0:382_5: Bhagavatāpi cāyamattho desanānayo ca anumato eva. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a0:383: “Paṇḍitā gahapatayo kajaṅgalikā bhikkhunī…pe… ahampi evameva byākareyyaṃ, yathā taṃ kajaṅgalikāya bhikkhuniyā byākata”nti.
atk-s0501a0:385_0: “Aṭṭhasu, āvuso, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā subhāvitacitto…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a0:385_1: ‘Aṭṭha pañhā, aṭṭha uddesā, aṭṭha veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā,
atk-s0501a0:386: Evamayaṃ attho ca desanānayo ca bhagavatā anumato evāti veditabbo.
atk-s0501a0:387_0: Tattha ariyoti nibbānatthikehi abhigantabbo, apica ārakā kilesehi vattanato, ariyabhāvakaraṇato,
atk-s0501a0:387_1: ariyaphalapaṭilābhato cāpi ariyoti veditabbo. Aṭṭha aṅgāni assāti aṭṭhaṅgiko. Svāyaṃ
atk-s0501a0:387_2: caturaṅgikā viya senā, pañcaṅgikaṃ viya ca tūriyaṃ aṅgavinibbhogena anupalabbhasabhāvato
atk-s0501a0:387_3: aṅgamattamevāti veditabbo. Maggati iminā nibbānaṃ, sayaṃ vā maggati, kilese mārento
atk-s0501a0:388_0: Evamaṭṭhappabhedañcimaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvento bhikkhu avijjaṃ bhindati, vijjaṃ
atk-s0501a0:388_1: uppādeti, nibbānaṃ sacchikaroti, tena diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotīti vuccati. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0501a0:389_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, sālisūkaṃ vā yavasūkaṃ vā sammā paṇihitaṃ hatthena vā pādena
atk-s0501a0:389_1: vā akkantaṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā bhecchati, lohitaṃ vā uppādessatīti ṭhānametaṃ vijjati.
atk-s0501a0:389_2: Taṃ kissa hetu? Sammā paṇihitattā, bhikkhave, sūkassa, evameva kho, bhikkhave, so
atk-s0501a0:389_3: vata bhikkhu sammā paṇihitāya diṭṭhiyā sammā paṇihitāya maggabhāvanāya avijjaṃ bhecchati,
atk-s0501a0:389_4: vijjaṃ uppādessati, nibbānaṃ sacchikarissatīti ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
atk-s0501a0:391_0: Imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati nava nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a0:391_1: Thero navaiti paccanubhāsitvā “sattāvāsā”ti vissajjeti. Tattha navāti gaṇanaparicchedo.
atk-s0501a0:391_2: Sattāti jīvitindriyappaṭibaddhe khandhe upādāya paññattā pāṇino paṇṇatti vā. Āvāsāti
atk-s0501a0:391_3: āvasanti etesūti āvāsā, sattānaṃ āvāsā sattāvāsā. Esa desanāmaggo, atthato pana navavidhānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:392_0: “Santāvuso, sattā nānattakāyā nānattasaññino, seyyathāpi manussā ekacce ca devā ekacce
atk-s0501a0:392_1: ca vinipātikā, ayaṃ paṭhamo sattāvāso. Santāvuso, sattā nānattakāyā ekattasaññino,
atk-s0501a0:392_2: seyyathāpi, devā brahmakāyikā, paṭhamābhinibbattā, ayaṃ dutiyo sattāvāso. Santāvuso,
atk-s0501a0:392_3: sattā ekattakāyā nānattasaññino, seyyathāpi, devā ābhassarā, ayaṃ tatiyo sattāvāso.
atk-s0501a0:392_4: Santāvuso, sattā ekattakāyā ekattasaññino, seyyathāpi, devā subhakiṇhā, ayaṃ catuttho
atk-s0501a0:392_5: sattāvāso. Santāvuso, sattā asaññino appaṭisaṃvedino, seyyathāpi, devā asaññasattā,
atk-s0501a0:392_6: ayaṃ pañcamo sattāvāso. Santāvuso, sattā sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ…pe… ākāsānañcāyatanūpagā,
atk-s0501a0:392_7: ayaṃ chaṭṭho sattāvāso. Santāvuso, sattā…pe… viññāṇañcāyatanūpagā, ayaṃ sattamo sattāvāso.
atk-s0501a0:392_8: Santāvuso, sattā…pe… ākiñcaññāyatanūpagā, ayaṃ aṭṭhamo sattāvāso. Santāvuso, sattā…pe…
atk-s0501a0:393: Purimanayeneva cettha “nava sattāvāsā”ti vuttaṃ, na aññesaṃ navannamabhāvato. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a0:394_0: “Navasu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a0:394_1: Katamesu navasu? Navasu sattāvāsesu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave, navasu dhammesu bhikkhu
atk-s0501a0:394_2: sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Nava pañhā, nava uddesā, nava veyyākaraṇānī’ti
atk-s0501a0:394_3: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vutta”nti.
atk-s0501a0:395_0: Ettha ca “nava dhammā pariññeyyā. Katame nava? Nava sattāvāsā”ti vacanato navasu
atk-s0501a0:395_2: nibbindamāno tīraṇapariññāya aniccānupassanena virajjamāno dukkhānupassanena vimuccamāno
atk-s0501a0:395_3: anattānupassanena sammā pariyantadassāvī pahānapariññāya sammattamabhisamecca diṭṭheva
atk-s0501a0:396: “Navasu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. Katamesu navasu? Navasu sattāvāsesū”ti.
atk-s0501a0:398_0: Evaṃ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati dasa nāma
atk-s0501a0:398_1: kinti? Tattha kiñcāpi imassa pañhassa ito aññatra veyyākaraṇesu dasa akusalakammapathā vuttā. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a0:399_0: “Dasasu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a0:399_1: Katamesu dasasu? Dasasu akusalakammapathesu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave, dasasu dhammesu
atk-s0501a0:399_2: bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe. … dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Dasa pañhā dasa uddesā dasa
atk-s0501a0:399_3: veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vutta”nti.
atk-s0501a0:400_0: Idha pana yasmā ayamāyasmā attānaṃ anupanetvā aññaṃ byākātukāmo, yasmā vā iminā pariyāyena
atk-s0501a0:400_1: byākataṃ subyākatameva hoti, tasmā yehi dasahi aṅgehi samannāgato arahāti pavuccati,
atk-s0501a0:400_2: tesaṃ adhigamaṃ dīpento dasahaṅgehi samannāgato arahāti pavuccatīti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya
atk-s0501a0:400_3: desanāya vissajjeti. Yato ettha yehi dasahi aṅgehi samannāgato arahāti pavuccati,
atk-s0501a0:400_4: tāni dasaṅgāni “dasa nāma ki”nti puṭṭhena therena niddiṭṭhānīti veditabbāni. Tāni ca dasa –
atk-s0501a0:401_0: “Asekho asekhoti, bhante, vuccati, kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu asekho hotīti?
atk-s0501a0:401_1: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asekhāya sammādiṭṭhiyā samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammāsaṅkappena
atk-s0501a0:401_2: samannāgato hoti, asekhāya sammāvācāya samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammākammantena
atk-s0501a0:401_3: samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammāājīvena samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammāvāyāmena
atk-s0501a0:401_4: samannāgato hoti, asekhāya sammāsatiyā samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammāsamādhinā
atk-s0501a0:401_5: samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammāñāṇena samannāgato hoti, asekhāya sammāvimuttiyā
atk-s0501a0:401_6: samannāgato hoti. Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asekho hotī”ti. –
atk-s0501a0:407_0: Idāni kumārapañhānantaraṃ nikkhittassa maṅgalasuttassa atthavaṇṇanākkamo anuppatto,
atk-s0501a0:407_1: tassa idha nikkhepappayojanaṃ vatvā atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma. Seyyathidaṃ – idañhi
atk-s0501a0:407_2: suttaṃ iminā anukkamena bhagavatā avuttampi yvāyaṃ saraṇagamanehi sāsanotāro, sikkhāpadadvattiṃsākārakumārapañhehi
atk-s0501a0:407_3: ca sīlasamādhipaññāppabhedanayo dassito, sabbopesa paramamaṅgalabhūto, yato maṅgalatthikena
atk-s0501a0:407_4: ettheva abhiyogo kātabbo, so cassa maṅgalabhāvo iminā suttānusārena veditabboti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:410: Evaṃ nikkhittassa panassa atthavaṇṇanatthaṃ ayaṃ mātikā –
atk-s0501a0:411: “Vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmā, cetaṃ vatvā imaṃ vidhiṃ;
atk-s0501a0:415_0: Tattha “vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmā, cetaṃ vatvā imaṃ vidhi”nti ayaṃ tāva addhagāthā yadidaṃ
atk-s0501a0:415_1: “evaṃ me sutaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā…pe… bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsī”ti, idaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0501a0:415_2: sandhāya vuttā. Idañhi anussavavasena vuttaṃ, so ca bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako,
atk-s0501a0:415_3: tasmā nedaṃ tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa. Yato vattabbametaṃ
atk-s0501a0:415_4: “idaṃ vacanaṃ kena vuttaṃ, kadā, kasmā ca vutta”nti. Vuccate – āyasmatā ānandena
atk-s0501a0:416_0: Paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti cesā sabbasuttanidānakosallatthamādito pabhuti evaṃ veditabbā.
atk-s0501a0:416_1: Dhammacakkappavattanañhi ādiṃ katvā yāva subhaddaparibbājakavinayanā, katabuddhakicce
atk-s0501a0:416_2: kusinārāyaṃ upavattane mallānaṃ sālavane yamakasālānamantare visākhapuṇṇamadivase
atk-s0501a0:416_3: paccūsasamaye anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbute, bhagavati lokanāthe bhagavato
atk-s0501a0:416_4: parinibbāne sannipatitānaṃ sattannaṃ bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ saṅghatthero āyasmā mahākassapo
atk-s0501a0:416_5: sattāhaparinibbute bhagavati subhaddena vuḍḍhapabbajitena “alaṃ, āvuso, mā socittha,
atk-s0501a0:416_6: mā paridevittha, sumuttā mayaṃ tena mahāsamaṇena, upaddutā ca homa ‘idaṃ vo kappati
atk-s0501a0:416_7: idaṃ vo na kappatī’ti, idāni pana mayaṃ yaṃ icchissāma taṃ karissāma, yaṃ na icchissāma
atk-s0501a0:416_8: na taṃ karissāmā”ti vuttavacanamanussaranto “ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati yaṃ pāpabhikkhū
atk-s0501a0:416_9: ‘atītasatthukaṃ pāvacana’nti maññamānā pakkhaṃ labhitvā na cirasseva saddhammaṃ antaradhāpeyyuṃ.
atk-s0501a0:416_10: Yāva ca dhammavinayo tiṭṭhati, tāva anatītasatthukameva pāvacanaṃ hoti. Yathāha bhagavā –
atk-s0501a0:417: “Yo vo, ānanda, mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto, so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti.
atk-s0501a0:418: “Yaṃnūnāhaṃ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyaṃ, yathayidaṃ sāsanaṃ addhaniyaṃ assa ciraṭṭhitikaṃ”.
atk-s0501a0:420: “Dhāressasi pana me tvaṃ, kassapa, sāṇāni paṃsukūlāni nibbasanānī”ti vatvā cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogena ceva –
atk-s0501a0:421_0: “Ahaṃ, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhāmi vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
atk-s0501a0:421_1: viharāmi, kassapopi, bhikkhave, yāvadeva ākaṅkhati vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0501a0:422_1: samasamaṭṭhapanena ca anuggahito, tassa me kimaññaṃ āṇaṇyaṃ bhavissati? “Nanu maṃ
atk-s0501a0:422_2: bhagavā rājā viya sakakavacaissariyānuppadānena attano kulavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpakaṃ puttaṃ
atk-s0501a0:422_3: ‘saddhammavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpako me ayaṃ bhavissatī’ti mantvā iminā asādhāraṇena anuggahena
atk-s0501a0:422_4: anuggahesī”ti cintayanto dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhaṃ janesi? Yathāha –
atk-s0501a0:423_0: “Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo bhikkhū āmantesi – ekamidāhaṃ, āvuso, samayaṃ pāvāya
atk-s0501a0:423_1: kusināraṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehī”ti
atk-s0501a0:425_0: “Handa mayaṃ, āvuso, dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyāma, pure adhammo dippati, dhammo
atk-s0501a0:425_1: paṭibāhiyyati, avinayo dippati, vinayo paṭibāhiyyati, pure adhammavādino balavanto
atk-s0501a0:425_2: honti, dhammavādino dubbalā honti, avinayavādino balavanto honti, vinayavādino dubbalā hontī”ti.
atk-s0501a0:426_0: Bhikkhū āhaṃsu “tena hi, bhante, thero bhikkhū uccinatū”ti. Thero sakalanavaṅgasatthusāsanapariyattidhare
atk-s0501a0:426_2: ca vajjetvā tipiṭakasabbapariyattippabhedadhare paṭisambhidāppatte mahānubhāve yebhuyyena
atk-s0501a0:426_3: bhagavatā etadaggaṃ āropite tevijjādibhede khīṇāsavabhikkhūyeva ekūnapañcasate pariggahesi.
atk-s0501a0:426_4: Ye sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo ekenūnapañcaarahantasatāni uccinī”ti.
atk-s0501a0:427_0: Kissa pana thero ekenūnamakāsīti? Āyasmato ānandattherassa okāsakaraṇatthaṃ. Tena
atk-s0501a0:427_1: hāyasmatā sahāpi vināpi na sakkā dhammasaṅgīti kātuṃ. So hāyasmā sekho sakaraṇīyo,
atk-s0501a0:427_2: tasmā saha na sakkā, yasmā panassa kiñci dasabaladesitaṃ suttageyyādikaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0501a0:427_3: asammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā vināpi na sakkā. Yadi evaṃ sekhopi samāno
atk-s0501a0:427_4: dhammasaṅgītiyā bahūkārattā therena uccinitabbo assa, atha kasmā na uccinitoti? Parūpavādavivajjanato.
atk-s0501a0:427_5: Thero hi āyasmante ānande ativiya vissattho ahosi. Tathā hi naṃ sirasmiṃ palitesu
atk-s0501a0:427_6: jātesupi “na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”ti kumārakavādena ovadati. Sakyakulappasuto
atk-s0501a0:427_7: cāyaṃ āyasmā tathāgatassa bhātā cūḷapitu putto, tatra bhikkhū chandāgamanaṃ viya
atk-s0501a0:427_8: maññamānā “bahū asekhapaṭisambhidāppatte bhikkhū ṭhapetvā ānandaṃ sekhapaṭisambhidāppattaṃ
atk-s0501a0:427_9: thero uccinī”ti upavadeyyuṃ. Taṃ parūpavādaṃ parivivajjento “ānandaṃ vinā saṅgīti
atk-s0501a0:427_10: na sakkā kātuṃ, bhikkhūnaṃyeva anumatiyā gahessāmī”ti na uccini.
atk-s0501a0:428: Atha sayameva bhikkhū ānandassatthāya theraṃ yāciṃsu. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a0:429_0: “Bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ mahākassapaṃ etadavocuṃ – ‘ayaṃ, bhante, āyasmā ānando kiñcāpi
atk-s0501a0:429_1: sekho, abhabbo chandā dosā mohā bhayā agatiṃ gantuṃ, bahu cānena bhagavato santike
atk-s0501a0:429_2: dhammo ca vinayo ca pariyatto, tena hi, bhante, thero āyasmantampi ānandaṃ uccinatū’ti.
atk-s0501a0:429_3: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantampi ānandaṃ uccinī”ti.
atk-s0501a0:430: Evaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anumatiyā uccinitena tenāyasmatā saddhiṃ pañcatherasatāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0501a0:431_0: Atha kho therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi – “kattha nu kho mayaṃ dhammañca vinayañca
atk-s0501a0:431_1: saṅgāyeyyāmā”ti. Atha kho therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi “rājagahaṃ kho mahāgocaraṃ
atk-s0501a0:431_2: pahūtasenāsanaṃ, yaṃnūna mayaṃ rājagahe vassaṃ vasantā dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyāma,
atk-s0501a0:431_3: naññe bhikkhū rājagahe vassaṃ upagaccheyyu”nti. Kasmā pana nesaṃ etadahosi? Idaṃ
atk-s0501a0:431_4: amhākaṃ thāvarakammaṃ, koci visabhāgapuggalo saṅghamajjhaṃ pavisitvā ukkoṭeyyāti.
atk-s0501a0:431_5: Athāyasmā mahākassapo ñattidutiyena kammena sāvesi. Taṃ saṅgītikkhandhake vuttanayeneva ñātabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:432_0: Atha tathāgatassa parinibbānato sattasu sādhukīḷanadivasesu sattasu ca dhātupūjādivasesu
atk-s0501a0:432_1: vītivattesu “aḍḍhamāso atikkanto, idāni gimhānaṃ diyaḍḍho māso seso, upakaṭṭhā vassūpanāyikā”ti
atk-s0501a0:432_2: mantvā mahākassapatthero “rājagahaṃ, āvuso, gacchāmā”ti upaḍḍhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0501a0:432_3: ekaṃ maggaṃ gato. Anuruddhattheropi upaḍḍhaṃ gahetvā ekaṃ maggaṃ gato, ānandatthero
atk-s0501a0:432_4: pana bhagavato pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto sāvatthiṃ gantvā rājagahaṃ
atk-s0501a0:432_5: gantukāmo yena sāvatthi, tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi. Ānandattherena gatagataṭṭhāne mahāparidevo
atk-s0501a0:432_6: ahosi, “bhante ānanda, kuhiṃ satthāraṃ ṭhapetvā āgatosī”ti? Anupubbena sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0501a0:432_7: anuppatte there bhagavato parinibbānasamaye viya mahāparidevo ahosi.
atk-s0501a0:433_0: Tatra sudaṃ āyasmā ānando aniccatādipaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya taṃ mahājanaṃ
atk-s0501a0:433_1: saññāpetvā jetavanaṃ pavisitvā dasabalena vasitagandhakuṭiyā dvāraṃ vivaritvā mañcapīṭhaṃ
atk-s0501a0:433_2: nīharitvā papphoṭetvā gandhakuṭiṃ sammajjitvā milātamālākacavaraṃ chaḍḍetvā mañcapīṭhaṃ
atk-s0501a0:433_3: atiharitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā bhagavato ṭhitakāle karaṇīyaṃ vattaṃ sabbamakāsi.
atk-s0501a0:433_4: Atha thero bhagavato parinibbānato pabhuti ṭhānanisajjabahulattā ussannadhātukaṃ
atk-s0501a0:433_5: kāyaṃ samassāsetuṃ dutiyadivase khīravirecanaṃ pivitvā vihāreyeva nisīdi, yaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0501a0:434: “Akālo kho, māṇavaka, atthi me ajja bhesajjamattā pītā, appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0501a0:435: Dutiyadivase cetakattherena pacchāsamaṇena gantvā subhena māṇavena puṭṭho dīghanikāye subhasuttaṃ nāma dasamaṃ suttamabhāsi.
atk-s0501a0:436_0: Atha kho thero jetavane vihāre khaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ kārāpetvā upakaṭṭhāya
atk-s0501a0:436_1: vassūpanāyikāya rājagahaṃ gato. Tathā mahākassapatthero anuruddhatthero ca sabbaṃ
atk-s0501a0:437_0: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahe aṭṭhārasa mahāvihārā honti. Te sabbepi chaḍḍitapatitauklāpā
atk-s0501a0:437_1: ahesuṃ. Bhagavato hi parinibbāne sabbe bhikkhū attano attano pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā
atk-s0501a0:437_2: vihāre ca pariveṇe ca chaḍḍetvā agamaṃsu. Tattha therā bhagavato vacanapūjanatthaṃ
atk-s0501a0:437_4: cintesuṃ. Titthiyā hi vadeyyuṃ “samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā satthari ṭhiteyeva vihāre
atk-s0501a0:437_5: paṭijaggiṃsu, parinibbute chaḍḍesu”nti. Tesaṃ vādaparimocanatthañca cintesunti vuttaṃ
atk-s0501a0:438_0: “Atha kho therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi – bhagavatā kho, āvuso, khaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ
atk-s0501a0:438_1: vaṇṇitaṃ, handa mayaṃ, āvuso, paṭhamaṃ māsaṃ khaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ karoma,
atk-s0501a0:438_2: majjhimaṃ māsaṃ sannipatitvā dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyissāmā”ti.
atk-s0501a0:439_0: Te dutiyadivase gantvā rājadvāre aṭṭhaṃsu. Ajātasattu rājā āgantvā vanditvā “ahaṃ,
atk-s0501a0:439_1: bhante, kiṃ karomi, kenattho”ti pavāresi. Therā aṭṭhārasamahāvihārappaṭisaṅkharaṇatthāya
atk-s0501a0:439_2: hatthakammaṃ paṭivedesuṃ. “Sādhu, bhante”ti rājā hatthakammakārake manusse adāsi.
atk-s0501a0:440_0: Atha rañño ārocesuṃ – “niṭṭhitaṃ, mahārāja, vihārappaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ, idāni dhammavinayasaṅgahaṃ
atk-s0501a0:440_1: karomā”ti. “Sādhu, bhante, vissatthā karotha, mayhaṃ āṇācakkaṃ, tumhākaṃ dhammacakkaṃ
atk-s0501a0:440_2: hotu. Āṇāpetha, bhante, kiṃ karomī”ti? “Dhammasaṅgahaṃ karontānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sannisajjaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:440_4: kātuṃ yuttaṃ mahārājā”ti. “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho, rājā ajātasattu, vissakammunā nimmitasadisaṃ
atk-s0501a0:440_7: ca naṃ nānāpupphūpahāravicitraṃ supariniṭṭhitabhūmikammaṃ brahmavimānasadisaṃ alaṅkaritvā
atk-s0501a0:440_8: tasmiṃ mahāmaṇḍape pañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anagghāni pañcakappiyapaccattharaṇasatāni
atk-s0501a0:440_9: paññāpetvā dakkhiṇabhāgaṃ nissāya uttarābhimukhaṃ therāsanaṃ, maṇḍapamajjhe puratthābhimukhaṃ
atk-s0501a0:440_10: buddhassa bhagavato āsanārahaṃ dhammāsanaṃ paññāpetvā dantakhacitaṃ cittabījaniñcettha
atk-s0501a0:441_0: Bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āhaṃsu “sve, āvuso ānanda, saṅghasannipāto, tvañca sekho
atk-s0501a0:441_1: sakaraṇīyo, tena te na yuttaṃ sannipātaṃ gantuṃ, appamatto hohī”ti. Atha kho āyasmā
atk-s0501a0:441_2: ānando “sve sannipāto, na kho pana metaṃ patirūpaṃ, yvāhaṃ sekho samāno sannipātaṃ
atk-s0501a0:441_3: gaccheyya”nti bahudeva rattiṃ kāyagatāya satiyā vītināmetvā rattiyā paccūsasamaye
atk-s0501a0:441_4: caṅkamā orohitvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā “nipajjissāmī”ti kāyaṃ āvajjesi. Dve pādā bhūmito
atk-s0501a0:441_5: muttā, appattañca sīsaṃ bimbohanaṃ, etasmiṃ antare anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucci.
atk-s0501a0:441_6: Ayañhi āyasmā caṅkamena bahi vītināmetvā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto cintesi “nanu
atk-s0501a0:441_7: maṃ bhagavā etadavoca – ‘katapuññosi tvaṃ, ānanda, padhānamanuyuñja, khippaṃ hohisi
atk-s0501a0:441_8: anāsavo’ti. Buddhānañca kathādoso nāma natthi, mama pana accāraddhaṃ vīriyaṃ, tena
atk-s0501a0:441_9: me cittaṃ uddhaccāya saṃvattati, handāhaṃ vīriyasamataṃ yojemī”ti caṅkamā orohitvā
atk-s0501a0:441_10: pādadhovanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā pāde dhovitvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā mañcake nisīditvā “thokaṃ
atk-s0501a0:441_11: vissamissāmī”ti kāyaṃ mañcake upanāmesi. Dve pādā bhūmito muttā, sīsañca bimbohanamasampattaṃ,
atk-s0501a0:441_12: etasmiṃ antare anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucci. Catuiriyāpathavirahitaṃ therassa
atk-s0501a0:441_13: arahattaṃ. Tena “imasmiṃ sāsane anisinno anipanno aṭṭhito acaṅkamanto ko bhikkhu
atk-s0501a0:442_0: Atha therā bhikkhū dutiyadivase bhattakiccaṃ katvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0501a0:442_1: sannipatitā. Ānandatthero pana attano arahattappattiṃ ñāpetukāmo bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0501a0:442_2: na gato. Bhikkhū yathāvuḍḍhaṃ attano attano pattāsane nisīdantā ānandattherassa āsanaṃ
atk-s0501a0:442_3: ṭhapetvā nisinnā. Tattha kehici “etamāsanaṃ kassā”ti vutte ānandassāti. “Ānando pana
atk-s0501a0:442_4: kuhiṃ gato”ti. Tasmiṃ samaye thero cintesi “idāni mayhaṃ gamanakālo”ti. Tato attano
atk-s0501a0:442_5: ānubhāvaṃ dassento pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā attano āsaneyeva attānaṃ dassesi. Ākāsenāgantvā nisīdītipi eke.
atk-s0501a0:443_0: Evaṃ nisinne tasmiṃ āyasmante mahākassapatthero bhikkhū āmantesi, “āvuso, kiṃ paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0501a0:443_1: saṅgāyāma dhammaṃ vā vinayaṃ vā”ti? Bhikkhū āhaṃsu, “bhante mahākassapa, vinayonāmabuddhasāsanassa
atk-s0501a0:443_2: āyu, vinaye ṭhite sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ hoti, tasmā paṭhamaṃ vinayaṃ saṅgāyāmā”ti. “Kaṃ
atk-s0501a0:443_3: dhuraṃ katvā vinayo saṅgāyitabbo”ti? “Āyasmantaṃ upāli”nti. “Kiṃ ānando nappahotī”ti?
atk-s0501a0:443_4: “No nappahoti, apica kho pana sammāsambuddho dharamānoyeva vinayapariyattiṃ nissāya
atk-s0501a0:443_5: āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ etadagge ṭhapesi – ‘etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0501a0:443_6: vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ upālī”’ti. Tasmā upālittheraṃ pucchitvā vinayaṃ saṅgāyāmāti.
atk-s0501a0:443_7: Tato thero vinayaṃ pucchanatthāya attanāva attānaṃ sammanni. Upālittheropi vissajjanatthāya
atk-s0501a0:444: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo saṅghaṃ ñāpesi –
atk-s0501a0:445: “Suṇātu me, āvuso, saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ upāliṃ vinayaṃ puccheyya”nti.
atk-s0501a0:447: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ āyasmatā mahākassapena vinayaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyya”nti.
atk-s0501a0:448_0: Evaṃ attanāva attānaṃ sammannitvā āyasmā, upāli, uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā
atk-s0501a0:448_1: there bhikkhū vanditvā dhammāsane nisīdi dantakhacitaṃ bījaniṃ gahetvā. Tato mahākassapatthero
atk-s0501a0:448_2: upālittheraṃ paṭhamapārājikaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ vinayaṃ pucchi, upālitthero vissajjesi.
atk-s0501a0:448_3: Sabbe pañcasatā bhikkhū paṭhamapārājikasikkhāpadaṃ sanidānaṃ katvā ekato gaṇasajjhāyamakaṃsu.
atk-s0501a0:448_4: Evaṃ sesānipīti sabbaṃ vinayaṭṭhakathāya gahetabbaṃ. Etena nayena saubhatovibhaṅgaṃ
atk-s0501a0:448_5: sakhandhakaparivāraṃ sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ saṅgāyitvā upālitthero dantakhacitaṃ bījaniṃ
atk-s0501a0:448_6: nikkhipitvā dhammāsanā orohitvā vuḍḍhe bhikkhū vanditvā attano pattāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0501a0:449_0: Vinayaṃ saṅgāyitvā dhammaṃ saṅgāyitukāmo āyasmā mahākassapatthero bhikkhū pucchi
atk-s0501a0:449_1: – “dhammaṃ saṅgāyantehi kaṃ puggalaṃ dhuraṃ katvā dhammo saṅgāyitabbo”ti? Bhikkhū
atk-s0501a0:450: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo saṅghaṃ ñāpesi –
atk-s0501a0:451: “Suṇātu me, āvuso, saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ ānandaṃ dhammaṃ puccheyya”nti.
atk-s0501a0:452: Atha kho āyasmā ānando saṅghaṃ ñāpesi –
atk-s0501a0:453: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ āyasmatā mahākassapena dhammaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyya”nti.
atk-s0501a0:454_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā there bhikkhū vanditvā dhammāsane
atk-s0501a0:454_1: nisīdi dantakhacitaṃ bījaniṃ gahetvā. Atha mahākassapatthero ānandattheraṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0501a0:454_2: pucchi – “brahmajālaṃ, āvuso ānanda, kattha bhāsita”nti? “Antarā ca, bhante, rājagahaṃ
atk-s0501a0:454_3: antarā ca nāḷandaṃ rājāgārake ambalaṭṭhikāya”nti. “Kaṃ ārabbhā”ti? “Suppiyañca paribbājakaṃ
atk-s0501a0:454_4: brahmadattañca māṇavaka”nti. Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ brahmajālassa
atk-s0501a0:454_5: nidānampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchi. “Sāmaññaphalaṃ; panāvuso ānanda, kattha bhāsita”nti?
atk-s0501a0:454_7: saddhi”nti. Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ sāmaññaphalassa nidānampi
atk-s0501a0:454_8: pucchi, puggalampi pucchi. Eteneva upāyena pañcapi nikāye pucchi, puṭṭho puṭṭho āyasmā
atk-s0501a0:454_9: ānando vissajjesi. Ayaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti pañcahi therasatehi katā –
atk-s0501a0:457_0: Imissā paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyā vattamānāya sabbaṃ dīghanikāyaṃ majjhimanikāyādiñca pucchitvā
atk-s0501a0:457_1: anupubbena khuddakanikāyaṃ pucchantena āyasmatā mahākassapena “maṅgalasuttaṃ, āvuso
atk-s0501a0:457_2: ānanda, kattha bhāsita”nti evamādivacanāvasāne “nidānampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchī”ti
atk-s0501a0:457_3: ettha nidāne pucchite taṃ nidānaṃ vitthāretvā yathā ca bhāsitaṃ, yena ca sutaṃ, yadā
atk-s0501a0:457_4: ca sutaṃ, yena ca bhāsitaṃ, yattha ca bhāsitaṃ, yassa ca bhāsitaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ kathetukāmena
atk-s0501a0:457_5: “evaṃ bhāsitaṃ mayā sutaṃ, ekaṃ samayaṃ sutaṃ, bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ, sāvatthiyaṃ bhāsitaṃ,
atk-s0501a0:457_6: devatāya bhāsita”nti etamatthaṃ dassentena āyasmatā ānandena vuttaṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ
atk-s0501a0:457_7: – ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme…pe… bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0501a0:457_8: gāthāya ajjhabhāsī”ti. Evamidaṃ āyasmatā ānandena vuttaṃ, tañca pana paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle
atk-s0501a0:458_0: Idāni “kasmā vutta”nti ettha vuccate – yasmā ayamāyasmā mahākassapattherena nidānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:458_1: puṭṭho, tasmānena taṃ nidānaṃ ādito pabhuti vitthāretuṃ vuttaṃ. Yasmā vā ānandaṃ
atk-s0501a0:458_2: dhammāsane nisinnaṃ vasīgaṇaparivutaṃ disvā ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ cittamuppannaṃ “ayamāyasmā
atk-s0501a0:458_3: vedehamuni pakatiyāpi sakyakulamanvayo bhagavato dāyādo, bhagavatāpi pañcakkhattuṃ
atk-s0501a0:458_4: etadagge niddiṭṭho, catūhi acchariyaabbhutadhammehi samannāgato, catunnaṃ parisānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:458_5: piyo manāpo, idāni maññe bhagavato dhammarajjadāyajjaṃ patvā buddho jāto”ti. Tasmā
atk-s0501a0:458_6: āyasmā ānando tāsaṃ devatānaṃ cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya taṃ abhūtaguṇasambhāvanaṃ
atk-s0501a0:458_7: anadhivāsento attano sāvakabhāvameva dīpetuṃ āha “evaṃ me sutaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā
atk-s0501a0:458_8: …pe… ajjhabhāsī”ti. Etthantare pañca arahantasatāni anekāni ca devatāsahassāni “sādhu
atk-s0501a0:458_9: sādhū”ti āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ abhinandiṃsu, mahābhūmicālo ahosi, nānāvidhakusumavassaṃ
atk-s0501a0:458_10: antalikkhato papati, aññāni ca bahūni acchariyāni pāturahesuṃ, bahūnañca devatānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:458_11: saṃvego uppajji “yaṃ amhehi bhagavato sammukhā sutaṃ, idāneva taṃ parokkhā jāta”nti.
atk-s0501a0:458_12: Evamidaṃ āyasmatā ānandena paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vadantenāpi iminā kāraṇena vuttanti
atk-s0501a0:458_13: veditabbaṃ. Ettāvatā ca “vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmā, cetaṃ vatvā imaṃ vidhi”nti imissā
atk-s0501a0:460_2: atthesu daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hesa “evaṃ jātena maccena, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahu”nti evamādīsu
atk-s0501a0:460_3: upamāyaṃ dissati. “Evaṃ te abhikkamitabbaṃ, evaṃ te paṭikkamitabba”ntiādīsu upadese.
atk-s0501a0:460_4: “Evametaṃ bhagavā, evametaṃ sugatā”ti evamādīsu sampahaṃsane. “Evamevaṃ panāyaṃ vasalī
atk-s0501a0:460_5: yasmiṃ vā tasmiṃ vā tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇakassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”ti evamādīsu garahaṇe.
atk-s0501a0:460_6: “Evaṃ, bhanteti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosu”nti evamādīsu vacanasampaṭiggahe.
atk-s0501a0:460_7: “Evaṃ byā kho ahaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmī”ti evamādīsu ākāre.
atk-s0501a0:460_8: “Ehi tvaṃ, māṇavaka, yena samaṇo ānando tenupasaṅkama, upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena
atk-s0501a0:460_9: samaṇaṃ ānandaṃ appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ puccha. ‘Subho
atk-s0501a0:460_10: māṇavo todeyyaputto bhavantaṃ ānandaṃ appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ
atk-s0501a0:460_11: pucchatī’ti, evañca vadehi sādhu kira bhavaṃ ānando yena subhassa māṇavassa todeyyaputtassa
atk-s0501a0:460_12: nivesanaṃ, tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti evamādīsu nidassane. “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha
atk-s0501a0:460_13: kālāmā, ime dhammā kusalā vā akusalā vāti? Akusalā, bhante. Sāvajjā vā anavajjā vāti?
atk-s0501a0:460_14: Sāvajjā, bhante. Viññugarahitā vā viññuppasatthā vāti? Viññugarahitā, bhante. Samattā
atk-s0501a0:460_15: samādinnā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti no vā, kathaṃ vo ettha hotīti? Samattā, bhante,
atk-s0501a0:460_16: samādinnā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti, evaṃ no ettha hotī”ti evamādīsu avadhāraṇe.
atk-s0501a0:461_0: Tattha ākāratthena evaṃ-saddena etamatthaṃ dīpeti – nānānayanipuṇamanekajjhāsayasamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:461_2: sakasakabhāsānurūpato sotapathamāgacchantaṃ tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ sabbappakārena
atk-s0501a0:461_3: ko samattho viññātuṃ, sabbathāmena pana sotukāmataṃ janetvāpi evaṃ me sutaṃ, mayāpi
atk-s0501a0:462: Nidassanatthena “nāhaṃ sayambhū, na mayā idaṃ sacchikata”nti attānaṃ parimocento “evaṃ me sutaṃ, mayāpi evaṃ suta”nti idāni vattabbaṃ sakalasuttaṃ nidasseti.
atk-s0501a0:463_0: Avadhāraṇatthena “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ
atk-s0501a0:463_1: ānando, gatimantānaṃ, satimantānaṃ, dhitimantānaṃ, upaṭṭhākānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando”ti
atk-s0501a0:463_2: evaṃ bhagavatā pasatthabhāvānurūpaṃ attano dhāraṇabalaṃ dassento sattānaṃ sotukamyataṃ
atk-s0501a0:463_3: janeti “evaṃ me sutaṃ, tañca kho atthato vā byañjanato vā anūnamanadhikaṃ, evameva,
atk-s0501a0:464_0: Me-saddo tīsu atthesu dissati. Tathā hissa “gāthābhigītaṃ me abhojaneyya”nti evamādīsu
atk-s0501a0:464_1: mayāti attho. “Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0501a0:464_2: mayhanti attho. “Dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavathā”ti evamādīsu mamāti attho.
atk-s0501a0:464_3: Idha pana “mayā suta”nti ca “mama suta”nti ca atthadvaye yujjati.
atk-s0501a0:465_0: Sutanti ayaṃ sutasaddo saupasaggo anupasaggo ca gamanakhyātarāgābhibhūtūpacitānuyogasotaviññeyyasotadvāraviññātādianekatthappabhedo.
atk-s0501a0:465_1: Tathā hissa “senāya pasuto”ti evamādīsu gacchantoti attho. “Sutadhammassa passato”ti
atk-s0501a0:465_2: evamādīsu khyātadhammassāti attho. “Avassutā avassutassā”ti evamādīsu rāgābhibhūtā
atk-s0501a0:465_3: rāgābhibhūtassāti attho. “Tumhehi puññaṃ pasutaṃ anappaka”nti evamādīsu upacitanti
atk-s0501a0:465_4: attho. “Ye jhānappasutā dhīrā”ti evamādīsu jhānānuyuttāti attho. “Diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ muta”nti
atk-s0501a0:465_5: evamādīsu sotaviññeyyanti attho. “Sutadharo sutasannicayo”ti evamādīsu sotadvārānusāraviññātadharoti
atk-s0501a0:465_6: attho. Idha pana sutanti sotaviññāṇapubbaṅgamāya viññāṇavīthiyā upadhāritanti vā
atk-s0501a0:465_7: upadhāraṇanti vāti attho. Tattha yadā me-saddassa mayāti attho, tadā “evaṃ mayā sutaṃ,
atk-s0501a0:465_8: sotaviññāṇapubbaṅgamāya viññāṇavīthiyā upadhārita”nti yujjati. Yadā me-saddassa mamāti
atk-s0501a0:465_9: attho, tadā “evaṃ mama sutaṃ sotaviññāṇapubbaṅgamāya viññāṇavīthiyā upadhāraṇa”nti yujjati.
atk-s0501a0:466_0: Evametesu tīsu padesu evanti sotaviññāṇakiccanidassanaṃ. Meti vuttaviññāṇasamaṅgīpuggalanidassanaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:466_2: savanādicittānaṃ nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattabhāvanidassanaṃ. Meti attanidassanaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:467: Tathā evanti niddisitabbadhammanidassanaṃ. Meti puggalanidassanaṃ. Sutanti puggalakiccanidassanaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:468: Tathā evanti vīthicittānaṃ ākārapaññattivasena nānappakāraniddeso. Meti kattāraniddeso. Sutanti visayaniddeso.
atk-s0501a0:469: Tathā evanti puggalakiccaniddeso. Sutanti viññāṇakiccaniddeso. Meti ubhayakiccayuttapuggalaniddeso.
atk-s0501a0:470: Tathā evanti bhāvaniddeso. Meti puggalaniddeso. Sutanti tassa kiccaniddeso.
atk-s0501a0:471_0: Tattha evanti ca meti ca sacchikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena avijjamānapaññatti. Sutanti
atk-s0501a0:471_1: vijjamānapaññatti. Tathā evanti ca meti ca taṃ taṃ upādāya vattabbato upādāpaññatti.
atk-s0501a0:472_0: Ettha ca evanti vacanena asammohaṃ dīpeti, sutanti vacanena sutassa asammosaṃ. Tathā
atk-s0501a0:472_1: evanti vacanena yonisomanasikāraṃ dīpeti ayoniso manasikaroto nānappakārappaṭivedhābhāvato.
atk-s0501a0:472_2: Sutanti vacanena avikkhepaṃ dīpeti vikkhittacittassa savanābhāvato. Tathā hi vikkhittacitto
atk-s0501a0:472_3: puggalo sabbasampattiyā vuccamānopi “na mayā sutaṃ, puna bhaṇathā”ti bhaṇati. Yonisomanasikārena
atk-s0501a0:472_4: cettha attasammāpaṇidhiṃ pubbe katapuññatañca sādheti, avikkhepena saddhammassavanaṃ
atk-s0501a0:472_5: sappurisūpanissayañca. Evanti ca iminā bhaddakena ākārena pacchimacakkadvayasampattiṃ
atk-s0501a0:472_6: attano dīpeti, sutanti savanayogena purimacakkadvayasampattiṃ. Tathā āsayasuddhiṃ
atk-s0501a0:472_7: payogasuddhiñca, tāya ca āsayasuddhiyā adhigamabyattiṃ, payogasuddhiyā āgamabyattiṃ.
atk-s0501a0:473_0: Evanti ca iminā nānappakārapaṭivedhadīpakena vacanena attano atthapaṭibhānapaṭisambhidāsampadaṃ
atk-s0501a0:473_2: dīpeti. Evanti ca idaṃ yonisomanasikāradīpakaṃ vacanaṃ bhaṇanto “ete mayā dhammā
atk-s0501a0:473_3: manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā”ti ñāpeti. Sutanti idaṃ savanayogadīpakavacanaṃ
atk-s0501a0:473_4: bhaṇanto “bahū mayā dhammā sutā dhātā vacasā paricitā”ti ñāpeti. Tadubhayenapi atthabyañjanapāripūriṃ
atk-s0501a0:474_0: Evaṃ me sutanti iminā pana sakalenapi vacanena āyasmā ānando tathāgatappaveditaṃ
atk-s0501a0:474_1: dhammaṃ attano adahanto asappurisabhūmiṃ, atikkamati, sāvakattaṃ paṭijānanto sappurisabhūmiṃ
atk-s0501a0:474_2: okkamati. Tathā asaddhammā cittaṃ vuṭṭhāpeti, saddhamme cittaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti. “Kevalaṃ
atk-s0501a0:474_3: sutamevetaṃ mayā, tasseva tu bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti ca dīpento
atk-s0501a0:474_4: attānaṃ parimoceti, satthāraṃ apadisati, jinavacanaṃ appeti, dhammanettiṃ patiṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0501a0:475_0: Apica “evaṃ me suta”nti attanā uppāditabhāvaṃ appaṭijānanto purimassavanaṃ vivaranto
atk-s0501a0:475_1: “sammukhā paṭiggahitamidaṃ mayā tassa bhagavato catuvesārajjavisāradassa dasabaladharassa
atk-s0501a0:475_4: Na ettha atthe vā dhamme vā pade vā byañjane vā kaṅkhā vā vimati vā kātabbā”ti sabbadevamanussānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:475_5: imasmiṃ dhamme assaddhiyaṃ vināseti, saddhāsampadaṃ uppādetīti veditabbo. Hoti cettha –
atk-s0501a0:478: Ekanti gaṇanaparicchedaniddeso. Samayanti paricchinnaniddeso. Ekaṃ samayanti aniyamitaparidīpanaṃ. Tattha samayasaddo –
atk-s0501a0:480: Paṭilābhe pahāne ca, paṭivedhe ca dissati.
atk-s0501a0:481_0: Tathā hissa “appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāma kālañca samayañca upādāyā”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0501a0:481_1: samavāyo attho. “Ekova kho, bhikkhave, khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0501a0:481_2: khaṇo. “Uṇhasamayo pariḷāhasamayo”ti evamādīsu kālo. “Mahāsamayo pavanasmi”nti evamādīsu
atk-s0501a0:481_3: samūho. “Samayopi kho te, bhaddāli, appaṭividdho ahosi, bhagavā kho sāvatthiyaṃ viharati,
atk-s0501a0:481_4: sopi maṃ jānissati, ‘bhaddāli, nāma bhikkhu satthusāsane sikkhāya aparipūrakārī’ti,
atk-s0501a0:481_5: ayampi kho te bhaddāli samayo appaṭividdho ahosī”ti evamādīsu hetu. “Tena kho pana
atk-s0501a0:481_6: samayena uggāhamāno paribbājako samaṇamuṇḍikāputto samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake
atk-s0501a0:482: “Diṭṭhe dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho samparāyiko;
atk-s0501a0:484_0: Evamādīsu paṭilābho. “Sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassā”ti evamādīsu pahānaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:484_1: “Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho abhisamayaṭṭho”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0501a0:484_2: paṭivedho. Idha panassa kālo attho. Tena ekaṃ samayanti saṃvaccharautumāsaaḍḍhamāsarattidivapubbaṇhamajjhanhikasāyanhapaṭhamamajjhima-
atk-s0501a0:484_3: pacchimayāmamuhuttādīsu kālakhyesu samayesu ekaṃ samayanti dīpeti.
atk-s0501a0:485_0: Ye vā ime gabbhokkantisamayo jātisamayo saṃvegasamayo abhinikkhamanasamayo dukkarakārikasamayo
atk-s0501a0:485_2: evamādayo bhagavato devamanussesu ativiya pakāsā anekakālakhyā eva samayā. Tesu samayesu
atk-s0501a0:485_3: desanāsamayasaṅkhātaṃ ekaṃ samayanti vuttaṃ hoti. Yo cāyaṃ ñāṇakaruṇākiccasamayesu
atk-s0501a0:485_6: samayesu yaṃ kiñci sandhāya “ekaṃ samaya”nti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a0:486_0: Etthāha – atha kasmā yathā abhidhamme “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacara”nti ca ito aññesu
atk-s0501a0:486_1: suttapadesu “yasmiṃ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehī”ti ca bhummavacanena
atk-s0501a0:486_2: niddeso kato, vinaye ca “tena samayena buddho bhagavā”ti karaṇavacanena, tathā akatvā
atk-s0501a0:486_3: idha “ekaṃ samaya”nti upayogavacananiddeso katoti. Tattha tathā, idha ca aññathā
atk-s0501a0:486_4: atthasambhavato. Tattha hi abhidhamme ito aññesu suttapadesu ca adhikaraṇattho bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇattho
atk-s0501a0:486_5: ca sambhavati. Adhikaraṇañhi kālattho samūhattho ca samayo, tattha vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:486_6: khaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātassa ca samayassa bhāvena tesaṃ bhāvo lakkhīyati, tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ
atk-s0501a0:487_0: Vinaye ca hetvattho karaṇattho ca sambhavati. Yo hi so sikkhāpadapaññattisamayo sāriputtādīhipi
atk-s0501a0:487_1: dubbiññeyyo, tena samayena hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtena ca sikkhāpadāni paññapento sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca
atk-s0501a0:487_2: apekkhamāno bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsi, tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ tattha karaṇavacananiddeso kato.
atk-s0501a0:488_0: Idha pana aññasmiñca evaṃjātike suttantapāṭhe accantasaṃyogattho sambhavati. Yañhi
atk-s0501a0:488_1: samayaṃ bhagavā imaṃ aññaṃ vā suttantaṃ desesi, accantameva taṃ samayaṃ karuṇāvihārena
atk-s0501a0:488_2: vihāsi. Tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ idha upayogavacananiddeso katoti viññeyyo. Hoti cettha –
