atk-s0501a0:795_5: kambalassatarādayo nāgarājāno pūjaṃ akaṃsu. Evaṃ mahatiyā pūjāya bhagavā yojanamattaṃ
atk-s0501a0:795_6: addhānaṃ gaṅgāya gantvā vesālikānaṃ sīmantaraṃ paviṭṭho.
atk-s0501a0:796_0: Tato licchavirājāno bimbisārena katapūjāya diguṇaṃ karontā galappamāṇe udake bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0501a0:796_1: paccuggacchiṃsu. Teneva khaṇena tena muhuttena vijjuppabhāvinaddhandhakāravisaṭakūṭo
atk-s0501a0:796_2: gaḷagaḷāyanto catūsu disāsu mahāmegho vuṭṭhāsi. Atha bhagavatā paṭhamapāde gaṅgātīre
atk-s0501a0:796_3: nikkhittamatte pokkharavassaṃ vassi. Ye temetukāmā, te eva tementi, atemetukāmā na
atk-s0501a0:796_4: tementi. Sabbattha jāṇumattaṃ ūrumattaṃ kaṭimattaṃ galappamāṇaṃ udakaṃ vahati, sabbakuṇapāni
atk-s0501a0:796_5: udakena gaṅgaṃ pavesitāni, parisuddho bhūmibhāgo ahosi.
atk-s0501a0:797_0: Licchavirājāno bhagavantaṃ antarā yojane yojane vāsāpetvā mahādānāni datvā tīhi divasehi
atk-s0501a0:797_1: diguṇaṃ pūjaṃ karontā vesāliṃ nayiṃsu. Vesāliṃ sampatte bhagavati sakko devānamindo
atk-s0501a0:797_2: devasaṅghapurakkhato āgacchi. Mahesakkhānaṃ devatānaṃ sannipātena amanussā yebhuyyena
atk-s0501a0:797_3: palāyiṃsu. Bhagavā nagaradvāre ṭhatvā ānandattheraṃ āmantesi – “imaṃ, ānanda, ratanasuttaṃ
atk-s0501a0:797_4: uggahetvā balikammūpakaraṇāni gahetvā licchavirājakumārehi saddhiṃ vesāliyā tipākārantare
atk-s0501a0:797_5: vicaranto parittaṃ karohī”ti ratanasuttaṃ abhāsi. “Evaṃ kena panetaṃ suttaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0501a0:797_6: kadā, kattha, kasmā ca vutta”nti etesaṃ pañhānaṃ vissajjanā vitthārena vesālivatthuto
atk-s0501a0:798_0: Evaṃ bhagavato vesāliṃ anuppattadivaseyeva vesālinagaradvāre tesaṃ upaddavānaṃ paṭighātatthāya
atk-s0501a0:798_1: vuttamidaṃ ratanasuttaṃ uggahetvā āyasmā ānando parittatthāya bhāsamāno bhagavato
atk-s0501a0:798_2: pattena udakamādāya sabbanagaraṃ abbhukkiranto anuvicari. Yaṃ kiñcīti vuttamatte
atk-s0501a0:798_3: eva therena ye pubbe apalātā saṅkārakūṭabhittippadesādinissitā amanussā, te catūhi
atk-s0501a0:798_4: dvārehi palāyiṃsu, dvārāni anokāsāni ahesuṃ. Tato ekacce dvāresu okāsaṃ alabhamānā
atk-s0501a0:798_5: pākāraṃ bhinditvā palātā. Amanussesu gatamattesu manussānaṃ gattesu rogo vūpasanto.
atk-s0501a0:798_6: Te nikkhamitvā sabbapupphagandhādīhi theraṃ pūjesuṃ. Mahājano nagaramajjhe santhāgāraṃ
atk-s0501a0:798_7: sabbagandhehi limpitvā vitānaṃ katvā sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā tattha buddhāsanaṃ
atk-s0501a0:799_0: Bhagavā santhāgāraṃ pavisitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi. Bhikkhusaṅghopi kho rājāno manussā
atk-s0501a0:799_1: ca patirūpe patirūpe āsane nisīdiṃsu. Sakkopi devānamindo dvīsu devalokesu devaparisāya
atk-s0501a0:799_2: saddhiṃ upanisīdi aññe ca devā, ānandattheropi sabbaṃ vesāliṃ anuvicaranto rakkhaṃ
atk-s0501a0:799_3: katvā vesālinagaravāsīhi saddhiṃ āgantvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Tattha bhagavā sabbesaṃ
atk-s0501a0:800: Ettāvatā ca yā “yena vuttaṃ yadā yattha, yasmā cetaṃ imaṃ nayaṃ. Pakāsetvānā”ti mātikā nikkhittā, sā sabbappakārena vitthāritā hoti.
atk-s0501a0:802_0: 1. Idāni “etassa karissāmatthavaṇṇana”nti vuttattā atthavaṇṇanā ārabbhate. Apare
atk-s0501a0:802_1: pana vadanti “ādito pañceva gāthā bhagavatā vuttā, sesā parittakaraṇasamaye ānandattherenā”ti.
atk-s0501a0:802_2: Yathā vā tathā vā hotu, kiṃ no imāya parikkhāya, sabbathāpi etassa ratanasuttassa
atk-s0501a0:803_0: Yānīdha bhūtānīti paṭhamagāthā. Tattha yānīti yādisāni appesakkhāni vā mahesakkhāni
atk-s0501a0:803_1: vā. Idhāti imasmiṃ padese, tasmiṃ khaṇe sannipātaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāyāha. Bhūtānīti kiñcāpi
atk-s0501a0:803_3: samanupassathā”ti evamādīsu khandhapañcake. “Cattāro kho, bhikkhu, mahābhūtā hetū”ti
atk-s0501a0:803_4: evamādīsu catubbidhe pathavīdhātvādirūpe. “Yo ca kālaghaso bhūto”ti evamādīsu khīṇāsave.
atk-s0501a0:803_5: “Sabbeva nikkhipissanti, bhūtā loke samussaya”nti evamādīsu sabbasatte. “Bhūtagāmapātabyatāyā”ti
atk-s0501a0:803_6: evamādīsu rukkhādike. “Bhūtaṃ bhūtato sañjānātī”ti evamādīsu cātumahārājikānaṃ heṭṭhā
atk-s0501a0:803_7: sattanikāyaṃ upādāya vattati. Idha pana avisesato amanussesu daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0501a0:804_0: Samāgatānīti sannipatitāni. Bhummānīti bhūmiyaṃ nibbattāni. Vā-iti vikappane. Tena
atk-s0501a0:804_1: yānīdha bhummāni vā bhūtāni samāgatānīti imamekaṃ vikappaṃ katvā puna dutiyavikappaṃ
atk-s0501a0:804_2: kātuṃ “yāni va antalikkhe”ti āha. Antalikkhe vā yāni bhūtāni nibbattāni, tāni sabbāni
atk-s0501a0:804_3: idha samāgatānīti attho. Ettha ca yāmato yāva akaniṭṭhaṃ, tāva nibbattāni bhūtāni
atk-s0501a0:804_4: ākāse pātubhūtavimānesu nibbattattā “antalikkhe bhūtānī”ti veditabbāni. Tato heṭṭhā
atk-s0501a0:804_5: sineruto pabhuti yāva bhūmiyaṃ rukkhalatādīsu adhivatthāni pathaviyañca nibbattāni
atk-s0501a0:804_6: bhūtāni, tāni sabbāni bhūmiyaṃ bhūmipaṭibaddhesu ca rukkhalatāpabbatādīsu nibbattattā
atk-s0501a0:805_0: Evaṃ bhagavā sabbāneva amanussabhūtāni “bhummāni vā yāni va antalikkhe”ti dvīhi padehi
atk-s0501a0:805_1: vikappetvā puna ekena padena pariggahetvā dassetuṃ “sabbeva bhūtā sumanā bhavantū”ti
atk-s0501a0:805_2: āha. Sabbeti anavasesā. Evāti avadhāraṇe, ekampi anapanetvāti adhippāyo. Bhūtāti
atk-s0501a0:805_3: amanussā. Sumanā bhavantūti sukhitamanā pītisomanassajātā bhavantu. Athopīti kiccantarasanniyojanatthaṃ
atk-s0501a0:805_4: vākyopādāne nipātadvayaṃ. Sakkacca suṇantu bhāsitanti aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasikatvā sabbaṃ
atk-s0501a0:805_5: cetasā samannāharitvā dibbasampattilokuttarasukhāvahaṃ mama desanaṃ suṇantu.
atk-s0501a0:806_0: Evamettha bhagavā “yānīdha bhūtāni samāgatānī”ti aniyamitavacanena bhūtāni pariggahetvā
atk-s0501a0:806_1: puna “bhummāni vā yāni va antalikkhe”ti dvidhā vikappetvā tato “sabbeva bhūtā”ti
atk-s0501a0:806_2: puna ekajjhaṃ katvā “sumanā bhavantū”ti iminā vacanena āsayasampattiyaṃ niyojento
atk-s0501a0:808_0: 2. Tasmā hi bhūtāti dutiyagāthā. Tattha tasmāti kāraṇavacanaṃ. Bhūtāti āmantanavacanaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:808_1: Nisāmethāti suṇātha. Sabbeti anavasesā. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yasmā tumhe dibbaṭṭhānāni
atk-s0501a0:808_2: tattha upabhogaparibhogasampadañca pahāya dhammassavanatthaṃ idha samāgatā, na naṭanaccanādidassanatthaṃ,
atk-s0501a0:808_3: tasmā hi bhūtā nisāmetha sabbeti. Atha vā “sumanā bhavantu, sakkacca suṇantū”ti vacanena
atk-s0501a0:808_4: tesaṃ sumanabhāvaṃ sakkaccaṃ sotukamyatañca disvā āha “yasmā tumhe sumanabhāvena
atk-s0501a0:808_6: payogasuddhīhi ca yuttā, tasmā hi bhūtā nisāmetha sabbe”ti. Atha vā yaṃ purimagāthāya
atk-s0501a0:808_7: ante “bhāsita”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ kāraṇabhāvena apadisanto āha “yasmā mama bhāsitaṃ nāma
atk-s0501a0:808_8: atidullabhaṃ aṭṭhakkhaṇaparivajjitassa khaṇassa dullabhattā, anekānisaṃsañca paññākaruṇāguṇena
atk-s0501a0:808_9: pavattattā, tañcāhaṃ vattukāmo ‘suṇantu bhāsita’nti avocaṃ, tasmā hi bhūtā nisāmetha
atk-s0501a0:808_10: sabbe”ti. Idaṃ iminā gāthāpadena vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a0:809_0: Evametaṃ kāraṇaṃ niropento attano bhāsitanisāmane niyojetvā nisāmetabbaṃ vattumāraddho
atk-s0501a0:809_1: “mettaṃ karotha mānusiyā pajāyā”ti. Tassattho – yāyaṃ tīhi upaddavehi upaddutā mānusī
atk-s0501a0:809_2: pajā, tassā mānusiyā pajāya mettaṃ mittabhāvaṃ hitajjhāsayataṃ paccupaṭṭhapethāti.
atk-s0501a0:809_3: Keci pana “mānusikaṃ paja”nti paṭhanti, taṃ bhummatthāsambhavā na yujjati. Yampi
atk-s0501a0:809_4: aññe atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti, sopi na yujjati. Adhippāyo panettha – nāhaṃ buddhoti issariyabalena
atk-s0501a0:809_5: vadāmi, api tu yaṃ tumhākañca imissā ca mānusiyā pajāya hitatthaṃ vadāmi “mettaṃ
atk-s0501a0:818: “Sabbe ca pāṇe manasānukampī, pahūtamariyo pakaroti puñña”nti. –
atk-s0501a0:819: Evamādīnaṃ suttānaṃ ekādasānisaṃsānañca vasena ye mettaṃ karonti, etesaṃ mettā hitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0501a0:821: Evamādīnaṃ suttānaṃ vasena yesu kayirati, tesampi hitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0501a0:822_0: Evaṃ ubhayesampi hitabhāvaṃ dassento “mettaṃ karotha mānusiyā”ti vatvā idāni upakārampi
atk-s0501a0:822_1: dassento āha “divā ca ratto ca haranti ye baliṃ, tasmā hi ne rakkhatha appamattā”ti.
atk-s0501a0:822_2: Tassattho – ye manussā cittakammakaṭṭhakammādīhipi devatā katvā cetiyarukkhādīni
atk-s0501a0:822_3: ca upasaṅkamitvā devatā uddissa divā baliṃ karonti, kālapakkhādīsu ca rattiṃ baliṃ
atk-s0501a0:822_4: karonti, salākabhattādīni vā datvā ārakkhadevatā upādāya yāva brahmadevatānaṃ pattidānaniyyātanena
atk-s0501a0:822_5: divā baliṃ karonti, chattāropanadīpamālāya sabbarattikadhammassavanādīni kārāpetvā
atk-s0501a0:822_6: pattidānaniyyātanena ca rattiṃ baliṃ karonti, te kathaṃ na rakkhitabbā? Yato evaṃ
atk-s0501a0:822_7: divā ca ratto ca tumhe uddissa karonti ye baliṃ, tasmā hi ne rakkhatha; tasmā balikammakaraṇāpi
atk-s0501a0:822_8: te manusse rakkhatha gopayatha, ahitaṃ nesaṃ apanetha, hitaṃ upanetha appamattā hutvā
atk-s0501a0:824_0: 3. Evaṃ devatāsu manussānaṃ upakārakabhāvaṃ dassetvā tesaṃ upaddavavūpasamanatthaṃ
atk-s0501a0:824_2: nayena saccavacanaṃ payuñjitumāraddho. Tattha yaṃkiñcīti aniyamitavasena anavasesaṃ
atk-s0501a0:824_3: pariyādiyati yaṃkiñci tattha tattha vohārūpagaṃ. Vittanti dhanaṃ. Tañhi vittiṃ janetīti
atk-s0501a0:824_4: vittaṃ. Idha vāti manussalokaṃ niddisati. Huraṃ vāti tato paraṃ avasesalokaṃ, tena
atk-s0501a0:824_5: ca ṭhapetvā manusse sabbalokaggahaṇe patte “saggesu vā”ti parato vuttattā ṭhapetvā
atk-s0501a0:824_6: manusse ca sagge ca avasesānaṃ nāgasupaṇṇādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:825_0: Evaṃ imehi dvīhi padehi yaṃ manussānaṃ vohārūpagaṃ alaṅkāraparibhogūpagañca jātarūparajatamuttāmaṇiveḷuriyapavāḷalohitaṅkamasāragallādikaṃ,
atk-s0501a0:825_2: bhavanesu uppannānaṃ nāgasupaṇṇādīnaṃ vittaṃ, taṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ hoti. Saggesu vāti kāmāvacararūpāvacaradevalokesu.
atk-s0501a0:825_3: Te hi sobhanena kammena ajīyantīti saggā. Suṭṭhu aggātipi saggā. Yanti yaṃ sasāmikaṃ
atk-s0501a0:825_4: vā asāmikaṃ vā. Ratananti ratiṃ nayati vahati janayati vaḍḍhetīti ratanaṃ. Yaṃkiñci
atk-s0501a0:825_5: cittīkataṃ mahagghaṃ atulaṃ dullabhadassanaṃ anomasattaparibhogañca, tassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a0:828_0: Paṇītanti uttamaṃ seṭṭhaṃ atappakaṃ. Evaṃ iminā gāthāpadena yaṃ saggesu anekayojanasatappamāṇasabbaratanamayavimānasudhammavejayantappabhutīsu
atk-s0501a0:828_1: sasāmikaṃ, yañca buddhuppādavirahena apāyameva paripūrentesu sattesu suññavimānappaṭibaddhaṃ
atk-s0501a0:829_0: Na no samaṃ atthi tathāgatenāti na-iti paṭisedhe. No-iti avadhāraṇe. Samanti tulyaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:829_1: Atthīti vijjati. Tathāgatenāti buddhena. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yaṃ etaṃ vittañca ratanañca
atk-s0501a0:829_2: pakāsitaṃ, ettha ekampi buddharatanena sadisaṃ ratanaṃ nevatthi. Yampi hi taṃ cittīkataṭṭhena
atk-s0501a0:829_3: ratanaṃ, seyyathidaṃ – rañño cakkavattissa cakkaratanaṃ maṇiratanañca, yamhi uppanne
atk-s0501a0:829_4: mahājano na aññattha cittīkāraṃ karoti, na koci pupphagandhādīni gahetvā yakkhaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:829_5: vā bhūtaṭṭhānaṃ vā gacchati, sabbopi jano cakkaratanamaṇiratanameva cittīkāraṃ karoti
atk-s0501a0:829_6: pūjeti, taṃ taṃ varaṃ pattheti, patthitapatthitañcassa ekaccaṃ samijjhati, tampi
atk-s0501a0:829_7: ratanaṃ buddharatanena samaṃ natthi. Yadi hi cittīkataṭṭhena ratanaṃ, tathāgatova
atk-s0501a0:829_8: ratanaṃ. Tathāgate hi uppanne ye keci mahesakkhā devamanussā na te aññatra cittīkāraṃ
atk-s0501a0:829_9: karonti, na kañci aññaṃ pūjenti. Tathā hi brahmā sahampati sinerumattena ratanadāmena
atk-s0501a0:829_10: tathāgataṃ pūjesi, yathābalañca aññe devā manussā ca bimbisārakosalarājaanāthapiṇḍikādayo.
atk-s0501a0:829_11: Parinibbutampi bhagavantaṃ uddissa channavutikoṭidhanaṃ vissajjetvā asokamahārājā
atk-s0501a0:829_12: sakalajambudīpe caturāsīti vihārasahassāni patiṭṭhāpesi, ko pana vādo aññesaṃ cittīkārānaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:829_14: paṭimācetiyādīni vā uddissa evaṃ cittīkāragarukāro pavattati yathā bhagavato. Evaṃcittīkataṭṭhenāpi
atk-s0501a0:830_0: Tathā yampi taṃ mahagghaṭṭhena ratanaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – kāsikaṃ vatthaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a0:830_1: “jiṇṇampi, bhikkhave, kāsikaṃ vatthaṃ vaṇṇavantañceva hoti sukhasamphassañca mahagghañcā”ti,
atk-s0501a0:830_2: tampi buddharatanena samaṃ natthi. Yadi hi mahagghaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, tathāgatova ratanaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:830_3: Tathāgato hi yesaṃ paṃsukampi paṭiggaṇhāti, tesaṃ taṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsaṃ
atk-s0501a0:830_4: seyyathāpi asokarañño, idamassa mahagghatāya. Evaṃ mahagghatāvacanena cettha dosābhāvasādhakaṃ
atk-s0501a0:831_1: tesaṃ taṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsaṃ. Idamassa mahagghatāya vadāmi. Seyyathāpi
atk-s0501a0:831_2: taṃ, bhikkhave, kāsikaṃ vatthaṃ mahagghaṃ, tathūpamāhaṃ, bhikkhave, imaṃ puggalaṃ vadāmī”ti.
atk-s0501a0:833_0: Tathā yampi taṃ atulaṭṭhena ratanaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – rañño cakkavattissa cakkaratanaṃ
atk-s0501a0:833_2: yassa dasannaṃ dasannaṃ arānamupari ekaṃ muṇḍāraṃ hoti vātaṃ gahetvā saddakaraṇatthaṃ,
atk-s0501a0:833_3: yena kato saddo sukusalappatāḷitapañcaṅgikatūriyasaddo viya hoti, yassa nābhiyā ubhosu
atk-s0501a0:833_4: passesu dve sīhamukhāni honti, abbhantaraṃ sakaṭacakkasseva susiraṃ. Tassa kattā
atk-s0501a0:833_5: vā kāretā vā natthi, kammapaccayena ututo samuṭṭhāti. Yaṃ rājā dasavidhaṃ cakkavattivattaṃ
atk-s0501a0:833_6: pūretvā tadahuposathe puṇṇamadivase sīsaṃnhāto uposathiko uparipāsādavaragato sīlāni
atk-s0501a0:833_7: sodhento nisinno puṇṇacandaṃ viya sūriyaṃ viya ca uṭṭhentaṃ passati, yassa dvādasayojanato
atk-s0501a0:833_8: saddo suyyati, yojanato vaṇṇo dissati, yaṃ mahājanena “dutiyo maññe cando sūriyo
atk-s0501a0:833_9: vā uṭṭhito”ti ativiya kotūhalajātena dissamānaṃ nagarassa upari āgantvā rañño antepurassa
atk-s0501a0:833_10: pācīnapasse nātiuccaṃ nātinīcaṃ hutvā mahājanassa gandhapupphādīhi pūjetuṃ, yuttaṭṭhāne
atk-s0501a0:834_0: Tadeva anubandhamānaṃ hatthiratanaṃ uppajjati, sabbaseto rattapādo sattappatiṭṭho
atk-s0501a0:834_1: iddhimā vehāsaṅgamo uposathakulā vā chaddantakulā vā āgacchati, uposathakulā ca āgacchanto
atk-s0501a0:834_2: sabbajeṭṭho āgacchati, chaddantakulā sabbakaniṭṭho sikkhitasikkho damathūpeto, so
atk-s0501a0:834_3: dvādasayojanaṃ parisaṃ gahetvā sakalajambudīpaṃ anusaṃyāyitvā purepātarāsameva sakaṃ
atk-s0501a0:835: Tampi anubandhamānaṃ assaratanaṃ uppajjati, sabbaseto rattapādo kāḷasīso muñjakeso valāhakassarājakulā āgacchati. Sesamettha hatthiratanasadisameva.
atk-s0501a0:836_0: Tampi anubandhamānaṃ maṇiratanaṃ uppajjati. So hoti maṇi veḷuriyo subho jātimā aṭṭhaṃso
atk-s0501a0:836_1: suparikammakato āyāmato cakkanābhisadiso, vepullapabbatā āgacchati. So caturaṅgasamannāgatepi
atk-s0501a0:836_2: andhakāre rañño dhajaggaṃ gato yojanaṃ obhāseti, yassobhāsena manussā “divā”ti maññamānā
atk-s0501a0:836_3: kammante payojenti, antamaso kunthakipillikaṃ upādāya passanti.
atk-s0501a0:837_0: Tampi anubandhamānaṃ itthiratanaṃ uppajjati, pakatiaggamahesī vā hoti, uttarakuruto
atk-s0501a0:837_1: vā āgacchati maddarājakulato vā, atidīghatādichadosavivajjitā atikkantā mānusavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0501a0:837_2: appattā dibbavaṇṇaṃ, yassā rañño sītakāle uṇhāni gattāni honti, uṇhakāle sītāni,
atk-s0501a0:837_3: satadhā phoṭita tūlapicuno viya samphasso hoti, kāyato candanagandho vāyati, mukhato
atk-s0501a0:838_0: Tampi anubandhamānaṃ gahapatiratanaṃ uppajjati rañño pakatikammakāro seṭṭhi, yassa
atk-s0501a0:838_1: cakkaratane uppannamatte dibbaṃ cakkhu pātubhavati, yena samantato yojanamatte nidhiṃ
atk-s0501a0:838_2: passati asāmikampi sasāmikampi, so rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pavāreti “appossukko tvaṃ,
atk-s0501a0:838_3: deva, hohi, ahaṃ te dhanena dhanakaraṇīyaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0501a0:839_0: Tampi anubandhamānaṃ pariṇāyakaratanaṃ uppajjati rañño pakatijeṭṭhaputto. Cakkaratane
atk-s0501a0:839_1: uppannamatte atirekapaññāveyyattiyena samannāgato hoti, dvādasayojanāya parisāya
atk-s0501a0:839_2: cetasā cittaṃ parijānitvā niggahapaggahasamattho hoti, so rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pavāreti
atk-s0501a0:839_3: “appossukko tvaṃ, deva, hohi, ahaṃ te rajjaṃ anusāsissāmī”ti. Yaṃ vā panaññampi evarūpaṃ
atk-s0501a0:839_4: atulaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, yassa na sakkā tulayitvā tīrayitvā aggho kātuṃ “sataṃ vā sahassaṃ
atk-s0501a0:839_5: vā agghati koṭiṃ vā”ti. Tattha ekaratanampi buddharatanena samaṃ natthi. Yadi hi
atk-s0501a0:839_6: atulaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, tathāgatova ratanaṃ. Tathāgato hi na sakkā sīlato vā samādhito
atk-s0501a0:839_7: vā paññādīnaṃ vā aññatarato kenaci tulayitvā tīrayitvā “ettakaguṇo vā iminā samo
atk-s0501a0:839_8: vā sappaṭibhāgo vā”ti paricchindituṃ. Evaṃ atulaṭṭhenapi tathāgatasamaṃ ratanaṃ natthi.
atk-s0501a0:840_0: Tathā yampi taṃ dullabhadassanaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, seyyathidaṃ dullabhapātubhāvo rājā
atk-s0501a0:840_1: cakkavatti, cakkādīni ca tassa ratanāni, tampi buddharatanena samaṃ natthi. Yadi
atk-s0501a0:840_2: hi dullabhadassanaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, tathāgatova ratanaṃ, kuto cakkavattiādīnaṃ ratanattaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:840_3: Tāni hi ekasmiṃyeva kappe anekāni uppajjanti. Yasmā pana asaṅkhyeyyepi kappe tathāgatasuñño
atk-s0501a0:840_4: loko hoti, tasmā tathāgatova kadāci karahaci uppajjanato dullabhadassano. Vuttampi
atk-s0501a0:841_0: “Devatā, ānanda, ujjhāyanti ‘dūrā ca vatamha āgatā tathāgataṃ dassanāya, kadāci karahaci
atk-s0501a0:841_1: tathāgatā loke uppajjanti arahanto sammāsambuddhā, ajjeva rattiyā pacchime yāme tathāgatassa
atk-s0501a0:841_2: parinibbānaṃ bhavissati, ayañca mahesakkho bhikkhu bhagavato purato ṭhito ovārento,
atk-s0501a0:841_3: na mayaṃ labhāma pacchime kāle tathāgataṃ dassanāyā”’ti.
atk-s0501a0:843_0: Tathā yampi taṃ anomasattaparibhogaṭṭhena ratanaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – rañño cakkavattissa
atk-s0501a0:843_3: na nibbattati. Ubhato sujātassa pana rañño khattiyasseva paripūritadasavidhacakkavattivattassa
atk-s0501a0:843_4: paribhogatthāya nibbattanato anomasattaparibhogaṃyeva hoti, tampi buddharatanasamaṃ
atk-s0501a0:843_5: natthi. Yadi hi anomasattaparibhogaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, tathāgatova ratanaṃ. Tathāgato
atk-s0501a0:843_6: hi loke omakasattasammatānaṃ anupanissayasampannānaṃ viparītadassanānaṃ pūraṇakassapādīnaṃ
atk-s0501a0:843_7: channaṃ satthārānaṃ aññesañca evarūpānaṃ supinantepi aparibhogo. Upanissayasampannānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:843_8: pana catuppadāyapi gāthāya pariyosāne arahattamadhigantuṃ samatthānaṃ nibbedhikañāṇadassanānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:843_11: paribhuñjanti. Evaṃ anomasattaparibhogaṭṭhenāpi tathāgatasamaṃ ratanaṃ natthi.
atk-s0501a0:844_0: Yampi taṃ avisesato ratijananaṭṭhena ratanaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – rañño cakkavattissa cakkaratanaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:844_1: Tañhi disvāva rājā cakkavatti attamano hoti, evampi taṃ rañño ratiṃ janeti. Puna
atk-s0501a0:844_2: caparaṃ rājā cakkavatti vāmena hatthena suvaṇṇabhiṅkāraṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇena hatthena
atk-s0501a0:844_3: cakkaratanaṃ abbhukkirati “pavattatu bhavaṃ cakkaratanaṃ, abhivijinātu bhavaṃ cakkaratana”nti.
atk-s0501a0:844_4: Tato cakkaratanaṃ pañcaṅgikaṃ viya tūriyaṃ madhurassaraṃ niccharantaṃ ākāsena puratthimaṃ
atk-s0501a0:844_5: disaṃ gacchati, anvadeva rājā, cakkavatti cakkānubhāvena dvādasayojanavitthiṇṇāya
atk-s0501a0:844_6: caturaṅginiyā senāya nātiuccaṃ nātinīcaṃ uccarukkhānaṃ heṭṭhābhāgena, nīcarukkhānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:844_7: uparibhāgena, rukkhesu pupphaphalapallavādipaṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā āgatānaṃ hatthato paṇṇākārañca
atk-s0501a0:844_8: gaṇhanto “ehi kho, mahārājā”ti evamādinā paramanipaccakārena āgate paṭirājāno “pāṇo
atk-s0501a0:844_9: na hantabbo”tiādinā nayena anusāsanto gacchati. Yattha pana rājā bhuñjitukāmo vā
atk-s0501a0:844_10: divāseyyaṃ vā kappetukāmo hoti, tattha cakkaratanaṃ ākāsā orohitvā udakādisabbakiccakkhame
atk-s0501a0:844_11: same bhūmibhāge akkhāhataṃ viya tiṭṭhati. Puna rañño gamanacitte uppanne purimanayeneva
atk-s0501a0:844_12: saddaṃ karontaṃ gacchati, taṃ sutvā dvādasayojanikāpi parisā ākāsena gacchati. Cakkaratanaṃ
atk-s0501a0:844_13: anupubbena puratthimaṃ samuddaṃ ajjhogāhati, tasmiṃ ajjhogāhante udakaṃ yojanappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0501a0:844_14: apagantvā bhittīkataṃ viya tiṭṭhati. Mahājano yathākāmaṃ satta ratanāni gaṇhāti.
atk-s0501a0:844_15: Puna rājā suvaṇṇabhiṅkāraṃ gahetvā “ito paṭṭhāya mama rajja”nti udakena abbhukkiritvā
atk-s0501a0:844_16: nivattati. Senā purato hoti, cakkaratanaṃ pacchato, rājā majjhe. Cakkaratanena osakkitosakkitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:844_17: udakaṃ paripūrati. Eteneva upāyena dakkhiṇapacchimuttarepi samudde gacchati.
atk-s0501a0:845_0: Evaṃ catuddisaṃ anusaṃyāyitvā cakkaratanaṃ tiyojanappamāṇaṃ ākāsaṃ ārohati. Tattha
atk-s0501a0:845_1: ṭhito rājā cakkaratanānubhāvena vijitavijayo pañcasataparittadīpapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ sattayojanasahassaparimaṇḍalaṃ
atk-s0501a0:845_4: ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ suphullapuṇḍarīkavanaṃ viya oloketi. Evaṃ olokayato cassa anappakā
atk-s0501a0:845_5: rati uppajjati. Evampi taṃ cakkaratanaṃ rañño ratiṃ janeti, tampi buddharatanasamaṃ
atk-s0501a0:845_6: natthi. Yadi hi ratijananaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, tathāgatova ratanaṃ, kiṃ karissati etaṃ
atk-s0501a0:845_7: cakkaratanaṃ? Tathāgato hi yassā dibbāya ratiyā cakkaratanādīhi sabbehipi janitā
atk-s0501a0:845_8: cakkavattirati saṅkhampi kalampi kalabhāgampi na upeti, tatopi ratito uttaritarañca
atk-s0501a0:845_9: paṇītatarañca attano ovādappaṭikarānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānampi devamanussānaṃ paṭhamajjhānaratiṃ
atk-s0501a0:845_12: janeti. Evaṃ ratijananaṭṭhenāpi tathāgatasamaṃ ratanaṃ natthīti.
atk-s0501a0:846_0: Apica ratanaṃ nāmetaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti saviññāṇakamaviññāṇakañca. Tattha aviññāṇakaṃ
atk-s0501a0:846_1: cakkaratanaṃ maṇiratanañca, yaṃ vā panaññampi anindriyabaddhasuvaṇṇarajatādi, saviññāṇakaṃ
atk-s0501a0:846_3: Evaṃ duvidhe cettha saviññāṇakaratanaṃ aggamakkhāyati. Kasmā? Yasmā aviññāṇakaṃ suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādiratanaṃ
atk-s0501a0:847_0: Saviññāṇakaratanampi duvidhaṃ tiracchānagataratanaṃ, manussaratanañca. Tattha manussaratanaṃ
atk-s0501a0:847_1: aggamakkhāyati. Kasmā? Yasmā tiracchānagataratanaṃ manussaratanassa opavayhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a0:847_2: Manussaratanampi duvidhaṃ itthiratanaṃ, purisaratanañca. Tattha purisaratanaṃ aggamakkhāyati.
atk-s0501a0:847_3: Kasmā? Yasmā itthiratanaṃ purisaratanassa paricārikattaṃ āpajjati. Purisaratanampi
atk-s0501a0:847_4: duvidhaṃ agārikaratanaṃ, anagārikaratanañca. Tattha anagārikaratanaṃ aggamakkhāyati.
atk-s0501a0:847_5: Kasmā? Yasmā agārikaratanesu aggo cakkavattipi sīlādiguṇayuttaṃ anagārikaratanaṃ
atk-s0501a0:847_6: pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā upaṭṭhahitvā payirupāsitvā dibbamānusikā sampattiyo pāpuṇitvā
atk-s0501a0:848_0: Evaṃ anagārikaratanampi duvidhaṃ ariyaputhujjanavasena. Ariyaratanampi duvidhaṃ sekhāsekhavasena.
atk-s0501a0:848_4: Kasmā? Guṇamahantatāya. Sāriputtamoggallānasadisāpi hi anekasatā sāvakā ekassa paccekabuddhassa
atk-s0501a0:848_5: guṇānaṃ satabhāgampi na upenti. Paccekabuddharatanatopi sammāsambuddharatanaṃ aggamakkhāyati.
atk-s0501a0:848_6: Kasmā? Guṇamahantatāya. Sakalampi hi jambudīpaṃ pūretvā pallaṅkena pallaṅkaṃ ghaṭentā
atk-s0501a0:848_7: nisinnā paccekabuddhā ekassa sammāsambuddhassa guṇānaṃ neva saṅkhaṃ na kalaṃ na kalabhāgaṃ
atk-s0501a0:848_8: upenti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā – “yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā…pe… tathāgato
atk-s0501a0:848_9: tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”tiādi. Evaṃ kenaci pariyāyena tathāgatasamaṃ ratanaṃ natthi.
atk-s0501a0:848_10: Tenāha bhagavā – “na no samaṃ atthi tathāgatenā”ti.
atk-s0501a0:849_0: Evaṃ bhagavā buddharatanassa aññehi ratanehi asamataṃ vatvā idāni tesaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:849_1: uppannaupaddavavūpasamatthaṃ neva jātiṃ na gottaṃ na kolaputtiyaṃ na vaṇṇapokkharatādiṃ
atk-s0501a0:849_2: nissāya, apica kho avīcimupādāya bhavaggapariyante loke sīlasamādhikkhandhādīhi guṇehi
atk-s0501a0:849_3: buddharatanassa asadisabhāvaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi buddhe ratanaṃ
atk-s0501a0:850_0: Tassattho – idampi idha vā huraṃ vā saggesu vā yaṃkiñci atthi vittaṃ vā ratanaṃ vā,
atk-s0501a0:850_1: tena saddhiṃ tehi tehi guṇehi asamattā buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ. Yadi hi etaṃ saccaṃ,
atk-s0501a0:850_2: atha etena saccena imesaṃ pāṇīnaṃ suvatthi hotu, sobhanānaṃ atthitā hotu arogatā
atk-s0501a0:850_3: nirupaddavatāti. Ettha ca yathā “cakkhu kho, ānanda, suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena
atk-s0501a0:850_4: vā”ti evamādīsu attabhāvena vā attaniyabhāvena vāti attho. Itarathā hi cakkhu attā
atk-s0501a0:850_5: vā attaniyaṃ vāti appaṭisiddhameva siyā. Evaṃ ratanaṃ paṇītanti ratanattaṃ paṇītaṃ,
atk-s0501a0:850_6: ratanabhāvo paṇītoti ayamattho veditabbo. Itarathā hi buddho neva ratananti sijjheyya.
atk-s0501a0:850_7: Na hi yattha ratanaṃ atthi, taṃ ratananti na sijjhati. Yattha pana cittīkatādiatthasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0501a0:850_8: yena vā tena vā vidhinā sambandhagataṃ ratanaṃ atthi, yasmā taṃ ratanattamupādāya
atk-s0501a0:850_9: ratananti paññāpīyati, tasmā tassa ratanassa atthitāya ratananti sijjhati. Atha vā
atk-s0501a0:850_10: idampi buddhe ratananti imināpi pakārena buddhova ratananti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0501a0:850_11: Vuttamattāya ca bhagavatā imāya gāthāya rājakulassa sotthi jātā, bhayaṃ vūpasantaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:850_12: Imissā gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a0:852_0: 4. Evaṃ buddhaguṇena saccaṃ vatvā idāni nibbānadhammaguṇena vattumāraddho “khayaṃ
atk-s0501a0:852_1: virāga”nti. Tattha yasmā nibbānasacchikiriyāya rāgādayo khīṇā honti parikkhīṇā, yasmā
atk-s0501a0:852_2: vā taṃ tesaṃ anuppādanirodhakkhayamattaṃ, yasmā ca taṃ rāgādivippayuttaṃ sampayogato
atk-s0501a0:852_3: ca ārammaṇato ca, yasmā vā tamhi sacchikate rāgādayo accantaṃ virattā honti vigatā
atk-s0501a0:852_4: viddhastā, tasmā khayanti ca virāganti ca vuccati. Yasmā panassa na uppādo paññāyati,
atk-s0501a0:852_5: na vayo, na ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ tasmā taṃ na jāyati na jīyati na mīyatīti katvā
atk-s0501a0:852_6: amatanti vuccati. Uttamatthena pana atappakaṭṭhena ca paṇītanti. Yadajjhagāti yaṃ
atk-s0501a0:852_7: ajjhagā vindi paṭilabhi, attano ñāṇabalena sacchākāsi. Sakyamunīti sakyakulappasutattā
atk-s0501a0:852_8: sakyo, moneyyadhammasamannāgatattā muni, sakyo eva muni sakyamuni. Samāhitoti ariyamaggasamādhinā
atk-s0501a0:852_9: samāhitacitto. Na tena dhammena samatthi kiñcīti tena khayādināmakena sakyamuninā
atk-s0501a0:852_10: adhigatena dhammena samaṃ kiñci dhammajātaṃ natthi. Tasmā suttantarepi vuttaṃ – “yāvatā,
atk-s0501a0:852_11: bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”tiādi.
atk-s0501a0:853_0: Evaṃ bhagavā nibbānadhammassa aññehi dhammehi asamataṃ vatvā idāni tesaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:853_2: asadisabhāvaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi dhamme ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ, etena
atk-s0501a0:853_3: saccena suvatthi hotū”ti. Tassattho purimagāthāya vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Imissāpi
atk-s0501a0:855_0: 5. Evaṃ nibbānadhammaguṇena saccaṃ vatvā idāni maggadhammaguṇena vattumāraddho “yaṃ
atk-s0501a0:855_1: buddhaseṭṭho”ti. Tattha “bujjhitā saccānī”tiādinā nayena buddho, uttamo pasaṃsanīyo
atk-s0501a0:855_2: cāti seṭṭho, buddho ca so seṭṭho cāti buddhaseṭṭho, anubuddhapaccekabuddhasutabuddhakhyesu
atk-s0501a0:855_3: vā buddhesu seṭṭhoti buddhaseṭṭho. So buddhaseṭṭho yaṃ parivaṇṇayī “aṭṭhaṅgikova
atk-s0501a0:855_4: maggānaṃ, khemaṃ nibbānapattiyā”ti ca “ariyaṃ vo, bhikkhave, sammāsamādhiṃ desissāmi
atk-s0501a0:855_5: saupanisaṃ saparikkhāra”nti ca evamādinā nayena tattha tattha pasaṃsi pakāsayi. Sucinti
atk-s0501a0:855_7: pavattisamanantaraṃ niyameneva phalapadānato “ānantarikasamādhī”ti āhu. Na hi maggasamādhimhi
atk-s0501a0:855_8: uppanne tassa phaluppattinisedhako koci antarāyo atthi. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a0:856_0: “Ayañca puggalo sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno assa, kappassa ca uḍḍayhanavelā
atk-s0501a0:856_1: assa, neva tāva kappo uḍḍayheyya, yāvāyaṃ puggalo na sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchikaroti,
atk-s0501a0:856_2: ayaṃ vuccati puggalo ṭhitakappī. Sabbepi maggasamaṅgino puggalā ṭhitakappino”ti.
atk-s0501a0:857_0: Samādhinā tena samo na vijjatīti tena buddhaseṭṭhaparivaṇṇitena sucinā ānantarikasamādhinā
atk-s0501a0:857_1: samo rūpāvacarasamādhi vā arūpāvacarasamādhi vā koci na vijjati. Kasmā? Tesaṃ bhāvitattā
atk-s0501a0:857_2: tattha tattha brahmaloke upapannassāpi puna nirayādīsupi upapattisambhavato, imassa
atk-s0501a0:857_4: Tasmā suttantarepi vuttaṃ – “yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā…pe… ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko
atk-s0501a0:858_0: Evaṃ bhagavā ānantarikasamādhissa aññehi samādhīhi asamataṃ vatvā idāni purimanayeneva
atk-s0501a0:858_1: maggadhammaratanassa asadisabhāvaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi dhamme…pe…
atk-s0501a0:858_2: hotū”ti. Tassattho pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu
atk-s0501a0:860_0: 6. Evaṃ maggadhammaguṇenāpi saccaṃ vatvā idāni saṅghaguṇenāpi vattumāraddho “ye puggalā”ti.
atk-s0501a0:860_1: Tattha yeti aniyametvā uddeso. Puggalāti sattā. Aṭṭhāti tesaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo. Te
atk-s0501a0:860_2: hi cattāro ca paṭipannā cattāro ca phale ṭhitāti aṭṭha honti. Sataṃ pasatthāti sappurisehi
atk-s0501a0:860_3: buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakehi aññehi ca devamanussehi pasatthā. Kasmā? Sahajātasīlādiguṇayogā.
atk-s0501a0:860_4: Tesañhi campakavakulakusumādīnaṃ sahajātavaṇṇagandhādayo viya sahajātā sīlasamādhiādayo
atk-s0501a0:860_5: guṇā, tena te vaṇṇagandhādisampannāni viya pupphāni devamanussānaṃ sataṃ piyā manāpā
atk-s0501a0:860_6: pasaṃsanīyā ca honti. Tena vuttaṃ “ye puggalā aṭṭhasataṃ pasatthā”ti.
atk-s0501a0:861_0: Atha vā yeti aniyametvā uddeso. Puggalāti sattā. Aṭṭhasatanti tesaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo.
atk-s0501a0:861_1: Te hi ekabījī kolaṃkolo sattakkhattuparamoti tayo sotāpannā. Kāmarūpārūpabhavesu
atk-s0501a0:861_2: adhigataphalā tayo sakadāgāmino. Te sabbepi catunnaṃ paṭipadānaṃ vasena catuvīsati.
atk-s0501a0:861_4: uddhaṃsoto, akaniṭṭhagāmīti avihesu pañca. Tathā atappasudassasudassīsu. Akaniṭṭhesu
atk-s0501a0:861_5: pana uddhaṃsotavajjā cattāroti catuvīsati anāgāmino. Sukkhavipassako samathayānikoti
atk-s0501a0:861_6: dve arahanto. Cattāro maggaṭṭhāti catupaññāsa. Te sabbepi saddhādhurapaññādhurānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:861_7: vasena diguṇā hutvā aṭṭhasataṃ honti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0501a0:862_0: Cattāri etāni yugāni hontīti te sabbepi aṭṭha vā aṭṭhasataṃ vāti vitthāravasena uddiṭṭhapuggalā
atk-s0501a0:862_1: saṅkhepavasena sotāpattimaggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti ekaṃ yugaṃ, evaṃ yāva arahattamaggaṭṭho
atk-s0501a0:862_2: phalaṭṭhoti ekaṃ yuganti cattāri yugāni honti. Te dakkhiṇeyyāti ettha teti pubbe
atk-s0501a0:862_3: aniyametvā uddiṭṭhānaṃ niyametvā niddeso. Ye puggalā vitthāravasena aṭṭha vā, aṭṭhasataṃ
atk-s0501a0:862_4: vā, saṅkhepavasena cattāri yugāni hontīti vuttā, sabbepi te dakkhiṇaṃ arahantīti
atk-s0501a0:862_5: dakkhiṇeyyā. Dakkhiṇā nāma kammañca kammavipākañca saddahitvā “esa me idaṃ vejjakammaṃ
atk-s0501a0:862_6: vā jaṅghapesanikaṃ vā karissatī”ti evamādīni anapekkhitvā diyyamāno deyyadhammo,
atk-s0501a0:862_7: taṃ arahanti nāma sīlādiguṇayuttā puggalā, ime ca tādisā, tena vuccanti “te dakkhiṇeyyā”ti.
atk-s0501a0:863_0: Sugatassa sāvakāti bhagavā sobhanena gamanena yuttattā, sobhanañca ṭhānaṃ gatattā,
atk-s0501a0:863_1: suṭṭhu ca gatattā, suṭṭhu eva ca gadattā sugato, tassa sugatassa. Sabbepi te vacanaṃ
atk-s0501a0:863_2: suṇantīti sāvakā. Kāmañca aññepi suṇanti, na pana sutvā kattabbakiccaṃ karonti, ime
atk-s0501a0:863_3: pana sutvā kattabbaṃ dhammānudhammappaṭipattiṃ katvā maggaphalāni pattā, tasmā “sāvakā”ti
atk-s0501a0:863_4: vuccanti. Etesu dinnāni mahapphalānīti etesu sugatasāvakesu appakānipi dānāni dinnāni
atk-s0501a0:863_5: paṭiggāhakato dakkhiṇāvisuddhibhāvaṃ upagatattā mahapphalāni honti. Tasmā suttantarepi vuttaṃ –
atk-s0501a0:864_0: “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, saṅghā vā gaṇā vā tathāgatasāvakasaṅgho, tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati,
atk-s0501a0:864_1: yadidaṃ cattāri purisayugāni aṭṭha purisapuggalā, esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho…pe…
atk-s0501a0:865_0: Evaṃ bhagavā sabbesampi maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhānaṃ vasena saṅgharatanassa guṇaṃ vatvā
atk-s0501a0:865_1: idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi saṅghe”ti. Tassattho pubbe
atk-s0501a0:865_2: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a0:867_0: 7. Evaṃ maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhānaṃ vasena saṅghaguṇena saccaṃ vatvā idāni tato ekaccānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:867_2: suppayuttā”ti. Tattha yeti aniyamituddesavacanaṃ. Suppayuttāti suṭṭhu payuttā, anekavihitaṃ
atk-s0501a0:867_3: anesanaṃ pahāya suddhājīvitaṃ nissāya vipassanāya attānaṃ payuñjitumāraddhāti attho.
atk-s0501a0:867_4: Atha vā suppayuttāti suvisuddhakāyavacīpayogasamannāgatā, tena tesaṃ sīlakkhandhaṃ
atk-s0501a0:867_5: dasseti. Manasā daḷhenāti daḷhena manasā, thirasamādhiyuttena cetasāti attho. Tena
atk-s0501a0:867_6: tesaṃ samādhikkhandhaṃ dasseti. Nikkāminoti kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhā hutvā paññādhurena
atk-s0501a0:867_7: vīriyena sabbakilesehi katanikkamanā. Tena tesaṃ vīriyasampannaṃ paññakkhandhaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0501a0:868_0: Gotamasāsanamhīti gottato gotamassa tathāgatasseva sāsanamhi. Tena ito bahiddhā nānappakārampi
atk-s0501a0:868_1: amaratapaṃ karontānaṃ suppayogādiguṇābhāvato kilesehi nikkamanābhāvaṃ dasseti. Teti
atk-s0501a0:868_2: pubbe uddiṭṭhānaṃ niddesavacanaṃ. Pattipattāti ettha pattabbāti patti, pattabbā nāma
atk-s0501a0:868_3: pattuṃ arahā, yaṃ patvā accantayogakkhemino honti, arahattaphalassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
atk-s0501a0:868_4: taṃ pattiṃ pattāti pattipattā. Amatanti nibbānaṃ. Vigayhāti ārammaṇavasena vigāhitvā.
atk-s0501a0:868_5: Laddhāti labhitvā. Mudhāti abyayena kākaṇikamattampi byayaṃ akatvā. Nibbutinti paṭippassaddhakilesadarathaṃ
atk-s0501a0:868_6: phalasamāpattiṃ. Bhuñjamānāti anubhavamānā. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Ye imasmiṃ gotamasāsanamhi
atk-s0501a0:868_7: sīlasampannattā suppayuttā, samādhisampannattā manasā daḷhena, paññāsampannattā nikkāmino,
atk-s0501a0:868_8: te imāya sammāpaṭipadāya amataṃ vigayha mudhā laddhā phalasamāpattisaññitaṃ nibbutiṃ
atk-s0501a0:869_0: Evaṃ bhagavā phalasamāpattisukhamanubhavantānaṃ khīṇāsavapuggalānameva vasena saṅgharatanassa
atk-s0501a0:869_1: guṇaṃ vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi saṅghe”ti.
atk-s0501a0:869_2: Tassattho pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu
atk-s0501a0:871_0: 8. Evaṃ khīṇāsavapuggalānaṃ guṇena saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vatvā idāni bahujanapaccakkhena
atk-s0501a0:871_1: sotāpannasseva guṇena vattumāraddho “yathindakhīlo”ti. Tattha yathāti upamāvacanaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:871_2: Indakhīloti nagaradvāravinivāraṇatthaṃ ummārabbhantare aṭṭha vā dasa vā hatthe pathaviṃ
atk-s0501a0:871_3: khaṇitvā ākoṭitassa sāradārumayathambhassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Pathavinti bhūmiṃ. Sitoti
atk-s0501a0:871_4: anto pavisitvā nissito. Siyāti bhaveyya. Catubbhi vātehīti catūhi disāhi āgatehi
atk-s0501a0:871_5: vātehi. Asampakampiyoti kampetuṃ vā cāletuṃ vā asakkuṇeyyo. Tathūpamanti tathāvidhaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:871_6: Sappurisanti uttamapurisaṃ. Vadāmīti bhaṇāmi. Yo ariyasaccāni avecca passatīti yo
atk-s0501a0:871_7: cattāri ariyasaccāni paññāya ajjhogāhetvā passati. Tattha ariyasaccāni kumārapañhe
atk-s0501a0:872_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho – yathā hi indakhīlo gambhīranematāya pathavissito catubbhi
atk-s0501a0:872_1: vātehi asampakampiyo siyā, imampi sappurisaṃ tathūpamameva vadāmi, yo ariyasaccāni
atk-s0501a0:872_2: avecca passati. Kasmā? Yasmā sopi indakhīlo viya catūhi vātehi sabbatitthiyavādavātehi
atk-s0501a0:872_3: asampakampiyo hoti, tamhā dassanā kenaci kampetuṃ vā cāletuṃ vā asakkuṇeyyo. Tasmā
atk-s0501a0:873_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ayokhīlo vā indakhīlo vā gambhīranemo sunikhāto acalo asampakampī,
atk-s0501a0:873_1: puratthimāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi, neva naṃ saṅkampeyya na sampakampeyya
atk-s0501a0:873_2: na sampacāleyya. Pacchimāya…pe… dakkhiṇāya, uttarāyapi ce…pe… na sampacāleyya. Taṃ
atk-s0501a0:873_3: kissa hetu? Gambhīrattā, bhikkhave, nemassa, sunikhātattā indakhīlassa. Evameva kho,
atk-s0501a0:873_4: bhikkhave, ye ca kho keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ‘idaṃ dukkhanti…pe… paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0501a0:873_5: pajānanti, te na aññassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā mukhaṃ olokenti ‘ayaṃ nūna bhavaṃ
atk-s0501a0:873_6: jānaṃ jānāti, passaṃ passatī’ti. Taṃ kissa hetu? Sudiṭṭhattā, bhikkhave, catunnaṃ ariyasaccāna”nti.
atk-s0501a0:874_0: Evaṃ bhagavā bahujanapaccakkhassa sotāpannasseva vasena saṅgharatanassa guṇaṃ vatvā
atk-s0501a0:874_1: idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi saṅghe”ti. Tassattho pubbe
atk-s0501a0:874_2: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a0:876: 9. Evaṃ avisesato sotāpannassa guṇena saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vatvā idāni ye te tayo sotāpannā ekabījī kolaṃkolo sattakkhattuparamoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a0:877_0: “Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti…pe… so ekaṃyeva
atk-s0501a0:877_1: bhavaṃ nibbattitvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti, ayaṃ ekabījī. Tathā dve vā tīṇi vā kulāni
atk-s0501a0:877_2: sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti, ayaṃ kolaṃkolo. Tathā sattakkhattuṃ
atk-s0501a0:877_3: devesu ca manussesu ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti, ayaṃ sattakkhattuparamo”ti.
atk-s0501a0:878_0: Tesaṃ sabbakaniṭṭhassa sattakkhattuparamassa guṇena vattumāraddho “ye ariyasaccānī”ti.
atk-s0501a0:878_1: Tattha ye ariyasaccānīti etaṃ vuttanayameva. Vibhāvayantīti paññāobhāsena saccappaṭicchādakaṃ
atk-s0501a0:878_2: kilesandhakāraṃ vidhamitvā attano pakāsāni pākaṭāni karonti. Gambhīrapaññenāti appameyyapaññatāya
atk-s0501a0:878_3: sadevakassa lokassa ñāṇena alabbhaneyyappatiṭṭhapaññena, sabbaññunāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a0:878_4: Sudesitānīti samāsabyāsasākalyavekalyādīhi tehi tehi nayehi suṭṭhu desitāni. Kiñcāpi
atk-s0501a0:878_5: te honti bhusaṃ pamattāti te vibhāvitaariyasaccā puggalā kiñcāpi devarajjacakkavattirajjādippamādaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:878_6: āgamma bhusaṃ pamattā honti, tathāpi sotāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa
atk-s0501a0:878_7: nirodhena ṭhapetvā satta bhave anamatagge saṃsāre ye uppajjeyyuṃ nāmañca rūpañca,
atk-s0501a0:878_8: tesaṃ niruddhattā atthaṅgatattā na aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ ādiyanti, sattamabhave eva pana
atk-s0501a0:879_0: Evaṃ bhagavā sattakkhattuparamavasena saṅgharatanassa guṇaṃ vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ
atk-s0501a0:879_1: nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi saṅghe”ti. Tassattho pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0501a0:879_2: Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a0:881_0: 10. Evaṃ sattakkhattuparamassa aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ anādiyanaguṇena saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ
atk-s0501a0:881_1: vatvā idāni tasseva satta bhave ādiyatopi aññehi appahīnabhavādānehi puggalehi visiṭṭhena
atk-s0501a0:881_2: guṇena vattumāraddho “sahāvassā”ti. Tattha sahāvāti saddhiṃyeva. Assāti “na te bhavaṃ
atk-s0501a0:881_4: Sotāpattimaggo hi nibbānaṃ disvā kattabbakiccasampadāya sabbapaṭhamaṃ nibbānadassanato
atk-s0501a0:881_5: “dassana”nti vuccati, tassa attani pātubhāvo dassanasampadā, tāya dassanasampadāya
atk-s0501a0:881_6: saha eva. Tayassu dhammā jahitā bhavantīti ettha assu-iti padapūraṇamatte nipāto
atk-s0501a0:881_7: “idaṃ su me, sāriputta, mahāvikaṭabhojanasmiṃ hotī”tiādīsu viya. Yato sahāvassa dassanasampadāya
atk-s0501a0:881_8: tayo dhammā jahitā bhavanti pahīnā hontīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0501a0:882_1: yadatthi kiñcī”ti. Tattha sati kāye vijjamāne upādānakkhandhapañcakākhye kāye vīsativatthukā
atk-s0501a0:882_2: diṭṭhi sakkāyadiṭṭhi, satī vā tattha kāye diṭṭhītipi sakkāyadiṭṭhi, yathāvuttappakāre
atk-s0501a0:882_3: kāye vijjamānā diṭṭhīti attho. Satiyeva vā kāye diṭṭhītipi sakkāyadiṭṭhi, yathāvuttappakāre
atk-s0501a0:882_4: kāye vijjamāne rūpādisaṅkhāto attāti evaṃ pavattā diṭṭhīti attho. Tassā ca pahīnattā
atk-s0501a0:882_5: sabbadiṭṭhigatāni pahīnāneva honti. Sā hi nesaṃ mūlaṃ. Sabbakilesabyādhivūpasamanato
atk-s0501a0:882_6: paññā“cikicchita”nti vuccati, taṃ paññācikicchitaṃ ito vigataṃ, tato vā paññācikicchitā
atk-s0501a0:882_7: idaṃ vigatanti vicikicchitaṃ. “Satthari kaṅkhatī”tiādinā nayena vuttāya aṭṭhavatthukāya
atk-s0501a0:882_8: vimatiyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tassā pahīnattā sabbānipi vicikicchitāni pahīnāni honti.
atk-s0501a0:882_9: Tañhi nesaṃ mūlaṃ. “Ito bahiddhā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sīlena suddhi vatena suddhī”ti
atk-s0501a0:882_10: evamādīsu āgataṃ gosīlakukkurasīlādikaṃ sīlaṃ govatakukkuravatādikañca vataṃ sīlabbatanti
atk-s0501a0:882_11: vuccati, tassa pahīnattā sabbampi naggiyamuṇḍikādiamaratapaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti. Tañhi
atk-s0501a0:882_12: tassa mūlaṃ, teneva sabbāvasāne vuttaṃ “yadatthi kiñcī”ti. Dukkhadassanasampadāya
atk-s0501a0:884_0: 11. Evamassa kilesavaṭṭappahānaṃ dassetvā idāni tasmiṃ kilesavaṭṭe sati yena vipākavaṭṭena
atk-s0501a0:884_1: bhavitabbaṃ, tappahānā tassāpi pahānaṃ dīpento āha “catūhapāyehi ca vippamutto”ti.
atk-s0501a0:884_2: Tattha cattāro apāyā nāma nirayatiracchānapettivisayaasurakāyā. Tehi esa satta bhave
atk-s0501a0:885_0: Evamassa vipākavaṭṭappahānaṃ dassetvā idāni yamassa vipākavaṭṭassa mūlabhūtaṃ kammavaṭṭaṃ,
atk-s0501a0:885_1: tassāpi pahānaṃ dassento āha “chaccābhiṭhānāni abhabba kātu”nti. Tattha abhiṭhānānīti
atk-s0501a0:885_2: oḷārikaṭṭhānāni, tāni esa cha abhabbo kātuṃ. Tāni ca “aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso,
atk-s0501a0:885_3: yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo mātaraṃ jīvitā voropeyyā”tiādinā nayena ekakanipāte vuttāni
atk-s0501a0:885_5: Tāni hi kiñcāpi diṭṭhisampanno ariyasāvako kunthakipillikampi jīvitā na voropeti,
atk-s0501a0:885_6: apica kho pana puthujjanabhāvassa vigarahaṇatthaṃ vuttāni. Puthujjano hi adiṭṭhisampannattā
atk-s0501a0:885_7: evaṃmahāsāvajjāni abhiṭhānānipi karoti, dassanasampanno pana abhabbo tāni kātunti.
atk-s0501a0:885_8: Abhabbaggahaṇañcettha bhavantarepi akaraṇadassanatthaṃ. Bhavantarepi hi esa attano
atk-s0501a0:885_9: ariyasāvakabhāvaṃ ajānantopi dhammatāya eva etāni vā cha pakatipāṇātipātādīni vā
atk-s0501a0:885_10: pañca verāni aññasatthāruddesena saha cha ṭhānāni na karoti, yāni sandhāya ekacce
atk-s0501a0:885_11: “cha chābhiṭhānānī”tipi paṭhanti. Matamacchaggāhādayo cettha ariyasāvakagāmadārakānaṃ nidassanaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:886_0: Evaṃ bhagavā satta bhave ādiyatopi ariyasāvakassa aññehi appahīnabhavādānehi puggalehi
atk-s0501a0:886_1: visiṭṭhaguṇavasena saṅgharatanassa guṇaṃ vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ
atk-s0501a0:886_2: payuñjati “idampi saṅghe”ti. Tassattho pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Imissāpi gāthāya
atk-s0501a0:888_0: 12. Evaṃ satta bhave ādiyatopi aññehi appahīnabhavādānehi puggalehi visiṭṭhaguṇena
atk-s0501a0:888_1: saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vatvā idāni na kevalaṃ dassanasampanno cha abhiṭhānāni abhabbo
atk-s0501a0:888_2: kātuṃ, kintu appamattakampi pāpakammaṃ katvā tassa paṭicchādanāyapi abhabboti pamādavihārinopi
atk-s0501a0:888_3: dassanasampannassa katappaṭicchādanābhāvaguṇena vattumāraddho “kiñcāpi so kamma karoti pāpaka”nti.
atk-s0501a0:889_0: Tassattho – so dassanasampanno kiñcāpi satisammosena pamādavihāraṃ āgamma yaṃ taṃ
atk-s0501a0:889_1: bhagavatā lokavajjaṃ sañciccātikkamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “yaṃ mayā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
atk-s0501a0:889_2: paññattaṃ, taṃ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamantī”ti taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ kuṭikārasahaseyyādiṃ
atk-s0501a0:889_4: vā vācāya, uda cetasā vā katthaci lobhadosuppādanaṃ jātarūpādisādiyanaṃ cīvarādiparibhogesu
atk-s0501a0:889_5: apaccavekkhaṇādiṃ vā pāpakammaṃ karoti. Abhabbo so tassa paṭicchadāya na so taṃ “idaṃ
atk-s0501a0:889_6: akappiyamakaraṇīya”nti jānitvā muhuttampi paṭicchādeti, taṃkhaṇaṃ eva pana satthari
atk-s0501a0:889_7: vā viññūsu vā sabrahmacārīsu āvi katvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaroti, “na puna karissāmī”ti
atk-s0501a0:889_8: evaṃ saṃvaritabbaṃ vā saṃvarati. Kasmā? Yasmā abhabbatā diṭṭhapadassa vuttā, evarūpampi
atk-s0501a0:889_9: pāpakammaṃ katvā tassa paṭicchādāya diṭṭhanibbānapadassa dassanasampannassa puggalassa
atk-s0501a0:891_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, daharo kumāro mando uttānaseyyako hatthena vā pādena vā aṅgāraṃ
atk-s0501a0:891_1: akkamitvā khippameva paṭisaṃharati, evameva kho, bhikkhave, dhammatā esā diṭṭhisampannassa
atk-s0501a0:891_2: puggalassa, kiñcāpi tathārūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati, yathārūpāya āpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0501a0:891_3: Atha kho naṃ khippameva satthari vā viññūsu vā sabrahmacārīsu deseti vivarati uttānīkaroti,
atk-s0501a0:891_4: desetvā vivaritvā uttānīkatvā āyatiṃ saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti.
atk-s0501a0:892_0: Evaṃ bhagavā pamādavihārinopi dassanasampannassa katappaṭicchādanābhāvaguṇena saṅgharatanassa
atk-s0501a0:892_1: guṇaṃ vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi saṅghe”ti.
atk-s0501a0:892_2: Tassattho pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu
atk-s0501a0:894_0: 13. Evaṃ saṅghapariyāpannānaṃ puggalānaṃ tena tena guṇappakārena saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:894_1: saccaṃ vatvā idāni yvāyaṃ bhagavatā ratanattayaguṇaṃ dīpentena idha saṅkhepena aññatra
atk-s0501a0:894_2: ca vitthārena pariyattidhammo desito, tampi nissāya puna buddhādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ
atk-s0501a0:894_4: rukkhānaṃ samūho vanaṃ, mūlasārapheggutacasākhāpalāsehi pavuddho gumbo pagumbo, vanassa,
atk-s0501a0:894_5: vane vā pagumbo vanappagumbo. Svāyaṃ “vanappagumbe”ti vutto, evampi hi vattuṃ labbhati
atk-s0501a0:894_6: “atthi savitakkasavicāre, atthi avitakkavicāramatte, sukhe dukkhe jīve”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0501a0:894_7: Yathāti upamāvacanaṃ. Phussitāni aggāni assāti phussitaggo, sabbasākhāpasākhāsu sañjātapupphoti
atk-s0501a0:894_8: attho. So pubbe vuttanayeneva “phussitagge”ti vutto. Gimhānamāse paṭhamasmiṃ gimheti
atk-s0501a0:894_9: ye cattāro gimhānaṃ māsā, tesaṃ catunnaṃ gimhamāsānaṃ ekasmiṃ māse. Katarasmiṃ māse
atk-s0501a0:894_10: iti ce? Paṭhamasmiṃ gimhe, citramāseti attho. So hi “paṭhamagimho”ti ca “bālavasanto”ti
atk-s0501a0:894_11: ca vuccati. Tato paraṃ padatthato pākaṭameva.
atk-s0501a0:895_0: Ayaṃ panettha piṇḍattho – yathā paṭhamagimhanāmake bālavasante nānāvidharukkhagahane
atk-s0501a0:895_1: vane supupphitaggasākho taruṇarukkhagacchapariyāyanāmo pagumbo ativiya sassiriko
atk-s0501a0:895_3: vā nānappakārehi atthappabhedapupphehi ativiya sassirikattā tathūpamaṃ nibbānagāmimaggadīpanato
atk-s0501a0:895_4: nibbānagāmiṃ pariyattidhammavaraṃ neva lābhahetu na sakkārādihetu, kevalantu mahākaruṇāya
atk-s0501a0:895_5: abbhussāhitahadayo sattānaṃ paramahitāya adesayīti. Paramaṃ hitāyāti ettha ca gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ
atk-s0501a0:895_6: anunāsiko. Ayaṃ panattho – paramahitāya nibbānāya adesayīti.
atk-s0501a0:896_0: Evaṃ bhagavā imaṃ supupphitaggavanappagumbasadisaṃ pariyattidhammaṃ vatvā idāni tameva
atk-s0501a0:896_1: nissāya buddhādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi buddhe”ti. Tassattho pubbe
atk-s0501a0:896_2: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Kevalaṃ pana idampi yathāvuttapakārapariyattidhammasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0501a0:896_3: buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītanti evaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu
atk-s0501a0:898_0: 14. Evaṃ bhagavā pariyattidhammena buddhādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vatvā idāni lokuttaradhammena
atk-s0501a0:898_1: vattumāraddho “varo varaññū”ti. Tattha varoti paṇītādhimuttikehi icchito “aho vata
atk-s0501a0:898_2: mayampi evarūpā assāmā”ti, varaguṇayogato vā varo uttamo seṭṭhoti attho. Varaññūti
atk-s0501a0:898_3: nibbānaññū. Nibbānañhi sabbadhammānaṃ uttamaṭṭhena varaṃ, tañcesa bodhimūle sayaṃ
atk-s0501a0:898_4: paṭivijjhitvā aññāsi. Varadoti pañcavaggiyabhaddavaggiyajaṭilādīnaṃ aññesañca devamanussānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:898_6: varāharoti vuccati. So hi bhagavā dīpaṅkarato pabhuti samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūrento
atk-s0501a0:898_7: pubbakehi sammāsambuddhehi anuyātaṃ purāṇamaggavaramāhari, tena “varāharo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0501a0:899_0: Apica sabbaññutaññāṇappaṭilābhena varo, nibbānasacchikiriyāya varaññū, sattānaṃ vimuttisukhadānena
atk-s0501a0:899_1: varado, uttamapaṭipadāharaṇena varāharo. Etehi lokuttaraguṇehi adhikassa kassaci
atk-s0501a0:900_0: Aparo nayo – varo upasamādhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇena, varaññū paññādhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇena,
atk-s0501a0:900_1: varado cāgādhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇena, varāharo saccādhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇena, varaṃ maggasaccamāharīti.
atk-s0501a0:900_2: Tathā varo puññussayena, varaññū paññussayena, varado buddhabhāvatthikānaṃ tadupāyasampadānena,
atk-s0501a0:900_3: varāharo paccekabuddhabhāvatthikānaṃ tadupāyāharaṇena, anuttaro tattha tattha asadisatāya,
atk-s0501a0:900_4: attanā vā anācariyako hutvā paresaṃ ācariyabhāvena, dhammavaraṃ adesayi sāvakabhāvatthikānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:900_5: tadatthāya svākkhātatādiguṇayuttassa dhammavarassa desanato. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0501a0:901_0: Evaṃ bhagavā navavidhena lokuttaradhammena attano guṇaṃ vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ
atk-s0501a0:901_1: nissāya buddhādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi buddhe”ti. Tassattho pubbe
atk-s0501a0:901_2: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Kevalaṃ pana yaṃ varaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ esa aññāsi, yañca
atk-s0501a0:901_3: adāsi, yañca āhari, yañca desesi, idampi buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītanti evaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:901_4: Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a0:903_0: 15. Evaṃ bhagavā pariyattidhammañca navalokuttaradhammañca nissāya dvīhi gāthāhi
atk-s0501a0:903_1: buddhādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vatvā idāni ye taṃ pariyattidhammaṃ assosuṃ, sutānusārena
atk-s0501a0:903_2: ca paṭipajjitvā navappakārampi lokuttaradhammaṃ adhigamiṃsu, tesaṃ anupādisesanibbānapattiguṇaṃ
atk-s0501a0:903_3: nissāya puna saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vattumāraddho “khīṇaṃ purāṇa”nti. Tattha khīṇanti
atk-s0501a0:903_4: samucchinnaṃ. Purāṇanti purātanaṃ. Navanti sampati vattamānaṃ. Natthi sambhavanti
atk-s0501a0:903_5: avijjamānapātubhāvaṃ. Virattacittāti vītarāgacittā. Āyatike bhavasminti anāgatamaddhānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:903_6: punabbhave. Teti yesaṃ khīṇaṃ purāṇaṃ navaṃ natthi sambhavaṃ, ye ca āyatike bhavasmiṃ
atk-s0501a0:903_7: virattacittā, te khīṇāsavā bhikkhū. Khīṇabījāti ucchinnabījā. Avirūḷhichandāti virūḷhichandavirahitā.
atk-s0501a0:903_8: Nibbantīti vijjhāyanti. Dhīrāti dhitisampannā. Yathāyaṃ padīpoti ayaṃ padīpo viya.
atk-s0501a0:904_0: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yaṃ taṃ sattānaṃ uppajjitvā niruddhampi purāṇaṃ atītakālikaṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0501a0:904_1: taṇhāsinehassa appahīnattā paṭisandhiāharaṇasamatthatāya akhīṇaṃyeva hoti, taṃ purāṇaṃ
atk-s0501a0:904_2: kammaṃ yesaṃ arahattamaggena taṇhāsinehassa sositattā agginā daḍḍhabījamiva āyatiṃ
atk-s0501a0:904_3: vipākadānāsamatthatāya khīṇaṃ. Yañca nesaṃ buddhapūjādivasena idāni pavattamānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:904_4: kammaṃ navanti vuccati, tañca taṇhāpahāneneva chinnamūlapādapapupphamiva āyatiṃ phaladānāsamatthatāya
atk-s0501a0:904_5: yesaṃ natthi sambhavaṃ, ye ca taṇhāpahāneneva āyatike bhavasmiṃ virattacittā, te
atk-s0501a0:904_6: khīṇāsavā bhikkhū “kammaṃ khettaṃ viññāṇaṃ bīja”nti ettha vuttassa paṭisandhiviññāṇassa
atk-s0501a0:904_7: kammakkhayeneva khīṇattā khīṇabījā. Yopi pubbe punabbhavasaṅkhātāya virūḷhiyā chando
atk-s0501a0:904_8: ahosi. Tassapi samudayappahāneneva pahīnattā pubbe viya cutikāle asambhavena avirūḷhichandā
atk-s0501a0:904_9: dhitisampannattā dhīrā carimaviññāṇanirodhena yathāyaṃ padīpo nibbuto, evaṃ nibbanti,
atk-s0501a0:904_10: puna “rūpino vā arūpino vā”ti evamādiṃ paññattipathaṃ accentīti. Tasmiṃ kira samaye
atk-s0501a0:904_11: nagaradevatānaṃ pūjanatthāya jālitesu padīpesu eko padīpo vijjhāyi, taṃ dassento
atk-s0501a0:905_0: Evaṃ bhagavā ye taṃ purimāhi dvīhi gāthāhi vuttaṃ pariyattidhammaṃ assosuṃ, sutānusārena
atk-s0501a0:905_1: ca paṭipajjitvā navappakārampi lokuttaradhammaṃ adhigamiṃsu, tesaṃ anupādisesanibbānapattiguṇaṃ
atk-s0501a0:905_2: vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccavacanaṃ payuñjanto desanaṃ
atk-s0501a0:905_3: samāpesi “idampi saṅghe”ti. Tassattho pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Kevalaṃ pana
atk-s0501a0:905_4: idampi yathāvuttena pakārena khīṇāsavabhikkhūnaṃ nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ saṅghe ratanaṃ
atk-s0501a0:905_5: paṇītanti evaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a0:906: Desanāpariyosāne rājakulassa sotthi ahosi, sabbūpaddavā vūpasamiṃsu, caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0501a0:908_0: 16. Atha sakko devānamindo “bhagavatā ratanattayaguṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjamānena
atk-s0501a0:908_1: nāgarassa sotthi katā, mayāpi nāgarassa sotthitthaṃ ratanattayaguṇaṃ nissāya kiñci
atk-s0501a0:908_2: vattabba”nti cintetvā avasāne gāthāttayaṃ abhāsi “yānīdha bhūtānī”ti tattha yasmā
atk-s0501a0:908_3: buddho yathā lokahitatthāya ussukkaṃ āpannehi āgantabbaṃ, tathā āgatato yathā ca
atk-s0501a0:908_4: tehi gantabbaṃ, tathā gatato yathā ca tehi ājānitabbaṃ, tathā ājānanato, yathā ca
atk-s0501a0:908_5: jānitabbaṃ, tathā jānanato, yañca tatheva hoti, tassa gadanato ca “tathāgato”ti vuccati.
atk-s0501a0:908_6: Yasmā ca so devamanussehi pupphagandhādinā bahi nibbattena upakārakena, dhammānudhammapaṭipattādinā
atk-s0501a0:908_7: ca attani nibbattena ativiya pūjito, tasmā sakko devānamindo sabbaṃ devaparisaṃ attanā
atk-s0501a0:908_8: saddhiṃ sampiṇḍetvā āha “tathāgataṃ devamanussapūjitaṃ, buddhaṃ namassāma suvatthi hotū”ti.
atk-s0501a0:909_0: 17. Yasmā pana dhamme maggadhammo yathā yuganaddhasamathavipassanābalena gantabbaṃ
atk-s0501a0:909_1: kilesapakkhaṃ samucchindantena, tathā gatoti tathāgato. Nibbānadhammopi yathā gato
atk-s0501a0:909_2: paññāya paṭividdho sabbadukkhappaṭivighātāya sampajjati, buddhādīhi tathā avagato,
atk-s0501a0:909_3: tasmā “tathāgato”tveva vuccati. Yasmā ca saṅghopi yathā attahitāya paṭipannehi gantabbaṃ
atk-s0501a0:909_4: tena tena maggena, tathā gatoti “tathāgato”tveva vuccati. Tasmā avasesagāthādvayepi
atk-s0501a0:909_5: tathāgataṃ dhammaṃ namassāma suvatthi hotu, tathāgataṃ saṅghaṃ namassāma suvatthi
atk-s0501a0:910_0: Evaṃ sakko devānamindo imaṃ gāthāttayaṃ bhāsitvā bhagavantaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā devapurameva
atk-s0501a0:910_1: gato saddhiṃ devaparisāya. Bhagavā pana tadeva ratanasuttaṃ dutiyadivasepi desesi,
atk-s0501a0:910_2: puna caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi, evaṃ yāva sattamadivasaṃ
atk-s0501a0:910_3: desesi, divase divase tatheva dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Bhagavā aḍḍhamāsameva vesāliyaṃ
atk-s0501a0:910_4: viharitvā rājūnaṃ “gacchāmā”ti paṭivedesi. Tato rājāno diguṇena sakkārena puna tīhi
atk-s0501a0:910_5: divasehi bhagavantaṃ gaṅgātīraṃ nayiṃsu. Gaṅgāya nibbattā nāgarājāno cintesuṃ “manussā
atk-s0501a0:910_6: tathāgatassa sakkāraṃ karonti, mayaṃ kiṃ na karissāmā”ti suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimayā nāvāyo
atk-s0501a0:910_7: māpetvā suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimaye eva pallaṅke paññapetvā pañcavaṇṇapadumasañchannaṃ
atk-s0501a0:910_8: udakaṃ karitvā “amhākaṃ anuggahaṃ karothā”ti bhagavantaṃ yāciṃsu. Bhagavā adhivāsetvā
atk-s0501a0:910_9: ratananāvamārūḷho, pañca ca bhikkhusatāni pañcasataṃ nāvāyo abhirūḷhā. Nāgarājāno
atk-s0501a0:910_10: bhagavantaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena nāgabhavanaṃ pavesesuṃ. Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā sabbarattiṃ
atk-s0501a0:910_11: nāgaparisāya dhammaṃ desesi. Dutiyadivase dibbehi khādanīyabhojanīyehi mahādānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:911_0: Bhūmaṭṭhā devā “manussā ca nāgā ca tathāgatassa sakkāraṃ karonti, mayaṃ kiṃ na karissāmā”ti
atk-s0501a0:911_1: cintetvā vanappagumbarukkhapabbatādīsu chattātichattāni ukkhipiṃsu. Eteneva upāyena
atk-s0501a0:911_2: yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmabhavanaṃ, tāva mahāsakkāraviseso nibbatti. Bimbisāropi licchavīhi
atk-s0501a0:911_3: āgatakāle katasakkārato diguṇamakāsi. Pubbe vuttanayeneva pañcahi divasehi bhagavantaṃ rājagahaṃ ānesi.
atk-s0501a0:912_0: Rājagahamanuppatte bhagavati pacchābhattaṃ maṇḍalamāḷe sannipatitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0501a0:912_1: ayamantarakathā udapādi “aho buddhassa bhagavato ānubhāvo, yaṃ uddissa gaṅgāya orato
atk-s0501a0:912_2: ca pārato ca aṭṭhayojano bhūmibhāgo ninnañca thalañca samaṃ katvā vālukāya okiritvā
atk-s0501a0:912_3: pupphehi sañchanno, yojanappamāṇaṃ gaṅgāya udakaṃ nānāvaṇṇehi padumehi sañchannaṃ,
atk-s0501a0:912_4: yāva akaniṭṭhabhavanaṃ, tāva chattātichattāni ussitānī”ti. Bhagavā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā
atk-s0501a0:912_5: gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā taṅkhaṇānurūpena pāṭihāriyena gantvā maṇḍalamāḷe paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0501a0:912_6: nisīdi. Nisajja kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi – “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya
atk-s0501a0:912_7: sannisinnā”ti. Bhikkhū sabbaṃ ārocesuṃ bhagavā etadavoca – “na, bhikkhave, ayaṃ pūjāviseso
atk-s0501a0:912_8: mayhaṃ buddhānubhāvena nibbatto, na nāgadevabrahmānubhāvena, apica kho pubbe appamattakapariccāgānubhāvena
atk-s0501a0:912_9: nibbatto”ti. Bhikkhū āhaṃsu “na mayaṃ, bhante, taṃ appamattakaṃ pariccāgaṃ jānāma,
atk-s0501a0:912_10: sādhu no bhagavā tathā kathetu, yathā mayaṃ taṃ jāneyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0501a0:913_0: Bhagavā āha – bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, takkasilāyaṃ saṅkho nāma brāhmaṇo ahosi. Tassa
atk-s0501a0:913_1: putto susīmo nāma māṇavo soḷasavassuddesiko vayena. So ekadivasaṃ pitaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0501a0:913_2: abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Atha taṃ pitā āha “kiṃ, tāta, susīmā”ti? So āha “icchāmahaṃ,
atk-s0501a0:913_3: tāta, bārāṇasiṃ gantvā sippaṃ uggahetu”nti. “Tena hi, tāta, susīma, asuko nāma brāhmaṇo
atk-s0501a0:913_4: mama sahāyako, tassa santikaṃ gantvā uggaṇhāhī”ti kahāpaṇasahassaṃ adāsi. So taṃ
atk-s0501a0:913_5: gahetvā mātāpitaro abhivādetvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ gantvā upacārayuttena vidhinā
atk-s0501a0:913_6: ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā abhivādetvā attānaṃ nivedesi. Ācariyo “mama sahāyakassa putto”ti
atk-s0501a0:913_7: māṇavaṃ sampaṭicchitvā sabbaṃ pāhuneyyavattamakāsi. So addhānakilamathaṃ vinodetvā
atk-s0501a0:913_8: taṃ kahāpaṇasahassaṃ ācariyassa pādamūle ṭhapetvā sippaṃ uggahetuṃ okāsaṃ yāci. Ācariyo
atk-s0501a0:914_0: So lahuñca gaṇhanto, bahuñca gaṇhanto, gahitagahitañca suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittatelamiva
atk-s0501a0:914_1: avinassamānaṃ dhārento, dvādasavassikaṃ sippaṃ katipayamāseneva pariyosāpesi. So
atk-s0501a0:914_2: sajjhāyaṃ karonto ādimajjhaṃyeva passati, no pariyosānaṃ. Atha ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0501a0:914_3: āha “imassa sippassa ādimajjhameva passāmi, no pariyosāna”nti. Ācariyo āha “ahampi,
atk-s0501a0:914_4: tāta, evamevā”ti. Atha ko, ācariya, imassa sippassa pariyosānaṃ jānātīti? Isipatane,
atk-s0501a0:914_5: tāta, isayo atthi, te jāneyyunti. Te upasaṅkamitvā pucchāmi, ācariyāti? Puccha, tāta,
atk-s0501a0:914_6: yathāsukhanti. So isipatanaṃ gantvā paccekabuddhe upasaṅkamitvā pucchi “api, bhante,
atk-s0501a0:914_7: pariyosānaṃ jānāthā”ti? Āma, āvuso, jānāmāti. Taṃ mampi sikkhāpethāti. Tena hāvuso,
atk-s0501a0:914_8: pabbajāhi, na sakkā apabbajitena sikkhāpetunti. Sādhu, bhante, pabbājetha vā maṃ,
atk-s0501a0:914_9: yaṃ vā icchatha, taṃ katvā pariyosānaṃ jānāpethāti. Te taṃ pabbājetvā kammaṭṭhāne
atk-s0501a0:914_10: niyojetuṃ asamatthā “evaṃ te nivāsetabbaṃ, evaṃ pārupitabba”ntiādinā nayena ābhisamācārikaṃ
atk-s0501a0:914_11: sikkhāpesuṃ. So tattha sikkhanto upanissayasampannattā na cireneva paccekabodhiṃ
atk-s0501a0:914_13: sampannaparivāro. So appāyukasaṃvattanikassa kammassa katattā na cireneva parinibbāyi.
atk-s0501a0:914_14: Tassa paccekabuddhā ca mahājanakāyo ca sarīrakiccaṃ katvā dhātuyo gahetvā nagaradvāre
atk-s0501a0:915_0: Atha kho saṅkho brāhmaṇo “putto me ciragato, na cassa pavattiṃ jānāmī”ti puttaṃ daṭṭhukāmo
atk-s0501a0:915_1: takkasilāya nikkhamitvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ gantvā mahājanakāyaṃ sannipatitaṃ disvā
atk-s0501a0:915_2: “addhā bahūsu ekopi me puttassa pavattiṃ jānissatī”ti cintento upasaṅkamitvā pucchi
atk-s0501a0:915_3: “susīmo nāma māṇavo idha āgato atthi, api nu tassa pavattiṃ jānāthā”ti? Te “āma,
atk-s0501a0:915_4: brāhmaṇa, jānāma, imasmiṃ nagare brāhmaṇassa santike tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū hutvā
atk-s0501a0:915_5: paccekabuddhānaṃ santike pabbajitvā paccekabuddho hutvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
atk-s0501a0:915_6: parinibbāyi, ayamassa thūpo patiṭṭhāpito”ti āhaṃsu. So bhūmiṃ hatthena paharitvā
atk-s0501a0:915_7: roditvā ca paridevitvā ca taṃ cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā tiṇāni uddharitvā uttarasāṭakena
atk-s0501a0:915_8: vālukaṃ ānetvā paccekabuddhacetiyaṅgaṇe okiritvā kamaṇḍaluto udakena samantato bhūmiṃ
atk-s0501a0:915_9: paripphositvā vanapupphehi pūjaṃ katvā uttarasāṭakena paṭākaṃ āropetvā thūpassa upari
atk-s0501a0:916_0: Evaṃ atītaṃ desetvā jātakaṃ paccuppannena anusandhento bhikkhūnaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0501a0:916_1: “Siyā kho pana vo, bhikkhave, evamassa ‘añño nūna tena samayena saṅkho brāhmaṇo ahosī’ti,
atk-s0501a0:916_2: na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, ahaṃ tena samayena saṅkho brāhmaṇo ahosiṃ, mayā susīmassa
atk-s0501a0:916_3: paccekabuddhassa cetiyaṅgaṇe tiṇāni uddhaṭāni, tassa me kammassa nissandena aṭṭhayojanamaggaṃ
atk-s0501a0:916_4: vigatakhāṇukaṇṭakaṃ katvā samaṃ suddhamakaṃsu. Mayā tattha vālukā okiṇṇā, tassa me
atk-s0501a0:916_5: nissandena aṭṭhayojanamagge vālukaṃ okiriṃsu. Mayā tattha vanakusumehi pūjā katā,
atk-s0501a0:916_6: tassa me nissandena navayojane magge thale ca udake ca nānāpupphehi pupphasantharamakaṃsu.
atk-s0501a0:916_7: Mayā tattha kamaṇḍaludakena bhūmi paripphositā, tassa me nissandena vesāliyaṃ pokkharavassaṃ
atk-s0501a0:916_8: vassi. Mayā tasmiṃ cetiye paṭākā āropitā, chattañca baddhaṃ, tassa me nissandena
atk-s0501a0:916_9: yāva akaniṭṭhabhavanā paṭākā ca āropitā, chattātichattāni ca ussitāni. Iti kho, bhikkhave,
atk-s0501a0:916_10: ayaṃ mayhaṃ pūjāviseso neva buddhānubhāvena nibbatto, na nāgadevabrahmānubhāvena,
atk-s0501a0:916_11: apica kho appamattakapariccāgānubhāvena nibbatto”ti. Dhammakathāpariyosāne imaṃ gāthamabhāsi –
atk-s0501a0:918: Caje mattāsukhaṃ dhīro, sampassaṃ vipulaṃ sukha”nti. ;
atk-s0501a0:923: Idāni “tirokuṭṭesu tiṭṭhantī”tiādinā ratanasuttānantaraṃ nikkhittassa tirokuṭṭasuttassa atthavaṇṇanākkamo anuppatto, tassa idha nikkhepappayojanaṃ vatvā atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma.
atk-s0501a0:924_0: Tattha idañhi tirokuṭṭaṃ iminā anukkamena bhagavatā avuttampi yāyaṃ ito pubbe nānappakārena
atk-s0501a0:924_1: kusalakammapaṭipatti dassitā, tattha pamādaṃ āpajjamāno nirayatiracchānayonīhi visiṭṭhatarepi
atk-s0501a0:924_2: ṭhāne uppajjamāno yasmā evarūpesu petesu uppajjati, tasmā na ettha pamādo karaṇīyoti
atk-s0501a0:924_3: dassanatthaṃ, yehi ca bhūtehi upaddutāya vesāliyā upaddavavūpasamanatthaṃ ratanasuttaṃ
atk-s0501a0:924_4: vuttaṃ, tesu ekaccāni evarūpānīti dassanatthaṃ vā vuttanti.
atk-s0501a0:930: Sukatā hoti tasmāhaṃ, karissāmi tatheva taṃ”.
atk-s0501a0:931_0: Kena panetaṃ pakāsitaṃ, kattha kadā kasmā cāti? Vuccate – bhagavatā pakāsitaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0501a0:931_1: kho pana rājagahe dutiyadivase rañño māgadhassa anumodanatthaṃ. Imassa catthassa
atk-s0501a0:932_0: Ito dvānavutikappe kāsi nāma nagaraṃ ahosi. Tattha jayaseno nāma rājā. Tassa sirimā
atk-s0501a0:932_1: nāma devī, tassā kucchiyaṃ phusso nāma bodhisatto nibbattitvā anupubbena sammāsambodhiṃ
atk-s0501a0:932_2: abhisambujjhi. Jayaseno rājā “mama putto abhinikkhamitvā buddho jāto, mayhameva buddho,
atk-s0501a0:932_3: mayhaṃ dhammo, mayhaṃ saṅgho”ti mamattaṃ uppādetvā sabbakālaṃ sayameva upaṭṭhahati,
atk-s0501a0:933_0: Bhagavato kaniṭṭhabhātaro vemātikā tayo bhātaro cintesuṃ – “buddhā nāma sabbalokahitāya
atk-s0501a0:933_1: uppajjanti, na cekassevatthāya, amhākañca pitā aññesaṃ okāsaṃ na deti, kathaṃ nu
atk-s0501a0:933_2: mayaṃ labheyyāma bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhātu”nti. Tesaṃ etadahosi – “handa mayaṃ kiñci
atk-s0501a0:933_3: upāyaṃ karomā”ti. Te paccantaṃ kupitaṃ viya kārāpesuṃ. Tato rājā “paccanto kupito”ti
atk-s0501a0:933_4: sutvā tayopi putte paccantavūpasamanatthaṃ pesesi. Te vūpasametvā āgatā, rājā tuṭṭho
atk-s0501a0:933_5: varaṃ adāsi “yaṃ icchatha, taṃ gaṇhathā”ti. Te “mayaṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ icchāmā”ti
atk-s0501a0:933_6: āhaṃsu. Rājā “etaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ gaṇhathā”ti āha. Te “mayaṃ aññena anatthikā”ti
atk-s0501a0:933_7: āhaṃsu. Tena hi paricchedaṃ katvā gaṇhathāti. Te satta vassāni yāciṃsu, rājā na adāsi.
atk-s0501a0:933_8: Evaṃ cha, pañca, cattāri, tīṇi, dve, ekaṃ, satta māsāni, cha, pañca, cattārīti yāva
atk-s0501a0:934_0: Te varaṃ labhitvā paramatuṭṭhā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā āhaṃsu – “icchāma
atk-s0501a0:934_1: mayaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ temāsaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ, adhivāsetu no, bhante, bhagavā imaṃ
atk-s0501a0:934_2: temāsaṃ vassāvāsa”nti. Adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena. Tato te attano janapade niyuttakapurisassa
atk-s0501a0:934_3: lekhaṃ pesesuṃ “imaṃ temāsaṃ amhehi bhagavā upaṭṭhātabbo, vihāraṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ
atk-s0501a0:934_4: bhagavato upaṭṭhānasambhāraṃ karohī”ti. So taṃ sabbaṃ sampādetvā paṭinivedesi. Te
atk-s0501a0:934_5: kāsāyavatthanivatthā hutvā aḍḍhateyyehi purisasahassehi veyyāvaccakarehi bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0501a0:934_6: sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahamānā janapadaṃ netvā vihāraṃ niyyātetvā vasāpesuṃ.
atk-s0501a0:935_0: Tesaṃ bhaṇḍāgāriko eko gahapatiputto sapajāpatiko saddho ahosi pasanno. So buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0501a0:935_1: saṅghassa dānavattaṃ sakkaccaṃ adāsi. Janapade niyuttakapuriso taṃ gahetvā jānapadehi
atk-s0501a0:935_2: ekādasamattehi purisasahassehi saddhiṃ sakkaccameva dānaṃ pavattāpesi. Tattha keci
atk-s0501a0:935_3: jānapadā paṭihatacittā ahesuṃ. Te dānassa antarāyaṃ katvā deyyadhamme attanā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0501a0:935_4: bhattasālañca agginā dahiṃsu. Pavārite rājaputtā bhagavato mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā
atk-s0501a0:935_5: bhagavantaṃ purakkhatvā pituno sakāsameva agamaṃsu. Tattha gantvā eva bhagavā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0501a0:935_6: Rājā ca rājaputtā ca janapade niyuttakapuriso ca bhaṇḍāgāriko ca anupubbena kālaṃ
atk-s0501a0:935_7: katvā saddhiṃ parisāya sagge uppajjiṃsu, paṭihatacittajanā nirayesu nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0501a0:935_8: Evaṃ tesaṃ dvinnaṃ gaṇānaṃ saggato saggaṃ, nirayato nirayaṃ upapajjantānaṃ dvānavutikappā vītivattā.
atk-s0501a0:936_0: Atha imasmiṃ bhaddakappe kassapabuddhassa kāle te paṭihatacittajanā petesu uppannā.
atk-s0501a0:936_1: Tadā manussā attano ñātakānaṃ petānaṃ atthāya dānaṃ datvā uddisanti “idaṃ amhākaṃ
atk-s0501a0:936_2: ñātīnaṃ hotū”ti. Te sampattiṃ labhanti. Atha imepi petā taṃ disvā bhagavantaṃ kassapaṃ
atk-s0501a0:936_3: upasaṅkamitvā pucchiṃsu – “kiṃ nu kho, bhante, mayampi evarūpaṃ sampattiṃ labheyyāmā”ti?
atk-s0501a0:936_4: Bhagavā āha – “idāni na labhatha, apica anāgate gotamo nāma buddho bhavissati, tassa
atk-s0501a0:936_5: bhagavato kāle bimbisāro nāma rājā bhavissati, so tumhākaṃ ito dvānavutikappe ñāti
atk-s0501a0:936_6: ahosi, so buddhassa dānaṃ datvā tumhākaṃ uddisissati, tadā labhissathā”ti. Evaṃ vutte
atk-s0501a0:936_7: kira tesaṃ petānaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ “sve labhissathā”ti vuttaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0501a0:937_0: Atha ekasmiṃ buddhantare vītivatte amhākaṃ bhagavā loke uppajji. Tepi tayo rājaputtā
atk-s0501a0:937_1: tehi aḍḍhateyyehi purisasahassehi saddhiṃ devalokā cavitvā magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0501a0:937_2: uppajjitvā anupubbena isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā gayāsīse tayo jaṭilā ahesuṃ, janapade
atk-s0501a0:937_3: niyuttakapuriso, rājā ahosi bimbisāro, bhaṇḍāgāriko, gahapati visākho nāma mahāseṭṭhi
atk-s0501a0:937_4: ahosi, tassa pajāpati dhammadinnā nāma seṭṭhidhītā ahosi. Evaṃ sabbāpi avasesā parisā
atk-s0501a0:938_0: Amhākaṃ bhagavā loke uppajjitvā sattasattāhaṃ atikkamitvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ āgamma
atk-s0501a0:938_1: dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā pañcavaggiye ādiṃ katvā yāva aḍḍhateyyasahassaparivāre tayo
atk-s0501a0:938_2: jaṭile vinetvā rājagahaṃ agamāsi. Tattha ca tadahupasaṅkamantaṃyeva rājānaṃ bimbisāraṃ
atk-s0501a0:938_3: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpesi ekādasanavutehi māgadhakehi brāhmaṇagahapatikehi saddhiṃ.
atk-s0501a0:938_4: Atha raññā svātanāya bhattena nimantito bhagavā adhivāsetvā dutiyadivase sakkena
atk-s0501a0:941_0: Evamādīhi gāthāhi abhitthaviyamāno rājagahaṃ pavisitvā rañño nivesane mahādānaṃ sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0501a0:941_1: Te petā “idāni rājā amhākaṃ dānaṃ uddisissati, idāni uddisissatī”ti āsāya parivāretvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0501a0:942_0: Rājā dānaṃ datvā “kattha nu kho bhagavā vihareyyā”ti bhagavato vihāraṭṭhānameva cintesi,
atk-s0501a0:942_1: na taṃ dānaṃ kassaci uddisi. Petā chinnāsā hutvā rattiṃ rañño nivesane ativiya bhiṃsanakaṃ
atk-s0501a0:942_2: vissaramakaṃsu. Rājā bhayasaṃvegasantāsamāpajji, tato pabhātāya rattiyā bhagavato
atk-s0501a0:942_3: ārocesi – “evarūpaṃ saddamassosiṃ, kiṃ nu kho me, bhante, bhavissatī”ti. Bhagavā
atk-s0501a0:942_4: āha – “mā bhāyi, mahārāja, na te kiñci pāpakaṃ bhavissati, apica kho te purāṇañātakā
atk-s0501a0:942_5: petesu uppannā santi, te ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ tameva paccāsīsamānā vicaranti ‘buddhassa
atk-s0501a0:942_6: dānaṃ datvā amhākaṃ uddisissatī’ti, na tesaṃ tvaṃ hiyyo uddisi, te chinnāsā tathārūpaṃ vissaramakaṃsū”ti.
atk-s0501a0:943_0: So āha “idāni pana, bhante, dinne labheyyu”nti? “Āma, mahārājā”ti. “Tena hi me, bhante,
atk-s0501a0:943_1: adhivāsetu bhagavā ajjatanāya dānaṃ, tesaṃ uddisissāmī”ti? Bhagavā adhivāsesi. Rājā
atk-s0501a0:943_2: nivesanaṃ gantvā mahādānaṃ paṭiyādetvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesi. Bhagavā rājantepuraṃ
atk-s0501a0:943_3: gantvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena. Tepi kho petā “api nāma ajja
atk-s0501a0:943_4: labheyyāmā”ti gantvā tirokuṭṭādīsu aṭṭhaṃsu. Bhagavā tathā akāsi, yathā te sabbeva
atk-s0501a0:943_5: rañño pākaṭā ahesuṃ. Rājā dakkhiṇodakaṃ dento “idaṃ me ñātīnaṃ hotū”ti uddisi, taṅkhaṇaññeva
atk-s0501a0:943_6: tesaṃ petānaṃ padumasañchannā pokkharaṇiyo nibbattiṃsu. Te tattha nhatvā ca pivitvā
atk-s0501a0:943_7: ca paṭippassaddhadarathakilamathapipāsā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā ahesuṃ. Rājā yāgukhajjakabhojanāni
atk-s0501a0:943_8: datvā uddisi, taṅkhaṇaññeva tesaṃ dibbayāgukhajjakabhojanāni nibbattiṃsu. Te tāni
atk-s0501a0:943_9: paribhuñjitvā pīṇindriyā ahesuṃ. Atha vatthasenāsanāni datvā uddisi. Tesaṃ dibbavatthadibbayānadibbapāsādadibbapaccattharaṇadibbaseyyādialaṅkāravidhayo
atk-s0501a0:943_10: nibbattiṃsu. Sāpi tesaṃ sampatti yathā sabbāva pākaṭā hoti, tathā bhagavā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0501a0:943_11: Rājā ativiya attamano ahosi. Tato bhagavā bhuttāvī pavārito rañño māgadhassa anumodanatthaṃ
atk-s0501a0:944: Ettāvatā ca “yena yattha yadā yasmā, tirokuṭṭaṃ pakāsitaṃ, pakāsetvāna taṃ sabba”nti ayaṃ mātikā saṅkhepato vitthārato ca vibhattā hoti.
atk-s0501a0:946_0: 1. Idāni imassa tirokuṭṭassa yathākkamaṃ atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma. Seyyathidaṃ – paṭhamagāthāya
atk-s0501a0:946_1: tāva tirokuṭṭāti kuṭṭānaṃ parabhāgā vuccanti. Tiṭṭhantīti nisajjādippaṭikkhepato
atk-s0501a0:946_2: ṭhānakappanavacanametaṃ. Tena yathā pākāraparabhāgaṃ pabbataparabhāgañca gacchantaṃ
atk-s0501a0:946_3: “tiropākāraṃ tiropabbataṃ asajjamāno gacchatī”ti vadanti, evamidhāpi kuṭṭassa parabhāgesu
atk-s0501a0:946_4: tiṭṭhante “tirokuṭṭesu tiṭṭhantī”ti āha. Sandhisiṅghāṭakesu cāti ettha sandhiyoti
atk-s0501a0:946_6: tikoṇaracchā vuccanti, tadekajjhaṃ katvā purimena saddhiṃ saṅghaṭento “sandhisiṅghāṭakesu
atk-s0501a0:946_7: cā”ti āha. Dvārabāhāsu tiṭṭhantīti nagaradvāragharadvārānaṃ bāhā nissāya tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0501a0:946_8: Āgantvāna sakaṃ gharanti ettha sakaṃ gharaṃ nāma pubbañātigharampi attanā sāmikabhāvena
atk-s0501a0:946_9: ajjhāvutthapubbagharampi. Tadubhayampi yasmā te sakagharasaññāya āgacchanti, tasmā
atk-s0501a0:948_0: 2. Evaṃ bhagavā pubbe anajjhāvutthapubbampi pubbañātigharaṃ bimbisāranivesanaṃ sakagharasaññāya
atk-s0501a0:948_4: udarato uṭṭhāya mukhato viniccharantāya aggijālāya pariḍayhamānasarīre, appekacce
atk-s0501a0:948_5: sūcichiddāṇumattakaṇṭhabilatāya pabbatākārakucchitāya ca laddhampi pānabhojanaṃ yāvadatthaṃ
atk-s0501a0:948_6: bhuñjituṃ asamatthatāya khuppipāsāparete aññaṃ rasamavindamāne, appekacce aññamaññassa
atk-s0501a0:948_7: aññesaṃ vā sattānaṃ pabhinnagaṇḍapiḷakamukhā paggharitarudhirapubbalasikādiṃ laddhā
atk-s0501a0:948_8: amatamiva sāyamāne ativiya duddasikavirūpabhayānakasarīre bahū pete rañño nidassento –
atk-s0501a0:951: Vatvā puna tehi katassa kammassa dāruṇabhāvaṃ dassento “pahūte annapānamhī”ti dutiyagāthamāha.
atk-s0501a0:952_0: Tattha pahūteti anappake bahumhi, yāvadatthiketi vuttaṃ hoti. Bha-kārassa hi ha-kāro
atk-s0501a0:952_1: labbhati “pahu santo na bharatī”tiādīsu viya. Keci pana “bahūte” iti ca “bahūke”
atk-s0501a0:952_2: iti ca paṭhanti. Pamādapāṭhā ete. Anne ca pānamhi ca annapānamhi. Khajje ca bhojje
atk-s0501a0:952_3: ca khajjabhojje, etena asitapītakhāyitasāyitavasena catubbidhaṃ āhāraṃ dasseti. Upaṭṭhiteti
atk-s0501a0:952_4: upagamma ṭhite, sajjite paṭiyatte samohiteti vuttaṃ hoti. Na tesaṃ koci sarati, sattānanti
atk-s0501a0:952_5: tesaṃ pettivisaye uppannānaṃ sattānaṃ koci mātā vā pitā vā putto vā na sarati. Kiṃ
atk-s0501a0:952_6: kāraṇā? Kammapaccayā, attanā katassa adānadānappaṭisedhanādibhedassa kadariyakammassa
atk-s0501a0:952_7: paccayā. Tañhi tesaṃ kammaṃ ñātīnaṃ sarituṃ na deti.
atk-s0501a0:954_0: 3. Evaṃ bhagavā anappakepi annapānādimhi paccupaṭṭhite “api nāma amhe uddissa kiñci
atk-s0501a0:954_1: dadeyyu”nti ñātī paccāsīsantānaṃ vicarataṃ tesaṃ petānaṃ tehi katassa atikaṭukavipākakarassa
atk-s0501a0:954_2: kammassa paccayena kassaci ñātino anussaraṇamattābhāvaṃ dassento –
atk-s0501a0:956: Na tesaṃ koci sarati, sattānaṃ kammapaccayā”ti. –
atk-s0501a0:957: Vatvā puna rañño pettivisayūpapanne ñātake uddissa dinnaṃ dānaṃ pasaṃsanto “evaṃ dadanti ñātīna”nti tatiyagāthamāha.
atk-s0501a0:958_0: Tattha evanti upamāvacanaṃ. Tassa dvidhā sambandho – tesaṃ sattānaṃ kammapaccayā
atk-s0501a0:958_1: asarantepi kismiñci dadanti, ñātīnaṃ, ye evaṃ anukampakā hontīti ca yathā tayā, mahārāja,
atk-s0501a0:958_2: dinnaṃ, evaṃ suciṃ paṇītaṃ kālena kappiyaṃ pānabhojanaṃ dadanti ñātīnaṃ, ye honti
atk-s0501a0:958_3: anukampakāti ca. Dadantīti denti uddisanti niyyātenti. Ñātīnanti mātito ca pitito
atk-s0501a0:958_4: ca sambandhānaṃ. Yeti ye keci puttā vā dhītaro vā bhātaro vā hontīti bhavanti. Anukampakāti
atk-s0501a0:958_5: atthakāmā hitesino. Sucinti vimalaṃ dassaneyyaṃ manoramaṃ dhammikaṃ dhammaladdhaṃ.
atk-s0501a0:958_6: Paṇītanti uttamaṃ seṭṭhaṃ. Kālenāti ñātipetānaṃ tirokuṭṭādīsu āgantvā ṭhitakālena.
atk-s0501a0:958_7: Kappiyanti anucchavikaṃ patirūpaṃ ariyānaṃ paribhogārahaṃ. Pānabhojananti pānañca
atk-s0501a0:958_8: bhojanañca. Idha pānabhojanamukhena sabbopi deyyadhammo adhippeto.
atk-s0501a0:960: 4. Evaṃ bhagavā raññā māgadhena petabhūtānaṃ ñātīnaṃ anukampāya dinnaṃ pānabhojanaṃ pasaṃsanto –
atk-s0501a0:963: Vatvā puna yena pakārena dinnaṃ tesaṃ hoti, taṃ dassento “idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ hotū”ti catutthagāthāya pubbaddhamāha taṃ tatiyagāthāya pubbaddhena sambandhitabbaṃ –
atk-s0501a0:965: Idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ hotu, sukhitā hontu ñātayo”ti.
atk-s0501a0:966: Tena “idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ hotūti evaṃ dadanti, no aññathā”ti ettha ākāratthena evaṃsaddena dātabbākāranidassanaṃ kataṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a0:967_0: Tattha idanti deyyadhammanidassanaṃ. Voti “kacci pana vo anuruddhā samaggā sammodamānā”ti
atk-s0501a0:967_1: ca, “yehi vo ariyā”ti ca evamādīsu viya kevalaṃ nipātamattaṃ, na sāmivacanaṃ. Ñātīnaṃ
atk-s0501a0:967_2: hotūti pettivisaye uppannānaṃ ñātakānaṃ hotu. Sukhitā hontu ñātayoti te pettivisayūpapannā
atk-s0501a0:969_0: 4-5. Evaṃ bhagavā yena pakārena pettivisayūpapannānaṃ ñātīnaṃ dātabbaṃ, taṃ dassento
atk-s0501a0:969_1: “idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ hotu, sukhitā hontu ñātayo”ti vatvā puna yasmā “idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ
atk-s0501a0:969_2: hotū”ti vuttepi na aññena kataṃ kammaṃ aññassa phaladaṃ hoti, kevalantu tathā uddissa
atk-s0501a0:969_3: diyyamānaṃ taṃ vatthu ñātīnaṃ kusalakammassa paccayo hoti. Tasmā yathā tesaṃ tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0501a0:969_4: vatthusmiṃ taṅkhaṇe phalanibbattakaṃ kusalakammaṃ hoti, taṃ dassento “te ca tatthā”ti
atk-s0501a0:969_5: catutthagāthāya pacchimaddhaṃ “pahūte annapānamhī”ti pañcamagāthāya pubbaddhañca āha.
atk-s0501a0:970_0: Tesaṃ attho – te ñātipetā yattha taṃ dānaṃ dīyati, tattha samantato āgantvā samāgantvā,
atk-s0501a0:970_1: samodhāya vā ekajjhaṃ hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti, sammā āgatā samāgatā “ime no ñātayo amhākaṃ
atk-s0501a0:970_2: atthāya dānaṃ uddisissantī”ti etadatthaṃ sammā āgatā hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Pahūte
atk-s0501a0:970_3: annapānamhīti tasmiṃ attano uddissamāne pahūte annapānamhi. Sakkaccaṃ anumodareti
atk-s0501a0:970_4: abhisaddahantā kammaphalaṃ avijahantā cittīkāraṃ avikkhittacittā hutvā “idaṃ no dānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:970_5: hitāya sukhāya hotū”ti modanti anumodanti, pītisomanassajātā hontīti.
atk-s0501a0:972: 5-6. Evaṃ bhagavā yathā pettivisayūpapannānaṃ taṅkhaṇe phalanibbattakaṃ kusalaṃ kammaṃ hoti, taṃ dassento –
atk-s0501a0:975_0: Vatvā puna ñātake nissāya nibbattakusalakammaphalaṃ paccanubhontānaṃ tesaṃ ñātī ārabbha
atk-s0501a0:975_1: thomanākāraṃ dassento “ciraṃ jīvantū”ti pañcamagāthāya pacchimaddhaṃ “amhākañca katā
atk-s0501a0:976_0: Tesaṃ attho – ciraṃ jīvantūti cirajīvino dīghāyukā hontu. No ñātīti amhākaṃ ñātakā.
atk-s0501a0:976_1: Yesaṃ hetūti ye nissāya yesaṃ kāraṇā. Labhāmaseti labhāma. Attanā taṅkhaṇaṃ paṭiladdhasampattiṃ
atk-s0501a0:976_2: apadisantā bhaṇanti. Petānañhi attano anumodanena, dāyakānaṃ uddesena, dakkhiṇeyyasampadāya
atk-s0501a0:976_3: cāti tīhi aṅgehi dakkhiṇā samijjhati, taṅkhaṇe phalanibbattikā hoti. Tattha dāyakā
atk-s0501a0:976_4: visesahetu. Tenāhaṃsu “yesaṃ hetu labhāmase”ti. Amhākañca katā pūjāti “idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ
atk-s0501a0:976_5: hotū”ti evaṃ imaṃ dānaṃ uddisantehi amhākañca pūjā katā. Dāyakā ca anipphalāti yamhi
atk-s0501a0:976_6: santāne pariccāgamayaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ, tassa tattheva phaladānato dāyakā ca anipphalāti.
atk-s0501a0:977_0: Etthāha – “kiṃ pana pettivisayūpapannā eva ñātayo labhanti, udāhu aññepi labhantī”ti?
atk-s0501a0:977_1: Vuccate – bhagavatā evetaṃ byākataṃ jāṇussoṇinā brāhmaṇena puṭṭhena, kimettha amhehi
atk-s0501a0:978_0: “Mayamassu, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā nāma dānāni dema, saddhāni karoma ‘idaṃ dānaṃ petānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:978_1: ñātisālohitānaṃ upakappatu, idaṃ dānaṃ petā ñātisālohitā paribhuñjantū’ti, kacci
atk-s0501a0:978_2: taṃ, bho gotama, dānaṃ petānaṃ ñātisālohitānaṃ upakappati, kacci te petā ñātisālohitā
atk-s0501a0:978_3: taṃ dānaṃ paribhuñjantīti. Ṭhāne kho, brāhmaṇa, upakappati, no aṭṭhāneti.
atk-s0501a0:979_0: “Katamaṃ pana taṃ, bho gotama, ṭhānaṃ, katamaṃ aṭṭhānanti? Idha, brāhmaṇa, ekacco
atk-s0501a0:979_1: pāṇātipātī hoti…pe… micchādiṭṭhiko hoti, so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā nirayaṃ upapajjati.
atk-s0501a0:979_2: Yo nerayikānaṃ sattānaṃ āhāro, tena so tattha yāpeti, tena so tattha tiṭṭhati. Idaṃ
atk-s0501a0:979_3: kho, brāhmaṇa, aṭṭhānaṃ, yattha ṭhitassa taṃ dānaṃ na upakappati.
atk-s0501a0:980_0: “Idha pana, brāhmaṇa, ekacco pāṇātipātī hoti…pe… micchādiṭṭhiko hoti, so kāyassa
atk-s0501a0:980_1: bhedā paraṃ maraṇā tiracchānayoniṃ upapajjati. Yo tiracchānayonikānaṃ sattānaṃ āhāro,
atk-s0501a0:980_2: tena so tattha yāpeti, tena so tattha tiṭṭhati. Idampi kho, brāhmaṇa, aṭṭhānaṃ, yattha
atk-s0501a0:981_0: “Idha pana, brāhmaṇa, ekacco pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti…pe… sammādiṭṭhiko hoti, so
atk-s0501a0:981_1: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā manussānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati…pe… devānaṃ sahabyataṃ
atk-s0501a0:981_2: upapajjati. Yo devānaṃ āhāro, tena so tattha yāpeti, tena so tattha tiṭṭhati. Idampi
atk-s0501a0:981_3: kho, brāhmaṇa, aṭṭhānaṃ, yattha ṭhitassa taṃ dānaṃ na upakappati.
atk-s0501a0:982_0: “Idha pana, brāhmaṇa, ekacco pāṇātipātī hoti…pe… micchādiṭṭhiko hoti, so kāyassa
atk-s0501a0:982_1: bhedā paraṃ maraṇā pettivisayaṃ upapajjati. Yo pettivesayikānaṃ sattānaṃ āhāro, tena
atk-s0501a0:982_2: so tattha yāpeti, tena so tattha tiṭṭhati. Yaṃ vā panassa ito anupavecchanti mittāmaccā
atk-s0501a0:982_3: vā ñātisālohitā vā, tena so tattha yāpeti, tena so tattha tiṭṭhati. Idaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0501a0:982_4: ṭhānaṃ, yattha ṭhitassa taṃ dānaṃ upakappatīti.
atk-s0501a0:983_0: “Sace pana, bho gotama, so peto ñātisālohito taṃ ṭhānaṃ anupapanno hoti, ko taṃ dānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:983_1: paribhuñjatīti? Aññepissa, brāhmaṇa, petā ñātisālohitā taṃ ṭhānaṃ upapannā honti,
atk-s0501a0:984_0: “Sace pana, bho gotama, so ceva peto ñātisālohito taṃ ṭhānaṃ anupapanno hoti, aññepissa
atk-s0501a0:984_1: petā ñātisālohitā taṃ ṭhānaṃ anupapannā honti, ko taṃ dānaṃ paribhuñjatīti? Aṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0501a0:984_2: kho etaṃ brāhmaṇa anavakāso, yaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ vivittaṃ assa iminā dīghena addhunā yadidaṃ
atk-s0501a0:984_3: petehi ñātisālohitehi. Apica brāhmaṇa dāyakopi anipphalo”ti.
atk-s0501a0:986: 6-7. Evaṃ bhagavā rañño māgadhassa pettivisayūpapannānaṃ pubbañātīnaṃ sampattiṃ nissāya thomento “ete te, mahārāja, ñātī imāya dānasampadāya attamanā evaṃ thomentī”ti dassento –
atk-s0501a0:987: “Ciraṃ jīvantu no ñātī, yesaṃ hetu labhāmase;
atk-s0501a0:988: Amhākañca katā pūjā, dāyakā ca anipphalā”ti. –
atk-s0501a0:989_0: Vatvā puna tesaṃ pettivisayūpapannānaṃ aññassa kasigorakkhādino sampattipaṭilābhakāraṇassa
atk-s0501a0:989_1: abhāvaṃ ito dinnena yāpanabhāvañca dassento “na hi tattha kasī atthī”ti chaṭṭhagāthāya
atk-s0501a0:990_0: Tatrāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā – na hi, mahārāja, tattha pettivisaye kasi atthi, yaṃ nissāya
atk-s0501a0:990_1: te petā sampattiṃ paṭilabheyyuṃ. Gorakkhettha na vijjatīti na kevalaṃ kasi eva, gorakkhāpi
atk-s0501a0:990_2: ettha pettivisaye na vijjati, yaṃ nissāya te sampattiṃ paṭilabheyyuṃ. Vaṇijjā tādisī
atk-s0501a0:990_3: natthīti vāṇijjāpi tādisī natthi, yā tesaṃ sampattipaṭilābhahetu bhaveyya. Hiraññena
atk-s0501a0:990_4: kayākayanti hiraññena kayavikkayampi tattha tādisaṃ natthi, yaṃ tesaṃ sampattipaṭilābhahetu
atk-s0501a0:990_5: bhaveyya. Ito dinnena yāpenti, petā kālagatā tahinti kevalaṃ pana ito ñātīhi vā mittāmaccehi
atk-s0501a0:990_6: vā dinnena yāpenti, attabhāvaṃ gamenti. Petāti pettivisayūpapannā sattā. Kālagatāti
atk-s0501a0:990_7: attano maraṇakālena gatā, “kālakatā”ti vā pāṭho, katakālā katamaraṇāti attho. Tahinti tasmiṃ pettivisaye.
atk-s0501a0:992: 8-9. Evaṃ “ito dinnena yāpenti, petā kālagatā tahi”nti vatvā idāni upamāhi tamatthaṃ pakāsento “unname udakaṃ vuṭṭha”nti idaṃ gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0501a0:993_0: Tassattho – yathā unnate thale ussāde bhūmibhāge meghehi abhivuṭṭhaṃ udakaṃ ninnaṃ
